Theory While_Default

theory While_Default
imports "HOL-Library.While_Combinator"
begin

context
  fixes d :: "'a"
  and b :: "'a ‚áí bool"
  and c :: "'a ‚áí 'a"
begin

definition while_default :: "'a ‚áí 'a" where
  "while_default s =
     (if ‚àÄk. b ((c^^k) s) then d else the (while_option b c s))"

lemma while_default_code[code]:
   "while_default s = (if b s then while_default (c s) else s)"
proof (cases "‚àÄk. b ((c^^k) s)")
  case True
  moreover
  from spec[OF True, of "0"] have "b s" by simp_all
  moreover
  from spec[OF True, of "Suc m" for m] have "‚àÄk. b ((c^^k) (c s))"
    by (simp add: funpow_Suc_right del: funpow.simps(2))
  ultimately show ?thesis unfolding while_default_def by simp
next
  case False
  define k where "k = (LEAST k. ¬¨ b ((c ^^ k) s))"
  with False have k: "¬¨ b ((c ^^ k) s)"
    "‚ãÄl. ¬¨ b ((c ^^ l) s) ‚üπ k ‚â§ l"
    by (auto intro!: LeastI_ex[of "Œªk. ¬¨ b ((c ^^ k) s)"] Least_le)
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases k)
    case 0
    with k(1) have "¬¨ b s" by auto
    with False show ?thesis by (auto simp add: while_default_def while_option_unfold)
  next
    case (Suc k)
    with k(2) have "b ((c ^^ 0) s)" by blast
    then have "b s" by simp
    with k(1) Suc False show ?thesis unfolding while_default_def
      by (subst while_option_unfold) (auto simp add: funpow_Suc_right simp del: funpow.simps(2))
  qed
qed

lemma while_default_rule:
  assumes c: "‚ãÄs. P s ‚üπ b s ‚üπ P (c s)"
  and t: "‚ãÄs. P s ‚üπ ¬¨ b s ‚üπ Q s"
  and s: "P s" and d: "Q d"
  shows "Q (while_default s)"
proof (cases "‚àÄk. b ((c^^k) s)")
  case False
  then obtain t where "while_option b c s = Some t" unfolding while_option_def by auto
  with False show ?thesis using while_option_rule[of P b c s t] while_option_stop[of b c s t] s c t
    by (auto simp add: while_default_def)
qed (simp add: while_default_def d t)

end

end

Theory FSet_More

theory FSet_More
imports  "HOL-Library.FSet"
begin

lemma Suc_pred_image[simp]: "0 ‚àâ P ‚üπ (Œªx. Suc (x - Suc 0)) ` P = P"
    unfolding image_def by safe (metis Suc_pred neq0_conv)+

context includes fset.lifting begin

lemmas Suc_pred_fimage[simp] = Suc_pred_image[Transfer.transferred]

end

lemma ffilter_eq_fempty_iff:
  "ffilter P X = {||} ‚ü∑ (‚àÄx. x |‚àà| X ‚ü∂ ¬¨ P x)"
  "{||} = ffilter P X ‚ü∑ (‚àÄx. x |‚àà| X ‚ü∂ ¬¨ P x)"
  by auto

lemma max_ffilter_below[simp]: "‚ü¶x |‚àà| P; x < n‚üß ‚üπ
  max n (Suc (fMax (ffilter (Œªi. i < n) P))) = n"
  by (metis max.absorb1 Suc_leI fMax_in fempty_iff ffmember_filter)

lemma fMax_boundedD:
  "‚ü¶fMax P < n; x |‚àà| P‚üß ‚üπ x < n"
  "‚ü¶fMax P ‚â§ n; n |‚àâ| P; x |‚àà| P‚üß ‚üπ x < n"
  by (metis fMax_ge le_less_trans, metis fMax_ge leD neqE order.strict_trans2)

lemma fMax_ffilter_less: "x |‚àà| P ‚üπ x < n ‚üπ fMax (ffilter (Œªi. i < n) P) < n"
  by (metis fMax_in ffilter_eq_fempty_iff(2) ffmember_filter)

end

Theory Automaton

(*  Author: Dmitriy Traytel *)

section "Equivalence Framework"

(*<*)
theory Automaton
imports
  "HOL-Library.While_Combinator"
  Coinductive_Languages.Coinductive_Language
begin
(*>*)

coinductive rel_language where
  "‚ü¶ùî¨ L = ùî¨ K; ‚ãÄa b. R a b ‚üπ rel_language R (ùî° L a) (ùî° K b)‚üß ‚üπ rel_language R L K"

declare rel_language.coinduct[consumes 1, case_names Lang, coinduct pred]

lemma rel_language_alt:
  "rel_language R L K = rel_fun (list_all2 R) (=) (in_language L) (in_language K)"
unfolding rel_fun_def proof (rule iffI, safe del: iffI)
  fix xs ys
  assume "list_all2 R xs ys" "rel_language R L K"
  then show "in_language L xs = in_language K ys"
    by (induct xs ys arbitrary: L K) (auto del: iffI elim: rel_language.cases)
next
  assume "‚àÄxs ys. list_all2 R xs ys ‚ü∂ in_language L xs = in_language K ys"
  then show "rel_language R L K" by (coinduction arbitrary: L K) (auto dest: spec2)
qed

lemma rel_language_eq: "rel_language (=) = (=)"
  unfolding rel_language_alt[abs_def] list.rel_eq fun.rel_eq
  by (subst (2) fun_eq_iff)+
    (auto intro: box_equals[OF _ to_language_in_language to_language_in_language])

abbreviation "ùî°s ‚â° fold (Œªa L. ùî° L a)"

lemma in_language_ùî°s: "in_language (ùî°s w L) v ‚ü∑ in_language L (w @ v)"
  by (induct w arbitrary: L) simp_all

lemma ùî¨_ùî°s: "ùî¨ (ùî°s w L) ‚ü∑ in_language L w"
  by (induct w arbitrary: L) auto

lemma in_language_to_language[simp]: "in_language (to_language L) w ‚ü∑ w ‚àà L"
  by (metis in_language_to_language mem_Collect_eq)

lemma rtrancl_fold_product:
shows "{((r, s), (f a r, g b s)) | a b r s. a ‚àà A ‚àß b ‚àà B ‚àß R a b}^* =
       {((r, s), (fold f w1 r, fold g w2 s)) | w1 w2 r s. w1 ‚àà lists A ‚àß w2 ‚àà lists B ‚àß list_all2 R w1 w2}"
  (is "?L = ?R")
proof-
  { fix r s r' s'
    have "((r, s), (r', s')) : ?L ‚üπ ((r, s), (r', s')) ‚àà ?R"
    proof(induction rule: converse_rtrancl_induct2)
      case refl show ?case by(force intro!: fold_simps(1)[symmetric])
    next
      case step thus ?case by(force intro!: fold_simps(2)[symmetric])
    qed
  }
  hence "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà ?L ‚üπ x ‚àà ?R" by force
  moreover
  { fix r s r' s'
    { fix w1 w2 assume "list_all2 R w1 w2" "w1 ‚àà lists A" "w2 ‚àà lists B"
      then have "((r, s), fold f w1 r, fold g w2 s) ‚àà ?L"
      proof(induction w1 w2 arbitrary: r s)
        case Nil show ?case by simp
      next
        case Cons thus ?case by (force elim!: converse_rtrancl_into_rtrancl[rotated])
      qed
    }
    hence "((r, s), (r', s')) ‚àà ?R ‚üπ ((r, s), (r', s')) ‚àà ?L" by auto
  }
  hence "‚ãÄx. x ‚àà ?R ‚üπ x ‚àà ?L" by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma rtrancl_fold_product1:
shows "{(r, s). ‚àÉa ‚àà A. s = f a r}^* = {(r, s). ‚àÉa ‚àà lists A. s = fold f a r}" (is "?L = ?R")
proof-
  { fix r s
    have "(r, s) ‚àà ?L ‚üπ (r, s) ‚àà ?R"
    proof(induction rule: converse_rtrancl_induct)
      case base show ?case by(force intro!: fold_simps(1)[symmetric])
    next
      case step thus ?case by(force intro!: fold_simps(2)[symmetric])
    qed
  } moreover
  { fix r s
    { fix w assume "w ‚àà lists A"
      then have "(r, fold f w r) ‚àà ?L"
      proof(induction w rule: rev_induct)
        case Nil show ?case by simp
      next
        case snoc thus ?case by (force elim!: rtrancl_into_rtrancl)
      qed
    } 
    hence "(r, s) ‚àà ?R ‚üπ (r, s) ‚àà ?L" by auto
  } ultimately show ?thesis by (auto 10 0)
qed

lemma lang_eq_ext_Nil_fold_Deriv:
  fixes K L A R
  assumes
    "‚ãÄw. in_language K w ‚üπ w ‚àà lists A"
    "‚ãÄw. in_language L w ‚üπ w ‚àà lists B"
    "‚ãÄa b. R a b ‚üπ a ‚àà A ‚ü∑ b ‚àà B"
  defines "ùîÖ ‚â° {(ùî°s w1 K, ùî°s w2 L) | w1 w2. w1 ‚àà lists A ‚àß w2 ‚àà lists B ‚àß list_all2 R w1 w2}"
  shows "rel_language R K L ‚ü∑ (‚àÄ(K, L) ‚àà ùîÖ. ùî¨ K ‚ü∑ ùî¨ L)"
proof
  assume "‚àÄ(K, L)‚ààùîÖ. ùî¨ K = ùî¨ L"
  then show "rel_language R K L"
  unfolding ùîÖ_def using assms(1,2)
  proof (coinduction arbitrary: K L)
    case (Lang K L)
    then have CIH: "‚ãÄK' L'. ‚àÉw1 w2.
      K' = ùî°s w1 K ‚àß L' = ùî°s w2 L ‚àß w1 ‚àà lists A ‚àß w2 ‚àà lists B ‚àß list_all2 R w1 w2 ‚üπ ùî¨ K' = ùî¨ L'" and
      [dest]: "‚ãÄw. in_language K w ‚üπ w ‚àà lists A" "‚ãÄw. in_language L w ‚üπ w ‚àà lists B" 
      by blast+
    show ?case unfolding ex_simps simp_thms
    proof (safe del: iffI)
      show "ùî¨ K = ùî¨ L" by (intro CIH[OF exI[where x = "[]"]]) simp
    next
      fix x y w1 w2 assume "‚àÄx‚ààset w1. x ‚àà A" "‚àÄx‚ààset w2. x ‚àà B" "list_all2 R w1 w2" "R x y"
      then show "ùî¨ (ùî°s w1 (ùî° K x)) = ùî¨ (ùî°s w2 (ùî° L y))"
      proof (cases "x ‚àà A ‚àß y ‚àà B")
        assume "¬¨ (x ‚àà A ‚àß y ‚àà B)"
        with assms(3)[OF ‚ÄπR x y‚Ä∫] show ?thesis
          by (auto simp: in_language_ùî°s in_language.simps[symmetric] simp del: in_language.simps)
      qed (intro CIH exI[where x = "x # w1"] exI[where x = "y # w2"], auto)
    qed (auto simp add: in_language.simps[symmetric] simp del: in_language.simps)
  qed
qed (auto simp: ùîÖ_def rel_language_alt rel_fun_def ùî¨_ùî°s)

subsection ‚ÄπAbstract Deterministic Automaton‚Ä∫

locale DA =
fixes alphabet :: "'a list"
fixes init :: "'t ‚áí 's"
fixes delta :: "'a ‚áí 's ‚áí 's"
fixes accept :: "'s ‚áí bool"
fixes wellformed :: "'s ‚áí bool"
fixes Language :: "'s ‚áí 'a language"
fixes wf :: "'t ‚áí bool"
fixes Lang :: "'t ‚áí 'a language"
assumes distinct_alphabet: "distinct alphabet"
assumes Language_init: "wf t ‚üπ Language (init t) = Lang t"
assumes wellformed_init: "wf t ‚üπ wellformed (init t)"
assumes Language_alphabet: "‚ü¶wellformed s; in_language (Language s) w‚üß ‚üπ w ‚àà lists (set alphabet)"
assumes wellformed_delta: "‚ü¶wellformed s; a ‚àà set alphabet‚üß ‚üπ wellformed (delta a s)"
assumes Language_delta: "‚ü¶wellformed s; a ‚àà set alphabet‚üß ‚üπ Language (delta a s) = ùî° (Language s) a"
assumes accept_Language: "wellformed s ‚üπ accept s ‚ü∑ ùî¨ (Language s)"
begin

lemma this: "DA alphabet init delta accept wellformed Language wf Lang" by unfold_locales

lemma wellformed_deltas:
  "‚ü¶wellformed s; w ‚àà lists (set alphabet)‚üß ‚üπ wellformed (fold delta w s)"
  by (induction w arbitrary: s) (auto simp add: Language_delta wellformed_delta)

lemma Language_deltas:
  "‚ü¶wellformed s; w ‚àà lists (set alphabet)‚üß ‚üπ Language (fold delta w s) = ùî°s w (Language s)"
  by (induction w arbitrary: s) (auto simp add: Language_delta wellformed_delta)

text‚ÄπAuxiliary functions:‚Ä∫
definition reachable :: "'a list ‚áí 's ‚áí 's set" where
  "reachable as s = snd (the (rtrancl_while (Œª_. True) (Œªs. map (Œªa. delta a s) as) s))"

definition automaton :: "'a list ‚áí 's ‚áí (('s * 'a) * 's) set" where
  "automaton as s =
    snd (the
    (let start = (([s], {s}), {});
         test = Œª((ws, Z), A). ws ‚â† [];
         step = Œª((ws, Z), A).
           (let s = hd ws;
                new_edges = map (Œªa. ((s, a), delta a s)) as;
                new = remdups (filter (Œªss. ss ‚àâ Z) (map snd new_edges))
           in ((new @ tl ws, set new ‚à™ Z), set new_edges ‚à™ A))
    in while_option test step start))"

definition match :: "'s ‚áí 'a list ‚áí bool" where
  "match s w = accept (fold delta w s)"

lemma match_correct:
  assumes "wellformed s" "w ‚àà lists (set alphabet)"
  shows "match s w ‚ü∑ in_language (Language s) w"
  unfolding match_def accept_Language[OF wellformed_deltas[OF assms]] Language_deltas[OF assms] ùî¨_ùî°s ..

end

locale DAs =
  M: DA alphabet1 init1 delta1 accept1 wellformed1 Language1 wf1 Lang1 +
  N: DA alphabet2 init2 delta2 accept2 wellformed2 Language2 wf2 Lang2
  for alphabet1 :: "'a1 list" and init1 :: "'t1 ‚áí 's1" and delta1 accept1 wellformed1 Language1 wf1 Lang1
  and alphabet2 :: "'a2 list" and init2 :: "'t2 ‚áí 's2" and delta2 accept2 wellformed2 Language2 wf2 Lang2 +
  fixes letter_eq :: "'a1 ‚áí 'a2 ‚áí bool"
  assumes letter_eq: "‚ãÄa b. letter_eq a b ‚üπ a ‚àà set alphabet1 ‚ü∑ b ‚àà set alphabet2"
begin

abbreviation step where
  "step ‚â° (Œª(p, q). map (Œª(a, b). (delta1 a p, delta2 b q))
    (filter (case_prod letter_eq) (List.product alphabet1 alphabet2)))"

abbreviation closure :: "'s1 * 's2 ‚áí (('s1 * 's2) list * ('s1 * 's2) set) option" where
  "closure ‚â° rtrancl_while (Œª(p, q). accept1 p = accept2 q) step"

theorem closure_sound_complete:
assumes wf: "wf1 r" "wf2 s"
and result: "closure (init1 r, init2 s) = Some (ws, R)" (is "closure (?r, ?s) = _")
shows "ws = [] ‚ü∑ rel_language letter_eq (Lang1 r) (Lang2 s)"
proof -
  from wf have wellformed: "wellformed1 ?r" "wellformed2 ?s"
    using M.wellformed_init N.wellformed_init by blast+
  note Language_alphabets[simp] =
    M.Language_alphabet[OF wellformed(1)] N.Language_alphabet[OF wellformed(2)]
  note Language_deltass = M.Language_deltas[OF wellformed(1)] N.Language_deltas[OF wellformed(2)]

  have bisim: "rel_language letter_eq (Language1 ?r) (Language2 ?s) =
    (‚àÄa b. (‚àÉw1 w2. a = ùî°s w1 (Language1 ?r) ‚àß b = ùî°s w2 (Language2 ?s) ‚àß
      w1 ‚àà lists (set alphabet1) ‚àß w2 ‚àà lists (set alphabet2) ‚àß list_all2 letter_eq w1 w2) ‚ü∂
    ùî¨ a = ùî¨ b)"
    by (subst lang_eq_ext_Nil_fold_Deriv) (auto dest: letter_eq)

  have leq: "rel_language letter_eq (Language1 ?r) (Language2 ?s) =
  (‚àÄ(r', s') ‚àà {((r, s), (delta1 a r, delta2 b s)) | a b r s.
    a ‚àà set alphabet1 ‚àß b ‚àà set alphabet2 ‚àß letter_eq a b}^* `` {(?r, ?s)}.
    accept1 r' = accept2 s')" using Language_deltass
      M.accept_Language[OF M.wellformed_deltas[OF wellformed(1)]]
      N.accept_Language[OF N.wellformed_deltas[OF wellformed(2)]]
      unfolding rtrancl_fold_product in_lists_conv_set bisim
      by (auto 10 0)
  have "{(x,y). y ‚àà set (step x)} =
    {((r, s), (delta1 a r, delta2 b s)) | a b r s. a ‚àà set alphabet1 ‚àß b ‚àà set alphabet2 ‚àß letter_eq a b}"
    by auto
  with rtrancl_while_Some[OF result]
  have "(ws = []) = rel_language letter_eq (Language1 ?r) (Language2 ?s)"
    by (auto simp add: leq Ball_def split: if_splits)
  then show ?thesis unfolding M.Language_init[OF wf(1)] N.Language_init[OF wf(2)] .
qed

subsection ‚ÄπThe overall procedure‚Ä∫

definition check_eqv :: "'t1 ‚áí 't2 ‚áí bool" where
"check_eqv r s = (wf1 r ‚àß wf2 s ‚àß (case closure (init1 r, init2 s) of Some([], _) ‚áí True | _ ‚áí False))"

lemma soundness: 
assumes "check_eqv r s" shows "rel_language letter_eq (Lang1 r) (Lang2 s)"
proof -
  obtain R where "wf1 r" "wf2 s" "closure (init1 r, init2 s) = Some([], R)"
    using assms by (auto simp: check_eqv_def Let_def split: option.splits list.splits)
  from closure_sound_complete[OF this] show "rel_language letter_eq (Lang1 r) (Lang2 s)" by simp
qed

(* completeness needs termination of closure, otherwise result could be None *)

end

subsection ‚ÄπAbstract Deterministic Finite Automaton‚Ä∫

locale DFA = DA +
assumes fin: "wellformed s ‚üπ finite {fold delta w s | w. w ‚àà lists (set alphabet)}"
begin

lemma finite_rtrancl_delta_Image1:
  "wellformed r ‚üπ finite ({(r, s). ‚àÉa ‚àà set alphabet. s = delta a r}^* `` {r})"
  unfolding rtrancl_fold_product1 by (auto intro: finite_subset[OF _ fin])

lemma
  assumes "wellformed r" "set as ‚äÜ set alphabet"
  shows reachable: "reachable as r = {fold delta w r | w. w ‚àà lists (set as)}"
  and finite_reachable: "finite (reachable as r)"
proof -
  obtain wsZ where *: "rtrancl_while (Œª_. True) (Œªs. map (Œªa. delta a s) as) r = Some wsZ"
    using assms by (atomize_elim, intro rtrancl_while_finite_Some Image_mono rtrancl_mono
      finite_subset[OF _ finite_rtrancl_delta_Image1[of r]]) auto
  then show "reachable as r = {fold delta w r | w. w ‚àà lists (set as)}"
    unfolding reachable_def by (cases wsZ)
      (auto dest!: rtrancl_while_Some split: if_splits simp: rtrancl_fold_product1 image_iff)
  then show "finite (reachable as r)" using assms by (force intro: finite_subset[OF _ fin])
qed

end

locale DFAs =
  M: DFA alphabet1 init1 delta1 accept1 wellformed1 Language1 wf1 Lang1 +
  N: DFA alphabet2 init2 delta2 accept2 wellformed2 Language2 wf2 Lang2
  for alphabet1 :: "'a1 list" and init1 :: "'t1 ‚áí 's1" and delta1 accept1 wellformed1 Language1 wf1 Lang1
  and alphabet2 :: "'a2 list" and init2 :: "'t2 ‚áí 's2" and delta2 accept2 wellformed2 Language2 wf2 Lang2 +
  fixes letter_eq :: "'a1 ‚áí 'a2 ‚áí bool"
  assumes letter_eq: "‚ãÄa b. letter_eq a b ‚üπ a ‚àà set alphabet1 ‚ü∑ b ‚àà set alphabet2"
begin

interpretation DAs by unfold_locales (auto dest: letter_eq)

lemma finite_rtrancl_delta_Image:
  "‚ü¶wellformed1 r; wellformed2 s‚üß ‚üπ
  finite ({((r, s), (delta1 a r, delta2 b s))| a b r s.
    a ‚àà set alphabet1 ‚àß b ‚àà set alphabet2 ‚àß R a b}^* `` {(r, s)})"
  unfolding rtrancl_fold_product Image_singleton
  by (auto intro: finite_subset[OF _ finite_cartesian_product[OF M.fin N.fin]])

lemma "termination":
  assumes "wellformed1 r" "wellformed2 s"
  shows "‚àÉst. closure (r, s) = Some st" (is "‚àÉ_. closure  ?i = _")
proof (rule rtrancl_while_finite_Some)
  show "finite ({(x, st). st ‚àà set (step x)}‚áß* `` {?i})"
    by (rule finite_subset[OF Image_mono[OF rtrancl_mono]
      finite_rtrancl_delta_Image[OF assms, of letter_eq]]) auto
qed

lemma completeness: 
assumes "wf1 r" "wf2 s" "rel_language letter_eq (Lang1 r) (Lang2 s)" shows "check_eqv r s"
proof -
  obtain ws R where 1: "closure (init1 r, init2 s) = Some (ws, R)" using "termination"
    M.wellformed_init N.wellformed_init assms by fastforce
  with closure_sound_complete[OF _ _ this] assms
  show "check_eqv r s" by (simp add: check_eqv_def)
qed
  
end

sublocale DA < DAs
  alphabet init delta accept wellformed Language wf Lang
  alphabet init delta accept wellformed Language wf Lang "(=)"
  by unfold_locales auto

sublocale DFA < DFAs
  alphabet init delta accept wellformed Language wf Lang
  alphabet init delta accept wellformed Language wf Lang "(=)"
  by unfold_locales auto

lemma (in DA) step_alt: "step = (Œª(p, q). map (Œªa. (delta a p, delta a q)) alphabet)"
  using distinct_alphabet
proof (induct alphabet)
  case (Cons x xs)
  moreover
  { fix x :: 'a and xs ys :: "'a list"
    assume "x ‚àâ set xs"
    then have "[(x, y)‚ÜêList.product xs (x # ys) . x = y] = [(x, y)‚ÜêList.product xs ys . x = y]"
      by (induct xs arbitrary: x) auto
  }
  moreover
  { fix x :: 'a and xs :: "'a list"
    assume "x ‚àâ set xs"
    then have "[(x, y)‚Üêmap (Pair x) xs . x = y] = []"
      by (induct xs) auto
  }
  ultimately show ?case by (auto simp: fun_eq_iff)
qed simp

(*<*)
end
(*>*)

Theory Abstract_Formula

section ‚ÄπDerivatives of Abstract Formulas‚Ä∫
(* Author: Dmitriy Traytel *)

(*<*)
theory Abstract_Formula
imports
  Automaton
  Deriving.Compare_Instances
  "HOL-Library.Code_Target_Nat"
  While_Default
begin
(*>*)

subsection ‚ÄπPreliminaries‚Ä∫

lemma pred_Diff_0[simp]: "0 ‚àâ A ‚üπ i ‚àà (Œªx. x - Suc 0) ` A ‚ü∑ Suc i ‚àà A"
  by (cases i) (fastforce simp: image_iff le_Suc_eq  elim: contrapos_np)+

lemma funpow_cycle_mult: "(f ^^ k) x = x ‚üπ (f ^^ (m * k)) x = x"
  by (induct m) (auto simp: funpow_add)

lemma funpow_cycle: "(f ^^ k) x = x ‚üπ (f ^^ l) x = (f ^^ (l mod k)) x"
  by (subst div_mult_mod_eq[symmetric, of l k])
    (simp only: add.commute funpow_add funpow_cycle_mult o_apply)

lemma funpow_cycle_offset:
  fixes f :: "'a ‚áí 'a"
  assumes "(f ^^ k) x = (f ^^ i) x" "i ‚â§ k" "i ‚â§ l"
  shows "(f ^^ l) x = (f ^^ ((l - i) mod (k - i) + i)) x"
proof -
  from assms have
    "(f ^^ (k - i)) ((f ^^ i) x) = ((f ^^ i) x)"
    "(f ^^ l) x = (f ^^ (l - i)) ((f ^^ i) x)"
    unfolding fun_cong[OF funpow_add[symmetric, unfolded o_def]] by simp_all
  from funpow_cycle[OF this(1), of "l - i"] this(2) show ?thesis
    by (simp add: funpow_add)
qed

lemma in_set_tlD: "x ‚àà set (tl xs) ‚üπ x ‚àà set xs"
  by (cases xs) auto

definition "dec k m = (if m > k then m - Suc 0 else m :: nat)"


subsection ‚ÄπAbstract formulas‚Ä∫

datatype (discs_sels) ('a, 'k) aformula =
  FBool bool
| FBase 'a
| FNot "('a, 'k) aformula"
| FOr "('a, 'k) aformula" "('a, 'k) aformula"
| FAnd "('a, 'k) aformula" "('a, 'k) aformula"
| FEx 'k "('a, 'k) aformula"
| FAll 'k "('a, 'k) aformula"
derive linorder aformula

fun nFOR where
  "nFOR [] = FBool False"
| "nFOR [x] = x"
| "nFOR (x # xs) = FOr x (nFOR xs)"

fun nFAND where
  "nFAND [] = FBool True"
| "nFAND [x] = x"
| "nFAND (x # xs) = FAnd x (nFAND xs)"

definition "NFOR = nFOR o sorted_list_of_set"
definition "NFAND = nFAND o sorted_list_of_set"

fun disjuncts where
  "disjuncts (FOr œÜ œà) = disjuncts œÜ ‚à™ disjuncts œà"
| "disjuncts œÜ = {œÜ}"

fun conjuncts where
  "conjuncts (FAnd œÜ œà) = conjuncts œÜ ‚à™ conjuncts œà"
| "conjuncts œÜ = {œÜ}"

fun disjuncts_list where
  "disjuncts_list (FOr œÜ œà) = disjuncts_list œÜ @ disjuncts_list œà"
| "disjuncts_list œÜ = [œÜ]"

fun conjuncts_list where
  "conjuncts_list (FAnd œÜ œà) = conjuncts_list œÜ @ conjuncts_list œà"
| "conjuncts_list œÜ = [œÜ]"

lemma finite_juncts[simp]: "finite (disjuncts œÜ)" "finite (conjuncts œÜ)"
  and nonempty_juncts[simp]: "disjuncts œÜ ‚â† {}" "conjuncts œÜ ‚â† {}"
  by (induct œÜ) auto

lemma juncts_eq_set_juncts_list:
  "disjuncts œÜ = set (disjuncts_list œÜ)"
  "conjuncts œÜ = set (conjuncts_list œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ) auto

lemma notin_juncts:
  "‚ü¶œà ‚àà disjuncts œÜ; is_FOr œà‚üß ‚üπ False"
  "‚ü¶œà ‚àà conjuncts œÜ; is_FAnd œà‚üß ‚üπ False"
  by (induct œÜ) auto

lemma juncts_list_singleton:
  "¬¨ is_FOr œÜ ‚üπ disjuncts_list œÜ = [œÜ]"
  "¬¨ is_FAnd œÜ ‚üπ conjuncts_list œÜ = [œÜ]"
  by (induct œÜ) auto

lemma juncts_singleton:
  "¬¨ is_FOr œÜ ‚üπ disjuncts œÜ = {œÜ}"
  "¬¨ is_FAnd œÜ ‚üπ conjuncts œÜ = {œÜ}"
  by (induct œÜ) auto

lemma nonempty_juncts_list: "conjuncts_list œÜ ‚â† []" "disjuncts_list œÜ ‚â† []"
  using nonempty_juncts[of œÜ] by (auto simp: Suc_le_eq juncts_eq_set_juncts_list)

primrec norm_ACI ("‚ü®_‚ü©") where
  "‚ü®FBool b‚ü© = FBool b"
| "‚ü®FBase a‚ü© = FBase a"
| "‚ü®FNot œÜ‚ü© = FNot ‚ü®œÜ‚ü©"
| "‚ü®FOr œÜ œà‚ü© = NFOR (disjuncts (FOr ‚ü®œÜ‚ü© ‚ü®œà‚ü©))"
| "‚ü®FAnd œÜ œà‚ü© = NFAND (conjuncts (FAnd ‚ü®œÜ‚ü© ‚ü®œà‚ü©))"
| "‚ü®FEx k œÜ‚ü© = FEx k ‚ü®œÜ‚ü©"
| "‚ü®FAll k œÜ‚ü© = FAll k ‚ü®œÜ‚ü©"

fun nf_ACI where
  "nf_ACI (FOr œà1 œà2) = (¬¨ is_FOr œà1 ‚àß (let œÜs = œà1 # disjuncts_list œà2 in
    sorted œÜs ‚àß distinct œÜs ‚àß nf_ACI œà1 ‚àß nf_ACI œà2))"
| "nf_ACI (FAnd œà1 œà2) = (¬¨ is_FAnd œà1 ‚àß (let œÜs = œà1 # conjuncts_list œà2 in
    sorted œÜs ‚àß distinct œÜs ‚àß nf_ACI œà1 ‚àß nf_ACI œà2))"
| "nf_ACI (FNot œÜ) = nf_ACI œÜ"
| "nf_ACI (FEx k œÜ) = nf_ACI œÜ"
| "nf_ACI (FAll k œÜ) = nf_ACI œÜ"
| "nf_ACI œÜ = True"

lemma nf_ACI_D:
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ sorted (disjuncts_list œÜ)"
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ sorted (conjuncts_list œÜ)"
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ distinct (disjuncts_list œÜ)"
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ distinct (conjuncts_list œÜ)"
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ list_all nf_ACI (disjuncts_list œÜ)"
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ list_all nf_ACI (conjuncts_list œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ) (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton)

lemma disjuncts_list_nFOR:
  "‚ü¶list_all (Œªx. ¬¨ is_FOr x) œÜs; œÜs ‚â† []‚üß ‚üπ disjuncts_list (nFOR œÜs) = œÜs"
  by (induct œÜs rule: nFOR.induct) (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton)

lemma conjuncts_list_nFAND:
  "‚ü¶list_all (Œªx. ¬¨ is_FAnd x) œÜs; œÜs ‚â† []‚üß ‚üπ conjuncts_list (nFAND œÜs) = œÜs"
  by (induct œÜs rule: nFAND.induct) (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton)

lemma disjuncts_NFOR:
  "‚ü¶finite X; X ‚â† {}; ‚àÄx ‚àà X. ¬¨ is_FOr x‚üß ‚üπ disjuncts (NFOR X) = X"
  unfolding NFOR_def by (auto simp: juncts_eq_set_juncts_list list_all_iff disjuncts_list_nFOR)

lemma conjuncts_NFAND:
  "‚ü¶finite X; X ‚â† {}; ‚àÄx ‚àà X. ¬¨ is_FAnd x‚üß ‚üπ conjuncts (NFAND X) = X"
  unfolding NFAND_def by (auto simp: juncts_eq_set_juncts_list list_all_iff conjuncts_list_nFAND)

lemma nf_ACI_nFOR: 
  "‚ü¶sorted œÜs; distinct œÜs; list_all nf_ACI œÜs; list_all (Œªx. ¬¨ is_FOr x) œÜs‚üß ‚üπ nf_ACI (nFOR œÜs)"
  by (induct œÜs rule: nFOR.induct)
    (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton disjuncts_list_nFOR nf_ACI_D)

lemma nf_ACI_nFAND: 
  "‚ü¶sorted œÜs; distinct œÜs; list_all nf_ACI œÜs; list_all (Œªx. ¬¨ is_FAnd x) œÜs‚üß ‚üπ nf_ACI (nFAND œÜs)"
  by (induct œÜs rule: nFAND.induct)
    (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton conjuncts_list_nFAND nf_ACI_D)

lemma nf_ACI_juncts:
  "‚ü¶œà ‚àà disjuncts œÜ; nf_ACI œÜ‚üß ‚üπ nf_ACI œà"
  "‚ü¶œà ‚àà conjuncts œÜ; nf_ACI œÜ‚üß ‚üπ nf_ACI œà"
  by (induct œÜ) auto

lemma nf_ACI_norm_ACI: "nf_ACI ‚ü®œÜ‚ü©"
  by (induct œÜ)
    (force simp: NFOR_def NFAND_def list_all_iff
      intro!: nf_ACI_nFOR nf_ACI_nFAND elim: nf_ACI_juncts notin_juncts)+

lemma nFOR_Cons: "nFOR (x # xs) = (if xs = [] then x else FOr x (nFOR xs))"
  by (cases xs) simp_all

lemma nFAND_Cons: "nFAND (x # xs) = (if xs = [] then x else FAnd x (nFAND xs))"
  by (cases xs) simp_all

lemma nFOR_disjuncts: "nf_ACI œà ‚üπ nFOR (disjuncts_list œà) = œà"
  by (induct œà) (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton nFOR_Cons)

lemma nFAND_conjuncts: "nf_ACI œà ‚üπ nFAND (conjuncts_list œà) = œà"
  by (induct œà) (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton nFAND_Cons)

lemma NFOR_disjuncts: "nf_ACI œà ‚üπ NFOR (disjuncts œà) = œà"
  using nFOR_disjuncts[of œà] unfolding NFOR_def o_apply juncts_eq_set_juncts_list
  by (metis finite_set finite_sorted_distinct_unique nf_ACI_D(1,3) sorted_list_of_set)

lemma NFAND_conjuncts: "nf_ACI œà ‚üπ NFAND (conjuncts œà) = œà"
  using nFAND_conjuncts[of œà] unfolding NFAND_def o_apply juncts_eq_set_juncts_list
  by (metis finite_set finite_sorted_distinct_unique nf_ACI_D(2,4) sorted_list_of_set)

lemma norm_ACI_if_nf_ACI: "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ ‚ü®œÜ‚ü© = œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ)
    (auto simp: juncts_list_singleton juncts_eq_set_juncts_list nonempty_juncts_list
      NFOR_def NFAND_def nFOR_Cons nFAND_Cons nFOR_disjuncts nFAND_conjuncts
      sorted_list_of_set_sort_remdups distinct_remdups_id sorted_sort_id insort_is_Cons)

lemma norm_ACI_idem: "‚ü®‚ü®œÜ‚ü©‚ü© = ‚ü®œÜ‚ü©"
  by (metis nf_ACI_norm_ACI norm_ACI_if_nf_ACI)

lemma norm_ACI_juncts:
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ norm_ACI ` disjuncts œÜ = disjuncts œÜ"
  "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ norm_ACI ` conjuncts œÜ = conjuncts œÜ"
  by (drule nf_ACI_D(5,6), force simp: list_all_iff juncts_eq_set_juncts_list norm_ACI_if_nf_ACI)+

lemma
  norm_ACI_NFOR: "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ œÜ = NFOR (norm_ACI ` disjuncts œÜ)" and
  norm_ACI_NFAND: "nf_ACI œÜ ‚üπ œÜ = NFAND (norm_ACI ` conjuncts œÜ)"
  by (simp_all add: norm_ACI_juncts NFOR_disjuncts NFAND_conjuncts)

(*
'a - atomic formula
'i - interpretation
'k - kind of quantifier
'n - De Brujin index
'x - alphabet element
'v - valuation
*)
locale Formula_Operations =
  fixes TYPEVARS :: "'a :: linorder √ó 'i √ó 'k :: {linorder, enum} √ó 'n √ó 'x √ó 'v"

  (* De Bruijn indices abstractly *)
  and SUC :: "'k ‚áí 'n ‚áí 'n"
  and LESS :: "'k ‚áí nat ‚áí 'n ‚áí bool"

  (* Interpratations *)
  and assigns :: "nat ‚áí 'i ‚áí 'k ‚áí 'v" ("_‚áó_‚áñ_" [900, 999, 999] 999)
  and nvars :: "'i ‚áí 'n" ("#‚á©V _" [1000] 900)
  and Extend :: "'k ‚áí nat ‚áí 'i ‚áí 'v ‚áí 'i"
  and CONS :: "'x ‚áí 'i ‚áí 'i"
  and SNOC :: "'x ‚áí 'i ‚áí 'i"
  and Length :: "'i ‚áí nat"

  (* Alphabet elements *)
  and extend :: "'k ‚áí bool ‚áí 'x ‚áí 'x"
  and size :: "'x ‚áí 'n"
  and zero :: "'n ‚áí 'x"
  and alphabet :: "'n ‚áí 'x list"

  (* Valuations *)
  and eval :: "'v ‚áí nat ‚áí bool"
  and downshift :: "'v ‚áí 'v"
  and upshift :: "'v ‚áí 'v"
  and add :: "nat ‚áí 'v ‚áí 'v"
  and cut :: "nat ‚áí 'v ‚áí 'v"
  and len :: "'v ‚áí nat"

  (* Restrictions *)
  and restrict :: "'k ‚áí 'v ‚áí bool"
  and Restrict :: "'k ‚áí nat ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula"

  (* Function extensions for the base cases *)
  and lformula0 :: "'a ‚áí bool"
  and FV0 :: "'k ‚áí 'a ‚áí nat set"
  and find0 :: "'k ‚áí nat ‚áí 'a ‚áí bool"
  and wf0 :: "'n ‚áí 'a ‚áí bool"
  and decr0 :: "'k ‚áí nat ‚áí 'a ‚áí 'a"
  and satisfies0 :: "'i ‚áí 'a ‚áí bool" (infix "‚ä®‚á©0" 50)
  and nullable0 :: "'a ‚áí bool"
  and lderiv0 :: "'x ‚áí 'a ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula"
  and rderiv0 :: "'x ‚áí 'a ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula"
begin

abbreviation "LEQ k l n ‚â° LESS k l (SUC k n)"

primrec FV where
  "FV (FBool _) k = {}"
| "FV (FBase a) k = FV0 k a"
| "FV (FNot œÜ) k = FV œÜ k"
| "FV (FOr œÜ œà) k = FV œÜ k ‚à™ FV œà k"
| "FV (FAnd œÜ œà) k = FV œÜ k ‚à™ FV œà k"
| "FV (FEx k' œÜ) k = (if k' = k then (Œªx. x - 1) ` (FV œÜ k - {0}) else FV œÜ k)"
| "FV (FAll k' œÜ) k = (if k' = k then (Œªx. x - 1) ` (FV œÜ k - {0}) else FV œÜ k)"

primrec find where
  "find k l (FBool _) = False"
| "find k l (FBase a) = find0 k l a"
| "find k l (FNot œÜ) = find k l œÜ"
| "find k l (FOr œÜ œà) = (find k l œÜ ‚à® find k l œà)"
| "find k l (FAnd œÜ œà) = (find k l œÜ ‚à® find k l œà)"
| "find k l (FEx k' œÜ) = find k (if k = k' then Suc l else l) œÜ"
| "find k l (FAll k' œÜ) = find k (if k = k' then Suc l else l) œÜ"

primrec wf :: "'n ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí bool" where
  "wf n (FBool _) = True"
| "wf n (FBase a) = wf0 n a"
| "wf n (FNot œÜ) = wf n œÜ"
| "wf n (FOr œÜ œà) = (wf n œÜ ‚àß wf n œà)"
| "wf n (FAnd œÜ œà) = (wf n œÜ ‚àß wf n œà)"
| "wf n (FEx k œÜ) = wf (SUC k n) œÜ"
| "wf n (FAll k œÜ) = wf (SUC k n) œÜ"

primrec lformula :: "('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí bool" where
  "lformula (FBool _) = True"
| "lformula (FBase a) = lformula0 a"
| "lformula (FNot œÜ) = lformula œÜ"
| "lformula (FOr œÜ œà) = (lformula œÜ ‚àß lformula œà)"
| "lformula (FAnd œÜ œà) = (lformula œÜ ‚àß lformula œà)"
| "lformula (FEx k œÜ) = lformula œÜ"
| "lformula (FAll k œÜ) = lformula œÜ"

primrec decr :: "'k ‚áí nat ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "decr k l (FBool b) = FBool b"
| "decr k l (FBase a) = FBase (decr0 k l a)"
| "decr k l (FNot œÜ) = FNot (decr k l œÜ)"
| "decr k l (FOr œÜ œà) = FOr (decr k l œÜ) (decr k l œà)"
| "decr k l (FAnd œÜ œà) = FAnd (decr k l œÜ) (decr k l œà)"
| "decr k l (FEx k' œÜ) = FEx k' (decr k (if k = k' then Suc l else l) œÜ)"
| "decr k l (FAll k' œÜ) = FAll k' (decr k (if k = k' then Suc l else l) œÜ)"

primrec satisfies_gen :: "('k ‚áí 'v ‚áí nat ‚áí bool) ‚áí 'i ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí bool" where
  "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (FBool b) = b"
| "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (FBase a) = (ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 a)"
| "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (FNot œÜ) = (¬¨ satisfies_gen r ùîÑ œÜ)"
| "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (FOr œÜ‚á©1 œÜ‚á©2) = (satisfies_gen r ùîÑ œÜ‚á©1 ‚à® satisfies_gen r ùîÑ œÜ‚á©2)"
| "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (FAnd œÜ‚á©1 œÜ‚á©2) = (satisfies_gen r ùîÑ œÜ‚á©1 ‚àß satisfies_gen r ùîÑ œÜ‚á©2)"
| "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (FEx k œÜ) = (‚àÉP. r k P (Length ùîÑ) ‚àß satisfies_gen r (Extend k 0 ùîÑ P) œÜ)"
| "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (FAll k œÜ) = (‚àÄP. r k P (Length ùîÑ) ‚ü∂ satisfies_gen r (Extend k 0 ùîÑ P) œÜ)"

abbreviation satisfies (infix "‚ä®" 50) where
  "ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ ‚â° satisfies_gen (Œª_ _ _. True) ùîÑ œÜ"

abbreviation satisfies_bounded (infix "‚ä®‚á©b" 50) where
  "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ ‚â° satisfies_gen (Œª_ P n. len P ‚â§ n) ùîÑ œÜ"

abbreviation sat_vars_gen where
  "sat_vars_gen r K ùîÑ œÜ ‚â°
    satisfies_gen (Œªk P n. restrict k P ‚àß r k P n) ùîÑ œÜ ‚àß (‚àÄk ‚àà K. ‚àÄx ‚àà FV œÜ k. restrict k (x‚áóùîÑ‚áñk))"

definition sat where
  "sat ùîÑ œÜ ‚â° sat_vars_gen (Œª_ _ _. True) UNIV ùîÑ œÜ"

definition sat‚á©b where
  "sat‚á©b ùîÑ œÜ ‚â° sat_vars_gen (Œª_ P n. len P ‚â§ n) UNIV ùîÑ œÜ"

fun RESTR where
  "RESTR (FOr œÜ œà) = FOr (RESTR œÜ) (RESTR œà)"
| "RESTR (FAnd œÜ œà) = FAnd (RESTR œÜ) (RESTR œà)"
| "RESTR (FNot œÜ) = FNot (RESTR œÜ)"
| "RESTR (FEx k œÜ) = FEx k (FAnd (Restrict k 0) (RESTR œÜ))"
| "RESTR (FAll k œÜ) = FAll k (FOr (FNot (Restrict k 0)) (RESTR œÜ))"
| "RESTR œÜ = œÜ"

abbreviation RESTRICT_VARS where
  "RESTRICT_VARS ks V œÜ ‚â°
     foldr (%k œÜ. foldr (Œªx œÜ. FAnd (Restrict k x) œÜ) (V k) œÜ) ks (RESTR œÜ)"

definition RESTRICT where
  "RESTRICT œÜ ‚â° RESTRICT_VARS Enum.enum (sorted_list_of_set o FV œÜ) œÜ"

primrec nullable :: "('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí bool" where
  "nullable (FBool b) = b"
| "nullable (FBase a) = nullable0 a"
| "nullable (FNot œÜ) = (¬¨ nullable œÜ)"
| "nullable (FOr œÜ œà) = (nullable œÜ ‚à® nullable œà)"
| "nullable (FAnd œÜ œà) = (nullable œÜ ‚àß nullable œà)"
| "nullable (FEx k œÜ) = nullable œÜ"
| "nullable (FAll k œÜ) = nullable œÜ"

fun nFOr :: "('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "nFOr (FBool b1) (FBool b2) = FBool (b1 ‚à® b2)"
| "nFOr (FBool b) œà = (if b then FBool True else œà)"
| "nFOr œÜ (FBool b) = (if b then FBool True else œÜ)"
| "nFOr (FOr œÜ1 œÜ2) œà = nFOr œÜ1 (nFOr œÜ2 œà)"
| "nFOr œÜ (FOr œà1 œà2) =
  (if œÜ = œà1 then FOr œà1 œà2
  else if œÜ < œà1 then FOr œÜ (FOr œà1 œà2)
  else FOr œà1 (nFOr œÜ œà2))"
| "nFOr œÜ œà =
  (if œÜ = œà then œÜ
  else if œÜ < œà then FOr œÜ œà
  else FOr œà œÜ)"

fun nFAnd :: "('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "nFAnd (FBool b1) (FBool b2) = FBool (b1 ‚àß b2)"
| "nFAnd (FBool b) œà = (if b then œà else FBool False)"
| "nFAnd œÜ (FBool b) = (if b then œÜ else FBool False)"
| "nFAnd (FAnd œÜ1 œÜ2) œà = nFAnd œÜ1 (nFAnd œÜ2 œà)"
| "nFAnd œÜ (FAnd œà1 œà2) =
  (if œÜ = œà1 then FAnd œà1 œà2
  else if œÜ < œà1 then FAnd œÜ (FAnd œà1 œà2)
  else FAnd œà1 (nFAnd œÜ œà2))"
| "nFAnd œÜ œà =
  (if œÜ = œà then œÜ
  else if œÜ < œà then FAnd œÜ œà
  else FAnd œà œÜ)"

fun nFEx :: "'k ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "nFEx k (FOr œÜ œà) = nFOr (nFEx k œÜ) (nFEx k œà)"
| "nFEx k œÜ = (if find k 0 œÜ then FEx k œÜ else decr k 0 œÜ)"

fun nFAll where
  "nFAll k (FAnd œÜ œà) = nFAnd (nFAll k œÜ) (nFAll k œà)"
| "nFAll k œÜ = (if find k 0 œÜ then FAll k œÜ else decr k 0 œÜ)"

fun nFNot :: "('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "nFNot (FNot œÜ) = œÜ"
| "nFNot (FOr œÜ œà) = nFAnd (nFNot œÜ) (nFNot œà)"
| "nFNot (FAnd œÜ œà) = nFOr (nFNot œÜ) (nFNot œà)"
| "nFNot (FEx b œÜ) = nFAll b (nFNot œÜ)"
| "nFNot (FAll b œÜ) = nFEx b (nFNot œÜ)"
| "nFNot (FBool b) = FBool (¬¨ b)"
| "nFNot œÜ = FNot œÜ"

fun norm where
  "norm (FOr œÜ œà) = nFOr (norm œÜ) (norm œà)"
| "norm (FAnd œÜ œà) = nFAnd (norm œÜ) (norm œà)"
| "norm (FNot œÜ) = nFNot (norm œÜ)"
| "norm (FEx k œÜ) = nFEx k (norm œÜ)"
| "norm (FAll k œÜ) = nFAll k (norm œÜ)"
| "norm œÜ = œÜ"

context
fixes deriv0 :: "'x ‚áí 'a ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula"
begin

primrec deriv :: "'x ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "deriv x (FBool b) = FBool b"
| "deriv x (FBase a) = deriv0 x a"
| "deriv x (FNot œÜ) = FNot (deriv x œÜ)"
| "deriv x (FOr œÜ œà) = FOr (deriv x œÜ) (deriv x œà)"
| "deriv x (FAnd œÜ œà) = FAnd (deriv x œÜ) (deriv x œà)"
| "deriv x (FEx k œÜ) = FEx k (FOr (deriv (extend k True x) œÜ) (deriv (extend k False x) œÜ))"
| "deriv x (FAll k œÜ) = FAll k (FAnd (deriv (extend k True x) œÜ) (deriv (extend k False x) œÜ))"

end

abbreviation "lderiv ‚â° deriv lderiv0"
abbreviation "rderiv ‚â° deriv rderiv0"

lemma fold_deriv_FBool: "fold (deriv d0) xs (FBool b) = FBool b"
  by (induct xs) auto

lemma fold_deriv_FNot:
  "fold (deriv d0) xs (FNot œÜ) = FNot (fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ)"
  by (induct xs arbitrary: œÜ) auto

lemma fold_deriv_FOr:
  "fold (deriv d0) xs (FOr œÜ œà) = FOr (fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ) (fold (deriv d0) xs œà)"
  by (induct xs arbitrary: œÜ œà) auto

lemma fold_deriv_FAnd:
  "fold (deriv d0) xs (FAnd œÜ œà) = FAnd (fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ) (fold (deriv d0) xs œà)"
  by (induct xs arbitrary: œÜ œà) auto

lemma fold_deriv_FEx:
  "{‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs (FEx k œÜ)‚ü© | xs. True} ‚äÜ
    {FEx k œà | œà. nf_ACI œà ‚àß disjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. disjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)}"
proof -
  { fix xs
    have "‚àÉœà. ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs (FEx k œÜ)‚ü© = FEx k œà ‚àß
      nf_ACI œà ‚àß disjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. disjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)"
    proof (induct xs arbitrary: œÜ)
      case (Cons x xs)
      let ?œÜ = "FOr (deriv d0 (extend k True x) œÜ) (deriv d0 (extend k False x) œÜ)"
      from Cons[of ?œÜ] obtain œà where "‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs (FEx k ?œÜ)‚ü© = FEx k œà"
        "nf_ACI œà" and *: "disjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. disjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs ?œÜ‚ü©)" by blast+
      then show ?case
      proof (intro exI conjI)
        have "(‚ãÉxs. disjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs ?œÜ‚ü©) ‚äÜ
          (‚ãÉxs. disjuncts ‚ü®fold (Formula_Operations.deriv extend d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)"
        by (force simp: fold_deriv_FOr nf_ACI_juncts nf_ACI_norm_ACI
          dest: notin_juncts subsetD[OF equalityD1[OF disjuncts_NFOR], rotated -1]
          intro: exI[of _ "extend k b x # xs" for b xs])
        with * show "disjuncts œà ‚äÜ ‚Ä¶" by blast
      qed simp_all
    qed (auto simp: nf_ACI_norm_ACI intro!: exI[of _ "[]"])
  }
  then show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma fold_deriv_FAll:
  "{‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs (FAll k œÜ)‚ü© | xs. True} ‚äÜ
    {FAll k œà | œà. nf_ACI œà ‚àß conjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. conjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)}"
proof -
  { fix xs
    have "‚àÉœà. ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs (FAll k œÜ)‚ü© = FAll k œà ‚àß
      nf_ACI œà ‚àß conjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. conjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)"
    proof (induct xs arbitrary: œÜ)
      case (Cons x xs)
      let ?œÜ = "FAnd (deriv d0 (extend k True x) œÜ) (deriv d0 (extend k False x) œÜ)"
      from Cons[of ?œÜ] obtain œà where "‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs (FAll k ?œÜ)‚ü© = FAll k œà"
        "nf_ACI œà" and *: "conjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. conjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs ?œÜ‚ü©)" by blast+
      then show ?case
      proof (intro exI conjI)
        have "(‚ãÉxs. conjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs ?œÜ‚ü©) ‚äÜ
          (‚ãÉxs. conjuncts ‚ü®fold (Formula_Operations.deriv extend d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)"
        by (force simp: fold_deriv_FAnd nf_ACI_juncts nf_ACI_norm_ACI
          dest: notin_juncts subsetD[OF equalityD1[OF conjuncts_NFAND], rotated -1]
          intro: exI[of _ "extend k b x # xs" for b xs])
        with * show "conjuncts œà ‚äÜ ‚Ä¶" by blast
      qed simp_all
    qed (auto simp: nf_ACI_norm_ACI intro!: exI[of _ "[]"])
  }
  then show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma finite_norm_ACI_juncts:
  fixes f :: "('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula"
  shows "finite B ‚üπ finite {f œÜ | œÜ. nf_ACI œÜ ‚àß disjuncts œÜ ‚äÜ B}"
        "finite B ‚üπ finite {f œÜ | œÜ. nf_ACI œÜ ‚àß conjuncts œÜ ‚äÜ B}"
  by (elim finite_surj[OF iffD2[OF finite_Pow_iff], of _ _ "f o NFOR o image norm_ACI"]
    finite_surj[OF iffD2[OF finite_Pow_iff], of _ _ "f o NFAND o image norm_ACI"],
    force simp: Pow_def image_Collect intro: arg_cong[OF norm_ACI_NFOR] arg_cong[OF norm_ACI_NFAND])+

end

locale Formula = Formula_Operations
  where TYPEVARS = TYPEVARS
  for TYPEVARS :: "'a :: linorder √ó 'i √ó 'k :: {linorder, enum} √ó 'n √ó 'x √ó 'v" +
  (* De Bruijn indices abstractly *)
  assumes SUC_SUC: "SUC k (SUC k' idx) = SUC k' (SUC k idx)"
  and LEQ_0: "LEQ k 0 idx"
  and LESS_SUC: "LEQ k (Suc l) idx = LESS k l idx"
    "k ‚â† k' ‚üπ LESS k l (SUC k' idx) = LESS k l idx"

  (* Interpretations *)
  and nvars_Extend: "#‚á©V (Extend k i ùîÑ P) = SUC k (#‚á©V ùîÑ)"
  and Length_Extend: "Length (Extend k i ùîÑ P) = max (Length ùîÑ) (len P)"
  and Length_0_inj: "‚ü¶Length ùîÑ = 0; Length ùîÖ = 0; #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ = ùîÖ"
  and ex_Length_0: "‚àÉùîÑ. Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx"
  and Extend_commute_safe: "‚ü¶j ‚â§ i; LEQ k i (#‚á©V ùîÑ)‚üß ‚üπ
      Extend k j (Extend k i ùîÑ P) Q = Extend k (Suc i) (Extend k j ùîÑ Q) P"
  and Extend_commute_unsafe: "k ‚â† k' ‚üπ
      Extend k j (Extend k' i ùîÑ P) Q = Extend k' i (Extend k j ùîÑ Q) P"
  and assigns_Extend:  "LEQ k i (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ
    m‚áóExtend k i ùîÑ P‚áñk' = (if k = k' then (if m = i then P else dec i m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk) else m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk')"
  and assigns_SNOC_zero: "LESS k m (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ m‚áóSNOC (zero (#‚á©V ùîÑ)) ùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk"
  and Length_CONS: "Length (CONS x ùîÑ) = Length ùîÑ + 1"
  and Length_SNOC: "Length (SNOC x ùîÑ) = Suc (Length ùîÑ)"
  and nvars_CONS: "#‚á©V (CONS x ùîÑ) = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  and nvars_SNOC: "#‚á©V (SNOC x ùîÑ) = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  and Extend_CONS: "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size x ‚üπ Extend k 0 (CONS x ùîÑ) P =
      CONS (extend k (if eval P 0 then True else False) x) (Extend k 0 ùîÑ (downshift P))"
  and Extend_SNOC_cut: "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size x ‚üπ len P ‚â§ Length (SNOC x ùîÑ) ‚üπ
    Extend k 0 (SNOC x ùîÑ) P =
    SNOC (extend k (if eval P (Length ùîÑ) then True else False) x) (Extend k 0 ùîÑ (cut (Length ùîÑ) P))"
  and CONS_inj: "size x = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚üπ size y = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚üπ #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ ‚üπ
    CONS x ùîÑ = CONS y ùîÖ ‚ü∑ (x = y ‚àß ùîÑ = ùîÖ)"
  and CONS_surj: "Length ùîÑ ‚â† 0 ‚üπ #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx ‚üπ
    ‚àÉx ùîÖ. ùîÑ = CONS x ùîÖ ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÖ = idx ‚àß size x = idx"

  (* Alphabet elements *)
  and size_zero: "size (zero idx) = idx"
  and size_extend: "size (extend k b x) = SUC k (size x)"
  and distinct_alphabet: "distinct (alphabet idx)"
  and alphabet_size: "x ‚àà set (alphabet idx) ‚ü∑ size x = idx"

  (* Valuations *)
  and downshift_upshift: "downshift (upshift P) = P"
  and downshift_add_zero: "downshift (add 0 P) = downshift P"
  and eval_add: "eval (add n P) n"
  and eval_upshift: "¬¨ eval (upshift P) 0"
  and eval_ge_len: "p ‚â• len P ‚üπ ¬¨ eval P p"
  and len_cut_le: "len (cut n P) ‚â§ n"
  and len_cut: "len P ‚â§ n ‚üπ cut n P = P"
  and cut_add: "cut n (add m P) = (if m ‚â• n then cut n P else add m (cut n P))"
  and len_add: "len (add m P) = max (Suc m) (len P)"
  and len_upshift: "len (upshift P) = (case len P of 0 ‚áí 0 | n ‚áí Suc n)"
  and len_downshift: "len (downshift P) = (case len P of 0 ‚áí 0 | Suc n ‚áí n)"

  (* Function extensions for the base cases *)
  and wf0_decr0: "‚ü¶wf0 (SUC k idx) a; LESS k l (SUC k idx); ¬¨ find0 k l a‚üß ‚üπ wf0 idx (decr0 k l a)"
  and lformula0_decr0: "lformula0 œÜ ‚üπ lformula0 (decr0 k l œÜ)"
  and Extend_satisfies0: "‚ü¶¬¨ find0 k i a; LESS k i (SUC k (#‚á©V ùîÑ)); lformula0 a ‚à® len P ‚â§ Length ùîÑ‚üß ‚üπ
      Extend k i ùîÑ P ‚ä®‚á©0 a ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 decr0 k i a"
  and nullable0_satisfies0: "Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚üπ nullable0 a ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 a"
  and satisfies0_eqI: "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÖ) a ‚üπ #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ ‚üπ lformula0 a ‚üπ
    (‚ãÄm k. LESS k m (#‚á©V ùîÖ) ‚üπ m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÖ‚áñk) ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 a ‚ü∑ ùîÖ ‚ä®‚á©0 a"
  and wf_lderiv0: "‚ü¶wf0 idx a; lformula0 a‚üß ‚üπ wf idx (lderiv0 x a)"
  and lformula_lderiv0: "lformula0 a ‚üπ lformula (lderiv0 x a)"
  and wf_rderiv0: "wf0 idx a ‚üπ wf idx (rderiv0 x a)"
  and satisfies_lderiv0:
    "‚ü¶wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a; #‚á©V ùîÑ = size x; lformula0 a‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä® lderiv0 x a ‚ü∑ CONS x ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 a"
  and satisfies_bounded_lderiv0:
    "‚ü¶wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a; #‚á©V ùîÑ = size x; lformula0 a‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b lderiv0 x a ‚ü∑ CONS x ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 a"
  and satisfies_bounded_rderiv0:
    "‚ü¶wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a; #‚á©V ùîÑ = size x‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b rderiv0 x a ‚ü∑ SNOC x ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 a"
  and find0_FV0: "‚ü¶wf0 idx a; LESS k l idx‚üß ‚üπ find0 k l a ‚ü∑ l ‚àà FV0 k a"
  and finite_FV0: "finite (FV0 k a)"
  and wf0_FV0_LESS: "‚ü¶wf0 idx a; v ‚àà FV0 k a‚üß ‚üπ LESS k v idx"
  and restrict_Restrict: "i‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = P ‚üπ restrict k P ‚ü∑ satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (Restrict k i)"
  and wf_Restrict: "LESS k i idx ‚üπ wf idx (Restrict k i)"
  and lformula_Restrict: "lformula (Restrict k i)"
  and finite_lderiv0: "lformula0 a ‚üπ finite {fold lderiv xs (FBase a) | xs. True}"
  and finite_rderiv0: "finite {fold rderiv xs (FBase a) | xs. True}"

context Formula
begin

lemma satisfies_eqI:
  "‚ü¶wf (#‚á©V ùîÑ) œÜ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ; ‚ãÄm k. LESS k m (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÖ‚áñk; lformula œÜ‚üß ‚üπ
   ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÖ ‚ä® œÜ"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ ùîÖ)
  case (FEx k œÜ)
  from FEx.prems have "‚ãÄP. (Extend k 0 ùîÑ P ‚ä® œÜ) ‚ü∑ (Extend k 0 ùîÖ P ‚ä® œÜ)"
    by (intro FEx.hyps) (auto simp: nvars_Extend assigns_Extend dec_def gr0_conv_Suc LEQ_0 LESS_SUC)
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (FAll k œÜ)
  from FAll.prems have "‚ãÄP. (Extend k 0 ùîÑ P ‚ä® œÜ) ‚ü∑ (Extend k 0 ùîÖ P ‚ä® œÜ)"
    by (intro FAll.hyps) (auto simp: nvars_Extend assigns_Extend dec_def gr0_conv_Suc LEQ_0 LESS_SUC)
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (FNot œÜ)
  from FNot.prems have "(ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ) ‚ü∑ (ùîÖ ‚ä® œÜ)" by (intro FNot.hyps) simp_all
  then show ?case by simp
qed (auto dest: satisfies0_eqI)

lemma wf_decr:
  "‚ü¶wf (SUC k idx) œÜ; LEQ k l idx; ¬¨ find k l œÜ‚üß ‚üπ wf idx (decr k l œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx l) (auto simp: wf0_decr0 LESS_SUC SUC_SUC)

lemma lformula_decr:
  "lformula œÜ ‚üπ lformula (decr k l œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: l) (auto simp: lformula0_decr0)

lemma Extend_satisfies_decr:
  "‚ü¶¬¨ find k i œÜ; LEQ k i (#‚á©V ùîÑ); lformula œÜ‚üß ‚üπ Extend k i ùîÑ P ‚ä® œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® decr k i œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: i ùîÑ)
    (auto simp: Extend_commute_unsafe[of _ k 0 _ _ P] Extend_commute_safe
      Extend_satisfies0 nvars_Extend LESS_SUC SUC_SUC split: bool.splits)

lemma LEQ_SUC: "k ‚â† k' ‚üπ LEQ k i (SUC k' idx) = LEQ k i idx"
  by (metis LESS_SUC(2) SUC_SUC)

lemma Extend_satisfies_bounded_decr:
  "‚ü¶¬¨ find k i œÜ; LEQ k i (#‚á©V ùîÑ); len P ‚â§ Length ùîÑ‚üß ‚üπ
   Extend k i ùîÑ P ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b decr k i œÜ"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: i ùîÑ P)
  case (FEx k' œÜ)
  show ?case
  proof (cases "k = k'")
    case True
    with FEx(2,3,4) show ?thesis
      using FEx(1)[of "Suc i" "Extend k' 0 ùîÑ Q" P for Q j]
      by (auto simp: Extend_commute_safe LESS_SUC Length_Extend nvars_Extend max_def)
  next
    case False
    with FEx(2,3,4) show ?thesis
      using FEx(1)[of "i" "Extend k' j ùîÑ Q" P for Q j]
      by (auto simp: Extend_commute_unsafe LEQ_SUC Length_Extend nvars_Extend max_def)
  qed
next
  case (FAll k' œÜ)  show ?case
  proof (cases "k = k'")
    case True
    with FAll(2,3,4) show ?thesis
      using FAll(1)[of "Suc i" "Extend k' 0 ùîÑ Q" P for Q j]
      by (auto simp: Extend_commute_safe LESS_SUC Length_Extend nvars_Extend max_def)
  next
    case False
    with FAll(2,3,4) show ?thesis
      using FAll(1)[of "i" "Extend k' j ùîÑ Q" P for Q j]
      by (auto simp: Extend_commute_unsafe LEQ_SUC Length_Extend nvars_Extend max_def)
  qed
qed (auto simp: Extend_satisfies0 split: bool.splits)


subsection ‚ÄπNormalization‚Ä∫

lemma wf_nFOr:
  "wf idx (FOr œÜ œà) ‚üπ wf idx (nFOr œÜ œà)"
  by (induct œÜ œà rule: nFOr.induct) (simp_all add: Let_def)

lemma wf_nFAnd:
  "wf idx (FAnd œÜ œà) ‚üπ wf idx (nFAnd œÜ œà)"
  by (induct œÜ œà rule: nFAnd.induct) (simp_all add: Let_def)

lemma wf_nFEx:
  "wf idx (FEx b œÜ) ‚üπ wf idx (nFEx b œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx rule: nFEx.induct)
    (auto simp: SUC_SUC LEQ_0 LESS_SUC(1) gr0_conv_Suc wf_nFOr intro: wf0_decr0 wf_decr)

lemma wf_nFAll:
  "wf idx (FAll b œÜ) ‚üπ wf idx (nFAll b œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx rule: nFAll.induct)
    (auto simp: SUC_SUC LEQ_0 LESS_SUC(1) gr0_conv_Suc wf_nFAnd intro: wf0_decr0 wf_decr)

lemma wf_nFNot:
  "wf idx (FNot œÜ) ‚üπ wf idx (nFNot œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx rule: nFNot.induct) (auto simp: wf_nFOr wf_nFAnd wf_nFEx wf_nFAll)

lemma wf_norm: "wf idx œÜ ‚üπ wf idx (norm œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx) (simp_all add: wf_nFOr wf_nFAnd wf_nFNot wf_nFEx wf_nFAll)

lemma lformula_nFOr:
  "lformula (FOr œÜ œà) ‚üπ lformula (nFOr œÜ œà)"
  by (induct œÜ œà rule: nFOr.induct) (simp_all add: Let_def)

lemma lformula_nFAnd:
  "lformula (FAnd œÜ œà) ‚üπ lformula (nFAnd œÜ œà)"
  by (induct œÜ œà rule: nFAnd.induct) (simp_all add: Let_def)

lemma lformula_nFEx:
  "lformula (FEx b œÜ) ‚üπ lformula (nFEx b œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ rule: nFEx.induct)
    (auto simp: lformula_nFOr lformula0_decr0 lformula_decr)

lemma lformula_nFAll:
  "lformula (FAll b œÜ) ‚üπ lformula (nFAll b œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ rule: nFAll.induct)
    (auto simp: lformula_nFAnd lformula0_decr0 lformula_decr)

lemma lformula_nFNot:
  "lformula (FNot œÜ) ‚üπ lformula (nFNot œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ rule: nFNot.induct) (auto simp: lformula_nFOr lformula_nFAnd lformula_nFEx lformula_nFAll)

lemma lformula_norm: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ lformula (norm œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ) (simp_all add: lformula_nFOr lformula_nFAnd lformula_nFNot
    lformula_nFEx lformula_nFAll)

lemma satisfies_nFOr:
  "ùîÑ ‚ä® nFOr œÜ œà ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® FOr œÜ œà"
  by (induct œÜ œà arbitrary: ùîÑ rule: nFOr.induct) auto

lemma satisfies_nFAnd:
  "ùîÑ ‚ä® nFAnd œÜ œà ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® FAnd œÜ œà"
  by (induct œÜ œà arbitrary: ùîÑ rule: nFAnd.induct) auto

lemma satisfies_nFEx: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä® nFEx b œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® FEx b œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ rule: nFEx.induct)
    (auto simp add: satisfies_nFOr Extend_satisfies_decr
      LEQ_0 LESS_SUC(1) nvars_Extend Extend_satisfies0 Extend_commute_safe Extend_commute_unsafe)

lemma satisfies_nFAll: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä® nFAll b œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® FAll b œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ rule: nFAll.induct)
    (auto simp add: satisfies_nFAnd Extend_satisfies_decr
      Extend_satisfies0 LEQ_0 LESS_SUC(1) nvars_Extend Extend_commute_safe Extend_commute_unsafe)

lemma satisfies_nFNot:
  "lformula œÜ ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä® nFNot œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® FNot œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ)
    (simp_all add: satisfies_nFOr satisfies_nFAnd satisfies_nFEx satisfies_nFAll
    lformula_nFNot)

lemma satisfies_norm: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä® norm œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ"
  using satisfies_nFOr satisfies_nFAnd satisfies_nFNot satisfies_nFEx satisfies_nFAll
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ) (simp_all add: lformula_norm)

lemma satisfies_bounded_nFOr:
  "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b nFOr œÜ œà ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b FOr œÜ œà"
  by (induct œÜ œà arbitrary: ùîÑ rule: nFOr.induct) auto

lemma satisfies_bounded_nFAnd:
  "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b nFAnd œÜ œà ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b FAnd œÜ œà"
  by (induct œÜ œà arbitrary: ùîÑ rule: nFAnd.induct) auto

lemma len_cut_0: "len (cut 0 P) = 0"
  by (metis le_0_eq len_cut_le)

lemma satisfies_bounded_nFEx: "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b nFEx b œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b FEx b œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ rule: nFEx.induct)
    (auto 4 4 simp add: satisfies_bounded_nFOr Extend_satisfies_bounded_decr
      LEQ_0 LESS_SUC(1) nvars_Extend Length_Extend len_cut_0
      Extend_satisfies0 Extend_commute_safe Extend_commute_unsafe cong: ex_cong split: bool.splits
      intro: exI[where P = "Œªx. P x ‚àß Q x" for P Q, OF conjI[rotated]] exI[of _ "cut 0 P" for P])

lemma satisfies_bounded_nFAll: "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b nFAll b œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b FAll b œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ rule: nFAll.induct)
    (auto 4 4 simp add: satisfies_bounded_nFAnd Extend_satisfies_bounded_decr
      LEQ_0 LESS_SUC(1) nvars_Extend Length_Extend len_cut_0
      Extend_satisfies0 Extend_commute_safe Extend_commute_unsafe cong: split: bool.splits
      intro: exI[where P = "Œªx. P x ‚àß Q x" for P Q, OF conjI[rotated]] dest: spec[of _ "cut 0 P" for P])

lemma satisfies_bounded_nFNot:
  "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b nFNot œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b FNot œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ)
    (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_nFOr satisfies_bounded_nFAnd satisfies_bounded_nFEx satisfies_bounded_nFAll)

lemma satisfies_bounded_norm: "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b norm œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ)
    (simp_all add: satisfies_bounded_nFOr satisfies_bounded_nFAnd
      satisfies_bounded_nFNot satisfies_bounded_nFEx satisfies_bounded_nFAll)


subsection ‚ÄπDerivatives of Formulas‚Ä∫

lemma wf_lderiv:
  "‚ü¶wf idx œÜ; lformula œÜ‚üß ‚üπ wf idx (lderiv x œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: x idx) (auto simp: wf_lderiv0)

lemma lformula_lderiv:
  "lformula œÜ ‚üπ lformula (lderiv x œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: x) (auto simp: lformula_lderiv0)

lemma wf_rderiv:
  "wf idx œÜ ‚üπ wf idx (rderiv x œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: x idx) (auto simp: wf_rderiv0)

theorem satisfies_lderiv:
  "‚ü¶wf (#‚á©V ùîÑ) œÜ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = size x; lformula œÜ‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä® lderiv x œÜ ‚ü∑ CONS x ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: x ùîÑ)
  case (FEx k œÜ)
  from FEx.prems FEx.hyps[of "Extend k 0 ùîÑ P" "extend k b x" for P b] show ?case
    by (auto simp: nvars_Extend size_extend Extend_CONS
      downshift_upshift eval_add eval_upshift downshift_add_zero
      intro: exI[of _ "add 0 (upshift P)" for P] exI[of _ "upshift P" for P])
next
  case (FAll k œÜ)
  from FAll.prems FAll.hyps[of "Extend k 0 ùîÑ P" "extend k b x" for P b] show ?case
    by (auto simp: nvars_Extend size_extend Extend_CONS
      downshift_upshift eval_add eval_upshift downshift_add_zero
      dest: spec[of _ "add 0 (upshift P)" for P] spec[of _ "upshift P" for P])
qed (simp_all add: satisfies_lderiv0 split: bool.splits)

theorem satisfies_bounded_lderiv:
  "‚ü¶wf (#‚á©V ùîÑ) œÜ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = size x; lformula œÜ‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b lderiv x œÜ ‚ü∑ CONS x ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: x ùîÑ)
  case (FEx k œÜ)
  note [simp] = nvars_Extend size_extend Extend_CONS Length_CONS
    downshift_upshift eval_add eval_upshift downshift_add_zero len_add len_upshift len_downshift
  from FEx.prems FEx.hyps[of "Extend k 0 ùîÑ P" "extend k b x" for P b] show ?case
    by auto (force intro: exI[of _ "add 0 (upshift P)" for P] exI[of _ "upshift P" for P] split: nat.splits)+
next
  case (FAll k œÜ)
  note [simp] = nvars_Extend size_extend Extend_CONS Length_CONS
    downshift_upshift eval_add eval_upshift downshift_add_zero len_add len_upshift len_downshift
  from FAll.prems FAll.hyps[of "Extend k 0 ùîÑ P" "extend k b x" for P b] show ?case
    by auto (force dest: spec[of _ "add 0 (upshift P)" for P] spec[of _ "upshift P" for P] split: nat.splits)+
qed (simp_all add: satisfies_bounded_lderiv0 split: bool.splits)

theorem satisfies_bounded_rderiv:
  "‚ü¶wf (#‚á©V ùîÑ) œÜ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = size x‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b rderiv x œÜ ‚ü∑ SNOC x ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: x ùîÑ)
  case (FEx k œÜ)
  from FEx.prems FEx.hyps[of "Extend k 0 ùîÑ P" "extend k b x" for P b] show ?case
    by (auto simp: nvars_Extend size_extend Extend_SNOC_cut len_cut_le eval_ge_len 
      eval_add cut_add Length_SNOC len_add len_cut le_Suc_eq max_def
      intro: exI[of _ "cut (Length ùîÑ) P" for P] exI[of _ "add (Length ùîÑ) P" for P] split: if_splits)
next
  case (FAll k œÜ)
  from FAll.prems FAll.hyps[of "Extend k 0 ùîÑ P" "extend k b x" for P b] show ?case
    by (auto simp: nvars_Extend size_extend Extend_SNOC_cut len_cut_le eval_ge_len 
      eval_add cut_add Length_SNOC len_add len_cut le_Suc_eq max_def
      dest: spec[of _ "cut (Length ùîÑ) P" for P] spec[of _ "add (Length ùîÑ) P" for P] split: if_splits)
qed (simp_all add: satisfies_bounded_rderiv0 split: bool.splits)

lemma wf_norm_rderivs: "wf idx œÜ ‚üπ wf idx (((norm ‚àò rderiv (zero idx)) ^^ k) œÜ)"
  by (induct k) (auto simp: wf_norm wf_rderiv)

subsection ‚ÄπFiniteness of Derivatives Modulo ACI‚Ä∫

lemma finite_fold_deriv:
  assumes "(d0 = lderiv0 ‚àß lformula œÜ) ‚à® d0 = rderiv0"
  shows "finite {‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü© | xs. True}"
using assms proof (induct œÜ)
  case (FBase a) then show ?case
    by (auto intro:
      finite_subset[OF _ finite_imageI[OF finite_lderiv0]]
      finite_subset[OF _ finite_imageI[OF finite_rderiv0]])
next
  case (FNot œÜ)
  then show ?case
    by (auto simp: fold_deriv_FNot intro!: finite_surj[OF FNot(1)])
next
  case (FOr œÜ œà)
  then show ?case
    by (auto simp: fold_deriv_FOr intro!: finite_surj[OF finite_cartesian_product[OF FOr(1,2)]])
next
  case (FAnd œÜ œà)
  then show ?case
    by (auto simp: fold_deriv_FAnd intro!: finite_surj[OF finite_cartesian_product[OF FAnd(1,2)]])
next
  case (FEx k œÜ)
  then have "finite (‚ãÉ (disjuncts ` {‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü© | xs . True}))" by auto
  then have "finite (‚ãÉxs. disjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)" by (rule finite_subset[rotated]) auto
  then have "finite {FEx k œà | œà. nf_ACI œà ‚àß disjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. disjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)}"
    by (rule finite_norm_ACI_juncts)
  then show ?case by (rule finite_subset[OF fold_deriv_FEx])
next
  case (FAll k œÜ)
  then have "finite (‚ãÉ (conjuncts ` {‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü© | xs . True}))" by auto
  then have "finite (‚ãÉxs. conjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)" by (rule finite_subset[rotated]) auto
  then have "finite {FAll k œà | œà. nf_ACI œà ‚àß conjuncts œà ‚äÜ (‚ãÉxs. conjuncts ‚ü®fold (deriv d0) xs œÜ‚ü©)}"
    by (rule finite_norm_ACI_juncts)
  then show ?case  by (rule finite_subset[OF fold_deriv_FAll])
qed (simp add: fold_deriv_FBool)

lemma lformula_nFOR: "lformula (nFOR œÜs) = (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set œÜs. lformula œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜs rule: nFOR.induct) auto

lemma lformula_nFAND: "lformula (nFAND œÜs) = (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set œÜs. lformula œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜs rule: nFAND.induct) auto

lemma lformula_NFOR: "finite Œ¶ ‚üπ lformula (NFOR Œ¶) = (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà Œ¶. lformula œÜ)"
  unfolding NFOR_def o_apply lformula_nFOR by simp

lemma lformula_NFAND: "finite Œ¶ ‚üπ lformula (NFAND Œ¶) = (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà Œ¶. lformula œÜ)"
  unfolding NFAND_def o_apply lformula_nFAND by simp

lemma lformula_disjuncts: "(‚àÄœà ‚àà disjuncts œÜ. lformula œà) = lformula œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ rule: disjuncts.induct) fastforce+

lemma lformula_conjuncts: "(‚àÄœà ‚àà conjuncts œÜ. lformula œà) = lformula œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ rule: conjuncts.induct) fastforce+

lemma lformula_norm_ACI: "lformula ‚ü®œÜ‚ü© = lformula œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ) (simp_all add: ball_Un
    lformula_NFOR lformula_disjuncts lformula_NFAND lformula_conjuncts)

theorem
  finite_fold_lderiv: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ finite {‚ü®fold lderiv xs ‚ü®œÜ‚ü©‚ü© | xs. True}" and
  finite_fold_rderiv: "finite {‚ü®fold rderiv xs ‚ü®œÜ‚ü©‚ü© | xs. True}"
  by (subst (asm) lformula_norm_ACI[symmetric]) (blast intro: nf_ACI_norm_ACI finite_fold_deriv)+

lemma wf_nFOR: "wf idx (nFOR œÜs) ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set œÜs. wf idx œÜ)"
  by (induct rule: nFOR.induct) auto

lemma wf_nFAND: "wf idx (nFAND œÜs) ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set œÜs. wf idx œÜ)"
  by (induct rule: nFAND.induct) auto

lemma wf_NFOR: "finite Œ¶ ‚üπ wf idx (NFOR Œ¶) ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà Œ¶. wf idx œÜ)"
  unfolding NFOR_def o_apply by (auto simp: wf_nFOR)

lemma wf_NFAND: "finite Œ¶ ‚üπ wf idx (NFAND Œ¶) ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà Œ¶. wf idx œÜ)"
  unfolding NFAND_def o_apply by (auto simp: wf_nFAND)

lemma satisfies_bounded_nFOR: "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b nFOR œÜs ‚ü∑ (‚àÉœÜ ‚àà set œÜs. ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ)"
  by (induct rule: nFOR.induct) (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_nFOr)

lemma satisfies_bounded_nFAND: "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b nFAND œÜs ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set œÜs. ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ)"
  by (induct rule: nFAND.induct) (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_nFAnd)

lemma satisfies_bounded_NFOR: "finite Œ¶ ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b NFOR Œ¶ ‚ü∑ (‚àÉœÜ ‚àà Œ¶. ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ)"
  unfolding NFOR_def o_apply by (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_nFOR)

lemma satisfies_bounded_NFAND: "finite Œ¶ ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b NFAND Œ¶ ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà Œ¶. ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ)"
  unfolding NFAND_def o_apply by (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_nFAND)

lemma wf_juncts:
  "wf idx œÜ ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœà ‚àà disjuncts œÜ. wf idx œà)"
  "wf idx œÜ ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœà ‚àà conjuncts œÜ. wf idx œà)"
  by (induct œÜ) auto

lemma wf_norm_ACI: "wf idx ‚ü®œÜ‚ü© = wf idx œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx) (auto simp: wf_NFOR wf_NFAND ball_Un wf_juncts[symmetric])

lemma satisfies_bounded_disjuncts:
  "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ ‚ü∑ (‚àÉœà ‚àà disjuncts œÜ. ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œà)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ) auto

lemma satisfies_bounded_conjuncts:
  "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœà ‚àà conjuncts œÜ. ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œà)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ) auto

lemma satisfies_bounded_norm_ACI: "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b ‚ü®œÜ‚ü© ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ"
  by (rule sym, induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ)
    (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_NFOR satisfies_bounded_NFAND
      intro: iffD2[OF satisfies_bounded_disjuncts] iffD2[OF satisfies_bounded_conjuncts]
      dest: iffD1[OF satisfies_bounded_disjuncts] iffD1[OF satisfies_bounded_conjuncts])

lemma nvars_SNOCs: "#‚á©V ((SNOC x^^k) ùîÑ) = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  by (induct k) (auto simp: nvars_SNOC)

lemma wf_fold_rderiv: "wf idx œÜ ‚üπ wf idx (fold rderiv (replicate k x) œÜ)"
  by (induct k arbitrary: œÜ) (auto simp: wf_rderiv)

lemma satisfies_bounded_fold_rderiv:
  "‚ü¶wf idx œÜ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; size x = idx‚üß ‚üπ
     ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b fold rderiv (replicate k x) œÜ ‚ü∑ (SNOC x^^k) ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ"
  by (induct k arbitrary: ùîÑ œÜ) (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_rderiv wf_rderiv nvars_SNOCs)


subsection ‚ÄπEmptiness Check‚Ä∫

context
  fixes b :: bool
  and idx :: 'n
  and œà :: "('a, 'k) aformula"
begin

abbreviation "fut_test ‚â° Œª(œÜ, Œ¶). œÜ ‚àâ set Œ¶"
abbreviation "fut_step ‚â° Œª(œÜ, Œ¶). (norm (rderiv (zero idx) œÜ), œÜ # Œ¶)"
definition "fut_derivs k œÜ ‚â° ((norm o rderiv (zero idx))^^k) œÜ"

lemma fut_derivs_Suc[simp]: "norm (rderiv (zero idx) (fut_derivs k œÜ)) = fut_derivs (Suc k) œÜ"
  unfolding fut_derivs_def by auto

definition "fut_invariant =
  (Œª(œÜ, Œ¶). wf idx œÜ ‚àß (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set Œ¶. wf idx œÜ) ‚àß
    (‚àÉk. œÜ = fut_derivs k œà ‚àß Œ¶ = map (Œªi. fut_derivs i œà) (rev [0 ..< k])))"
definition "fut_spec œÜŒ¶ ‚â° (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set (snd œÜŒ¶). wf idx œÜ) ‚àß
  (‚àÄùîÑ. #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx ‚ü∂
    (if b then (‚àÉk. (SNOC (zero idx) ^^ k) ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œà) ‚ü∑ (‚àÉœÜ ‚àà set (snd œÜŒ¶). ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ)
    else (‚àÄk. (SNOC (zero idx) ^^ k) ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œà) ‚ü∑ (‚àÄœÜ ‚àà set (snd œÜŒ¶). ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ)))"

definition "fut_default =
  (œà, sorted_list_of_set {‚ü®fold rderiv (replicate k (zero idx)) ‚ü®œà‚ü©‚ü© | k. True})"

lemma finite_fold_rderiv_zeros: "finite {‚ü®fold rderiv (replicate k (zero idx)) ‚ü®œà‚ü©‚ü© | k. True}"
  by (rule finite_subset[OF _ finite_fold_rderiv[of œà]]) blast

definition fut :: "('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "fut = (if b then nFOR else nFAND) (snd (while_default fut_default fut_test fut_step (œà, [])))"

context
  assumes wf: "wf idx œà"
begin 

lemma wf_fut_derivs:
  "wf idx (fut_derivs k œà)"
  by (induct k) (auto simp: wf_norm wf_rderiv wf fut_derivs_def)

lemma satisfies_bounded_fut_derivs:
  "#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b fut_derivs k œà ‚ü∑ (SNOC (zero idx)^^k) ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œà"
  by (induct k arbitrary: ùîÑ) (auto simp: fut_derivs_def satisfies_bounded_rderiv satisfies_bounded_norm
    wf_norm_rderivs size_zero nvars_SNOC funpow_swap1[of "SNOC x" for x] wf)

lemma fut_init: "fut_invariant (œà, [])"
  unfolding fut_invariant_def by (auto simp: fut_derivs_def wf)

lemma fut_spec_default: "fut_spec fut_default"
  using satisfies_bounded_fold_rderiv[OF iffD2[OF wf_norm_ACI wf] sym size_zero] 
  unfolding fut_spec_def fut_default_def snd_conv
    set_sorted_list_of_set[OF finite_fold_rderiv_zeros]
  by (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_norm_ACI wf_fold_rderiv wf wf_norm_ACI simp del: fold_replicate)

lemma fut_invariant: "fut_invariant œÜŒ¶ ‚üπ fut_test œÜŒ¶ ‚üπ fut_invariant (fut_step œÜŒ¶)"
  by (cases œÜŒ¶) (auto simp: fut_invariant_def wf_norm wf_rderiv split: if_splits)

lemma fut_terminate: "fut_invariant œÜŒ¶ ‚üπ ¬¨ fut_test œÜŒ¶ ‚üπ fut_spec œÜŒ¶"
proof (induct œÜŒ¶, unfold prod.case not_not)
  fix œÜ Œ¶ assume "fut_invariant (œÜ, Œ¶)" "œÜ ‚àà set Œ¶"
  then obtain i k where "i < k" and œÜ_def: "œÜ = fut_derivs i œà"
    and Œ¶_def: "Œ¶ = map (Œªi. fut_derivs i œà) (rev [0..<k])"
    and *: "fut_derivs k œà = fut_derivs i œà" unfolding fut_invariant_def by auto
  have "set Œ¶ = {fut_derivs k œà | k . True}"
  unfolding Œ¶_def set_map set_rev set_upt proof safe
    fix j
    show "fut_derivs j œà ‚àà (Œªi. fut_derivs i œà) ` {0..<k}"
    proof (cases "j < k")
      case False
      with * ‚Äπi < k‚Ä∫ have "fut_derivs j œà = fut_derivs ((j - i) mod (k - i) + i) œà"
        unfolding fut_derivs_def by (auto intro: funpow_cycle_offset)
      then show ?thesis using ‚Äπi < k‚Ä∫ ‚Äπ¬¨ j < k‚Ä∫
        by (metis image_eqI atLeastLessThan_iff le0 less_diff_conv mod_less_divisor zero_less_diff)
    qed simp
  qed (blast intro: *)
  then show "fut_spec (œÜ, Œ¶)"
    unfolding fut_spec_def using satisfies_bounded_fut_derivs by (auto simp: wf_fut_derivs)
qed

lemma fut_spec_while_default:
  "fut_spec (while_default fut_default fut_test fut_step (œà, []))"
  using fut_invariant fut_terminate fut_init fut_spec_default by (rule while_default_rule)

lemma wf_fut: "wf idx fut"
  using fut_spec_while_default unfolding fut_def fut_spec_def by (auto simp: wf_nFOR wf_nFAND)

lemma satisfies_bounded_fut:
  assumes "#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx"
  shows "ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b fut ‚ü∑
    (if b then (‚àÉk. (SNOC (zero idx) ^^ k) ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œà) else (‚àÄk. (SNOC (zero idx) ^^ k) ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œà))"
  using fut_spec_while_default assms unfolding fut_def fut_spec_def
  by (auto simp: satisfies_bounded_nFOR satisfies_bounded_nFAND)

end

end

fun finalize :: "'n ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula" where
  "finalize idx (FEx k œÜ) = fut True idx (nFEx k (finalize (SUC k idx) œÜ))"
| "finalize idx (FAll k œÜ) = fut False idx (nFAll k (finalize (SUC k idx) œÜ))"
| "finalize idx (FOr œÜ œà) = FOr (finalize idx œÜ) (finalize idx œà)"
| "finalize idx (FAnd œÜ œà) = FAnd (finalize idx œÜ) (finalize idx œà)"
| "finalize idx (FNot œÜ) = FNot (finalize idx œÜ)"
| "finalize idx œÜ = œÜ"

definition final :: "'n ‚áí ('a, 'k) aformula ‚áí bool" where
  "final idx = nullable o finalize idx"

lemma wf_finalize: "wf idx œÜ ‚üπ wf idx (finalize idx œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx) (auto simp: wf_fut wf_nFEx wf_nFAll)

lemma Length_SNOCs: "Length ((SNOC x ^^ i) ùîÑ) = Length ùîÑ + i"
  by (induct i arbitrary: ùîÑ) (auto simp: Length_SNOC)

lemma assigns_SNOCs_zero:
  "‚ü¶LESS k m (#‚á©V ùîÑ); #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx‚üß  ‚üπ m‚áó(SNOC (zero idx) ^^ i) ùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk"
  by (induct i arbitrary: ùîÑ) (auto simp: assigns_SNOC_zero nvars_SNOC funpow_swap1)

lemma Extend_SNOCs_zero_satisfies: "‚ü¶wf (SUC k idx) œÜ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; lformula œÜ‚üß ‚üπ
  Extend k 0 ((SNOC (zero (#‚á©V ùîÑ)) ^^ i) ùîÑ) P ‚ä® œÜ ‚ü∑ Extend k 0 ùîÑ P ‚ä® œÜ"
  by (rule satisfies_eqI)
   (auto simp: nvars_Extend nvars_SNOCs assigns_Extend assigns_SNOCs_zero LEQ_0 LESS_SUC
     dec_def gr0_conv_Suc)

lemma finalize_satisfies: "‚ü¶wf idx œÜ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; lformula œÜ‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b finalize idx œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx ùîÑ)
    (force simp add: wf_nFEx wf_nFAll wf_finalize Length_SNOCs nvars_Extend nvars_SNOCs
      satisfies_bounded_fut satisfies_bounded_nFEx satisfies_bounded_nFAll Extend_SNOCs_zero_satisfies
      intro: le_add2)+

lemma Extend_empty_satisfies0:
  "‚ü¶Length ùîÑ = 0; len P = 0‚üß ‚üπ Extend k i ùîÑ P ‚ä®‚á©0 a ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©0 a"
  by (intro box_equals[OF _ nullable0_satisfies0 nullable0_satisfies0])
    (auto simp: nvars_Extend Length_Extend)

lemma Extend_empty_satisfies_bounded:
  "‚ü¶Length ùîÑ = 0; len P = 0‚üß ‚üπ Extend k 0 ùîÑ P ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: k ùîÑ P)
    (auto simp: Extend_empty_satisfies0 Length_Extend split: bool.splits)

lemma nullable_satisfies_bounded: "Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚üπ nullable œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ"
  by (induct œÜ) (auto simp: nullable0_satisfies0 Extend_empty_satisfies_bounded len_cut_0
    intro: exI[of _ "cut 0 P" for P])

lemma final_satisfies:
  "‚ü¶wf idx œÜ ‚àß lformula œÜ; Length ùîÑ = 0; #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx‚üß ‚üπ final idx œÜ = (ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ)"
  by (simp only: final_def o_apply nullable_satisfies_bounded finalize_satisfies)

subsection ‚ÄπRestrictions‚Ä∫

lemma satisfies_gen_restrict_RESTR:
  "satisfies_gen (Œªk P n. restrict k P ‚àß r k P n) ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (RESTR œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ) (auto simp: restrict_Restrict[symmetric] assigns_Extend LEQ_0)

lemma finite_FV: "finite (FV œÜ k)"
  by (induct œÜ) (auto simp: finite_FV0)

lemma satisfies_gen_restrict:
  "satisfies_gen r ùîÑ œÜ ‚àß (‚àÄx‚ààset V. restrict k (x‚áóùîÑ‚áñk)) ‚ü∑
   satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (foldr (Œªx. FAnd (Restrict k x)) V œÜ)"
  by (induct V arbitrary: œÜ) (auto simp: restrict_Restrict[symmetric])

lemma sat_vars_RESTRICT_VARS:
  fixes œÜ
  defines "vs ‚â° sorted_list_of_set o FV œÜ"
  assumes "‚àÄk ‚àà set ks. finite (FV œÜ k)"
  shows "sat_vars_gen r (set ks) ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ satisfies_gen r ùîÑ (RESTRICT_VARS ks vs œÜ)"
using assms proof (induct ks)
  case (Cons k ks)
  with satisfies_gen_restrict[of r ùîÑ "(RESTRICT_VARS ks vs œÜ)" "vs k"] show ?case by auto
qed (simp add: satisfies_gen_restrict_RESTR)

lemma sat_RESTRICT: "sat ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä® RESTRICT œÜ"
  unfolding sat_def RESTRICT_def using sat_vars_RESTRICT_VARS[of Enum.enum, symmetric]
  by (auto simp: finite_FV enum_UNIV)

lemma sat‚á©b_RESTRICT: "sat‚á©b ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b RESTRICT œÜ"
  unfolding sat‚á©b_def RESTRICT_def using sat_vars_RESTRICT_VARS[of Enum.enum, symmetric]
  by (auto simp: finite_FV enum_UNIV)

lemma wf_RESTR: "wf idx œÜ ‚üπ wf idx (RESTR œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx) (auto simp: wf_Restrict LESS_SUC LEQ_0)

lemma wf_RESTRICT_VARS: "‚ü¶wf idx œÜ; ‚àÄk ‚àà set ks. ‚àÄv ‚àà set (vs k). LESS k v idx‚üß ‚üπ
  wf idx (RESTRICT_VARS ks vs œÜ)"
proof (induct ks)
  case (Cons k ks)
  moreover
  { fix vs œÜ assume "‚àÄv ‚àà set vs. LESS k v idx" "wf idx œÜ"
    then have "wf idx (foldr (Œªx. FAnd (Restrict k x)) vs œÜ)"
      by (induct vs arbitrary: œÜ) (auto simp: wf_Restrict)
  }
  ultimately show ?case by auto
qed (simp add: wf_RESTR)

lemma wf_FV_LESS: "‚ü¶wf idx œÜ; v ‚àà FV œÜ k‚üß ‚üπ LESS k v idx"
  by (induct œÜ arbitrary: idx v)
    (force simp: wf0_FV0_LESS LESS_SUC split: if_splits)+

lemma wf_RESTRICT: "wf idx œÜ ‚üπ wf idx (RESTRICT œÜ)"
  unfolding RESTRICT_def by (rule wf_RESTRICT_VARS) (auto simp: list_all_iff wf_FV_LESS finite_FV)

lemma lformula_RESTR: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ lformula (RESTR œÜ)"
  by (induct œÜ) (auto simp: lformula_Restrict)

lemma lformula_RESTRICT_VARS: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ lformula (RESTRICT_VARS ks vs œÜ)"
proof (induct ks)
  case (Cons k ks)
  moreover
  { fix vs œÜ assume "lformula œÜ"
    then have "lformula (foldr (Œªx. FAnd (Restrict k x)) vs œÜ)"
      by (induct vs arbitrary: œÜ) (auto simp: lformula_Restrict)
  }
  ultimately show ?case by auto
qed (simp add: lformula_RESTR)

lemma lformula_RESTRICT: "lformula œÜ ‚üπ lformula (RESTRICT œÜ)"
  unfolding RESTRICT_def by (rule lformula_RESTRICT_VARS)

lemma ex_fold_CONS: "‚àÉxs ùîÖ. ùîÑ = fold CONS xs ùîÖ ‚àß Length ùîÖ = 0 ‚àß Length ùîÑ = length xs ‚àß
   #‚á©V ùîÖ = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚àß (‚àÄx ‚àà set xs. size x = #‚á©V ùîÑ)"
proof (induct "Length ùîÑ" arbitrary: ùîÑ)
  case (Suc m)
  from Suc(2) CONS_surj obtain a ùîÖ where "ùîÑ = CONS a ùîÖ" "#‚á©V ùîÖ = #‚á©V ùîÑ" "size a = #‚á©V ùîÑ" by force
  moreover with Suc(2) have "Length ùîÖ = m" by (simp add: Length_CONS)
  with Suc(1)[of ùîÖ] obtain xs ‚Ñ≠ where "ùîÖ = fold CONS xs ‚Ñ≠" "Length ‚Ñ≠ = 0" "Length ùîÖ = length xs"
    "#‚á©V ‚Ñ≠ = #‚á©V ùîÖ" "‚àÄx ‚àà set xs. size x = #‚á©V ùîÖ" by blast
  ultimately show ?case by (intro exI[of _ "xs @ [a]"] exI[of _ ‚Ñ≠]) (auto simp: Length_CONS)
qed simp

primcorec L where
  "L idx I = Lang (‚àÉùîÑ. Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx ‚àß ùîÑ ‚àà I)
    (Œªa. if size a = idx then L idx {ùîÖ. CONS a ùîÖ ‚àà I} else Zero)"

lemma L_empty: "L idx {} = Zero"
  by coinduction auto

lemma L_alt: "L idx I =
    to_language {xs. ‚àÉùîÑ ‚àà I. ‚àÉùîÖ. ùîÑ = fold CONS (rev xs) ùîÖ ‚àß Length ùîÖ = 0 ‚àß
      #‚á©V ùîÖ = idx ‚àß (‚àÄx ‚àà set xs. size x = idx)}"
  by (coinduction arbitrary: I)
    (auto 0 4 simp: L_empty intro: exI[of _ "{}"] arg_cong[of _ _ to_language])

definition "lang idx œÜ = L idx {ùîÑ. ùîÑ ‚ä® œÜ ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx}"
definition "lang‚á©b idx œÜ = L idx {ùîÑ. ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b œÜ ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx}"
definition "language idx œÜ = L idx {ùîÑ. sat ùîÑ œÜ ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx}"
definition "language‚á©b idx œÜ = L idx {ùîÑ. sat‚á©b ùîÑ œÜ ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx}"

lemma "lformula œÜ ‚üπ lang n (norm œÜ) = lang n œÜ"
  unfolding lang_def using satisfies_norm by auto

lemma in_language_Zero[simp]: "¬¨ in_language Zero w"
  by (induct w) auto

lemma in_language_L_size: "in_language (L idx I) w ‚üπ x ‚àà set w ‚üπ size x = idx"
  by (induct w arbitrary: x I) (auto split: if_splits)

end

sublocale Formula <
  bounded: DA "alphabet idx" "ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ)" "Œªa œÜ. norm (lderiv a œÜ)" "nullable"
     "ŒªœÜ. wf idx œÜ ‚àß lformula œÜ" "lang‚á©b idx"
     "ŒªœÜ. wf idx œÜ ‚àß lformula œÜ" "language‚á©b idx" for idx
  using ex_Length_0[of idx]
  by unfold_locales
    (auto simp: lformula_norm lformula_lderiv distinct_alphabet alphabet_size wf_norm wf_lderiv
    lang‚á©b_def language‚á©b_def nullable_satisfies_bounded wf_RESTRICT lformula_RESTRICT sat‚á©b_RESTRICT
    satisfies_bounded_norm in_language_L_size satisfies_bounded_lderiv nvars_CONS
    dest: Length_0_inj intro: arg_cong[of _ _ "L (size _)"])

sublocale Formula <
  unbounded?: DA "alphabet idx" "ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ)" "Œªa œÜ. norm (lderiv a œÜ)" "final idx"
     "ŒªœÜ. wf idx œÜ ‚àß lformula œÜ" "lang idx"
     "ŒªœÜ. wf idx œÜ ‚àß lformula œÜ" "language idx" for idx
  using ex_Length_0[of idx]
  by unfold_locales
    (auto simp: lformula_norm lformula_lderiv distinct_alphabet alphabet_size wf_norm wf_lderiv
    lang_def language_def final_satisfies wf_RESTRICT lformula_RESTRICT sat_RESTRICT
    satisfies_norm in_language_L_size satisfies_lderiv nvars_CONS
    dest: Length_0_inj intro: arg_cong[of _ _ "L (size _)"])

lemma (in Formula) check_eqv_soundness:
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ sat ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ sat ùîÑ œà"
  using ex_fold_CONS[of ùîÑ]
  by (auto simp: language_def L_alt set_eq_iff
    dest!: soundness[unfolded rel_language_eq] injD[OF bij_is_inj[OF to_language_bij]])
    (metis Length_0_inj rev_rev_ident set_rev)+

lemma (in Formula) bounded_check_eqv_soundness:
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; bounded.check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ sat‚á©b ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ sat‚á©b ùîÑ œà"
  using ex_fold_CONS[of ùîÑ]
  by (auto simp: language‚á©b_def L_alt set_eq_iff
    dest!: bounded.soundness[unfolded rel_language_eq] injD[OF bij_is_inj[OF to_language_bij]])
    (metis Length_0_inj rev_rev_ident set_rev)+

end

Theory WS1S_Prelim

section ‚ÄπWS1S Interpretations‚Ä∫

(*<*)
theory WS1S_Prelim
imports
  FSet_More
  Deriving.Compare_Instances
  "List-Index.List_Index"
begin

hide_const (open) cut
(*>*)

definition "eval P x = (x |‚àà| P)"
definition "downshift P = (Œªx. x - Suc 0) |`| (P |-| {|0|})"
definition "upshift P = Suc |`| P"
definition "lift bs i P = (if bs ! i then finsert 0 (upshift P) else upshift P)"
definition "snoc n bs i P = (if bs ! i then finsert n P else P)"
definition "cut n P = ffilter (Œªi. i < n) P"
definition "len P = (if P = {||} then 0 else Suc (fMax P))"

datatype order = FO | SO
derive linorder order
instantiation order :: enum begin
  definition "enum_order = [FO, SO]"
  definition "enum_all_order P = (P FO ‚àß P SO)"
  definition "enum_ex_order P = (P FO ‚à® P SO)"
  lemmas enum_defs = enum_order_def enum_all_order_def enum_ex_order_def
  instance proof qed (auto simp: enum_defs, (metis (full_types) order.exhaust)+)
end

typedef idx = "UNIV :: (nat √ó nat) set" by (rule UNIV_witness)

setup_lifting type_definition_idx

lift_definition SUC :: "order ‚áí idx ‚áí idx" is
  "Œªord (m, n). case ord of FO ‚áí (Suc m, n) | SO ‚áí (m, Suc n)" .
lift_definition LESS :: "order ‚áí nat ‚áí idx ‚áí bool" is
  "Œªord l (m, n). case ord of FO ‚áí l < m | SO ‚áí l < n" .
abbreviation "LEQ ord l idx ‚â° LESS ord l (SUC ord idx)"

definition "MSB Is ‚â°
  if ‚àÄP ‚àà set Is. P = {||} then 0 else Suc (Max (‚ãÉP ‚àà set Is. fset P))"

lemma MSB_Nil[simp]: "MSB [] = 0"
  unfolding MSB_def by simp

lemma MSB_Cons[simp]: "MSB (I # Is) = max (if I = {||} then 0 else Suc (fMax I)) (MSB Is)"
  unfolding MSB_def including fset.lifting
  by transfer (auto simp: Max_Un list_all_iff Sup_bot_conv(2)[symmetric] simp del: Sup_bot_conv(2))

lemma MSB_append[simp]: "MSB (I1 @ I2) = max (MSB I1) (MSB I2)"
  by (induct I1) auto

lemma MSB_insert_nth[simp]:
  "MSB (insert_nth n P Is) = max (if P = {||} then 0 else Suc (fMax P)) (MSB Is)"
  by (subst (2) append_take_drop_id[of n Is, symmetric])
    (simp only: insert_nth_take_drop MSB_append MSB_Cons MSB_Nil)

lemma MSB_greater:
  "‚ü¶i < length Is; p |‚àà| Is ! i‚üß ‚üπ p < MSB Is"
  unfolding MSB_def by (fastforce simp: Bex_def in_set_conv_nth less_Suc_eq_le intro: Max_ge)

lemma MSB_mono: "set I1 ‚äÜ set I2 ‚üπ MSB I1 ‚â§ MSB I2"
  unfolding MSB_def including fset.lifting
  by transfer (auto simp: list_all_iff intro!: Max_ge)

lemma MSB_map_index'_CONS[simp]:
  "MSB (map_index' i (lift bs) Is) =
  (if MSB Is = 0 ‚àß (‚àÄi ‚àà {i ..< i + length Is}. ¬¨ bs ! i) then 0 else Suc (MSB Is))"
  by (induct Is arbitrary: i)
   (auto split: if_splits simp: mono_fMax_commute[where f = Suc, symmetric] mono_def
    lift_def upshift_def,
    metis atLeastLessThan_iff le_antisym not_less_eq_eq)

lemma MSB_map_index'_SNOC[simp]:
  "MSB Is ‚â§ n ‚üπ MSB (map_index' i (snoc n bs) Is) =
  (if (‚àÄi ‚àà {i ..< i + length Is}. ¬¨ bs ! i) then MSB Is else Suc n)"
  by (induct Is arbitrary: i)
    (auto split: if_splits simp: mono_fMax_commute[where f = Suc, symmetric] mono_def
    snoc_def, (metis atLeastLessThan_iff le_antisym not_less_eq_eq)+)

lemma MSB_replicate[simp]: "MSB (replicate n P) = (if P = {||} ‚à® n = 0 then 0 else Suc (fMax P))"
  by (induct n) auto

typedef interp =
  "{(n :: nat, I1 :: nat fset list, I2  :: nat fset list) | n I1 I2. MSB (I1 @ I2) ‚â§ n}"
  by auto

setup_lifting type_definition_interp

lift_definition assigns :: "nat ‚áí interp ‚áí order ‚áí nat fset" ("_‚áó_‚áñ_" [900, 999, 999] 999)
  is "Œªn (_, I1, I2) ord. case ord of FO ‚áí if n < length I1 then I1 ! n else {||}
    | SO ‚áí if n < length I2 then I2 ! n else {||}" .
lift_definition nvars :: "interp ‚áí idx" ("#‚á©V _" [1000] 900)
  is "Œª(_, I1, I2). (length I1, length I2)" .
lift_definition Length :: "interp ‚áí nat"
  is "Œª(n, _, _). n" .
lift_definition Extend :: "order ‚áí nat ‚áí interp ‚áí nat fset ‚áí interp"
  is "Œªord i (n, I1, I2) P. case ord of
      FO ‚áí (max n (if P = {||} then 0 else Suc (fMax P)), insert_nth i P I1, I2)
    | SO ‚áí (max n (if P = {||} then 0 else Suc (fMax P)), I1, insert_nth i P I2)"
  using MSB_mono by (auto simp del: insert_nth_take_drop split: order.splits)

lift_definition CONS :: "(bool list √ó bool list) ‚áí interp ‚áí interp"
  is "Œª(bs1, bs2) (n, I1, I2).
   (Suc n, map_index (lift bs1) I1, map_index (lift bs2) I2)"
  by auto

lift_definition SNOC :: "(bool list √ó bool list) ‚áí interp ‚áí interp"
  is "Œª(bs1, bs2) (n, I1, I2).
   (Suc n, map_index (snoc n bs1) I1, map_index (snoc n bs2) I2)"
  by (auto simp: Let_def)

type_synonym atom = "bool list √ó bool list"

lift_definition zero :: "idx ‚áí atom"
  is "Œª(m, n). (replicate m False, replicate n False)" .

definition "extend ord b ‚â°
  Œª(bs1, bs2). case ord of FO ‚áí (b # bs1, bs2) | SO ‚áí (bs1, b # bs2)"
lift_definition size_atom :: "bool list √ó bool list ‚áí idx"
  is "Œª(bs1, bs2). (length bs1, length bs2)" .

lift_definition œÉ :: "idx ‚áí atom list"
  is "(Œª(n, N). map (Œªbs. (take n bs, drop n bs)) (List.n_lists (n + N) [True, False]))" .

lemma fMin_fimage_Suc[simp]: "x |‚àà| A ‚üπ fMin (Suc |`| A) = Suc (fMin A)"
  by (rule fMin_eqI) (auto intro: fMin_in)

lemma fMin_eq_0[simp]: "0 |‚àà| A ‚üπ fMin A = (0 :: nat)"
  by (rule fMin_eqI) auto

lemma insert_nth_Cons[simp]:
  "insert_nth i x (y # xs) = (case i of 0 ‚áí x # y # xs | Suc i ‚áí y # insert_nth i x xs)"
  by (cases i) simp_all

lemma insert_nth_commute[simp]:
  assumes "j ‚â§ i" "i ‚â§ length xs"
  shows "insert_nth j y (insert_nth i x xs) = insert_nth (Suc i) x (insert_nth j y xs)"
  using assms by (induct xs arbitrary: i j) (auto simp del: insert_nth_take_drop split: nat.splits)

lemma SUC_SUC[simp]: "SUC ord (SUC ord' idx) = SUC ord' (SUC ord idx)"
  by transfer (auto split: order.splits)

lemma LESS_SUC[simp]:
  "LESS ord 0 (SUC ord idx)"
  "LESS ord (Suc l) (SUC ord idx) = LESS ord l idx"
  "ord ‚â† ord' ‚üπ LESS ord l (SUC ord' idx) = LESS ord l idx"
  "LESS ord l idx ‚üπ LESS ord l (SUC ord' idx)"
  by (transfer, force split: order.splits)+

lemma nvars_Extend[simp]:
  "#‚á©V (Extend ord i ùîÑ P) = SUC ord (#‚á©V ùîÑ)"
  by (transfer, force split: order.splits)

lemma Length_Extend[simp]:
  "Length (Extend k i ùîÑ P) = max (Length ùîÑ) (if P = {||} then 0 else Suc (fMax P))"
  unfolding max_def by (split if_splits, transfer) (force split: order.splits)

lemma assigns_Extend[simp]:
  "LEQ ord i (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπm‚áóExtend ord i ùîÑ P‚áñord = (if m = i then P else (if m > i then m - Suc 0 else m)‚áóùîÑ‚áñord)"
  "ord ‚â† ord' ‚üπ m‚áóExtend ord i ùîÑ P‚áñord' = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñord'"
  by (transfer, force simp: min_def nth_append split: order.splits)+

lemma Extend_commute_safe[simp]:
  "‚ü¶j ‚â§ i; LEQ ord i (#‚á©V ùîÑ)‚üß ‚üπ
    Extend ord j (Extend ord i ùîÑ P1) P2 = Extend ord (Suc i) (Extend ord j ùîÑ P2) P1"
  by (transfer,
    force simp del: insert_nth_take_drop simp: replicate_add[symmetric] split: order.splits)

lemma Extend_commute_unsafe:
  "ord ‚â† ord' ‚üπ Extend ord j (Extend ord' i ùîÑ P1) P2 = Extend ord' i (Extend ord j ùîÑ P2) P1"
  by (transfer, force simp: replicate_add[symmetric] split: order.splits)

lemma Length_CONS[simp]:
  "Length (CONS x ùîÑ) = Suc (Length ùîÑ)"
  by (transfer, force split: order.splits)

lemma Length_SNOC[simp]:
  "Length (SNOC x ùîÑ) = Suc (Length ùîÑ)"
  by (transfer, force simp: Let_def split: order.splits)

lemma nvars_CONS[simp]:
  "#‚á©V (CONS x ùîÑ) = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  by (transfer, force)

lemma nvars_SNOC[simp]:
  "#‚á©V (SNOC x ùîÑ) = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  by (transfer, force simp: Let_def)

lemma assigns_CONS[simp]:
  assumes "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom bs1_bs2"
  shows "LESS ord x (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ x‚áóCONS bs1_bs2 ùîÑ‚áñord =
