    (if case_prod case_order bs1_bs2 ord ! x then finsert 0 (upshift (x‚áóùîÑ‚áñord)) else upshift (x‚áóùîÑ‚áñord))"
  by (insert assms, transfer) (auto simp: lift_def split: order.splits)

lemma assigns_SNOC[simp]:
  assumes "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom bs1_bs2"
  shows "LESS ord x (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ x‚áóSNOC bs1_bs2 ùîÑ‚áñord =
    (if case_prod case_order bs1_bs2 ord ! x then finsert (Length ùîÑ) (x‚áóùîÑ‚áñord) else x‚áóùîÑ‚áñord)"
  by (insert assms, transfer) (force simp: snoc_def Let_def split: order.splits)

lemma map_index'_eq_conv[simp]:
  "map_index' i f xs = map_index' j g xs = (‚àÄk < length xs. f (i + k) (xs ! k) = g (j + k) (xs ! k))"
proof (induct xs arbitrary: i j)
  case Cons from Cons(1)[of "Suc i" "Suc j"] show ?case by (auto simp: nth_Cons split: nat.splits)
qed simp

lemma fMax_Diff_0[simp]: "Suc m |‚àà| P ‚üπ fMax (P |-| {|0|}) = fMax P"
  by (rule fMax_eqI) (auto intro: fMax_in dest: fMax_ge)

lemma Suc_fMax_pred_fimage[simp]:
  assumes "Suc p |‚àà| P" "0 |‚àâ| P"
  shows "Suc (fMax ((Œªx. x - Suc 0) |`| P)) = fMax P"
  using assms by (subst mono_fMax_commute[of Suc, unfolded mono_def, simplified]) (auto simp: o_def)

lemma Extend_CONS[simp]: "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x ‚üπ Extend ord 0 (CONS x ùîÑ) P =
  CONS (extend ord (eval P 0) x) (Extend ord 0 ùîÑ (downshift P))"
  by transfer (auto simp: extend_def o_def gr0_conv_Suc
    mono_fMax_commute[of Suc, symmetric, unfolded mono_def, simplified]
    lift_def upshift_def downshift_def eval_def
    dest!: fsubset_fsingletonD split: order.splits)

lemma size_atom_extend[simp]:
  "size_atom (extend ord b x) = SUC ord (size_atom x)"
  unfolding extend_def by transfer (simp split: prod.splits order.splits)

lemma size_atom_zero[simp]:
  "size_atom (zero idx) = idx"
  unfolding extend_def by transfer (simp split: prod.splits order.splits)

lemma interp_eqI:
  "‚ü¶Length ùîÑ = Length ùîÖ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ; ‚ãÄm k. LESS k m (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÖ‚áñk‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ = ùîÖ"
  by transfer (force split: order.splits intro!: nth_equalityI)

lemma Extend_SNOC_cut[unfolded eval_def cut_def Length_SNOC, simp]:
  "‚ü¶len P ‚â§ Length (SNOC x ùîÑ); #‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x‚üß ‚üπ
  Extend ord 0 (SNOC x ùîÑ) P =
    SNOC (extend ord (if eval P (Length ùîÑ) then True else False) x) (Extend ord 0 ùîÑ (cut (Length ùîÑ) P))"
  by transfer (fastforce simp: extend_def len_def cut_def ffilter_eq_fempty_iff snoc_def eval_def
    split: if_splits order.splits dest: fMax_ge fMax_boundedD intro: fMax_in)

lemma nth_replicate_simp: "replicate m x ! i = (if i < m then x else [] ! (i - m))"
  by (induct m arbitrary: i) (auto simp: nth_Cons')

lemma MSB_eq_SucD: "MSB Is = Suc x ‚üπ ‚àÉP‚ààset Is. x |‚àà| P"
  using Max_in[of "‚ãÉx‚ààset Is. fset x"]
  unfolding MSB_def by (force simp: fmember_def split: if_splits)

lemma append_replicate_inj:
  assumes "xs ‚â† [] ‚üπ last xs ‚â† x" and "ys ‚â† [] ‚üπ last ys ‚â† x"
  shows "xs @ replicate m x = ys @ replicate n x ‚ü∑ (xs = ys ‚àß m = n)"
proof safe
  from assms have assms': "xs ‚â† [] ‚üπ rev xs ! 0 ‚â† x" "ys ‚â† [] ‚üπ rev ys ! 0 ‚â† x"
    by (auto simp: hd_rev hd_conv_nth[symmetric])
  assume *: "xs @ replicate m x = ys @ replicate n x"
  then have "rev (xs @ replicate m x) = rev (ys @ replicate n x)" ..
  then have "replicate m x @ rev xs = replicate n x @ rev ys" by simp
  then have "take (max m n) (replicate m x @ rev xs) = take (max m n) (replicate n x @ rev ys)" by simp
  then have "replicate m x @ take (max m n - m) (rev xs) =
    replicate n x @ take (max m n - n) (rev ys)" by (auto simp: min_def max_def split: if_splits)
  then have "(replicate m x @ take (max m n - m) (rev xs)) ! min m n =
    (replicate n x @ take (max m n - n) (rev ys)) ! min m n" by simp
  with arg_cong[OF *, of length, simplified] assms' show "m = n"
    by (cases "xs = []" "ys = []" rule: bool.exhaust[case_product bool.exhaust])
      (auto simp: min_def nth_append split: if_splits)
  with * show "xs = ys" by auto
qed

lemma fin_lift[simp]: "m |‚àà| lift bs i (I ! i) ‚ü∑ (case m of 0 ‚áí bs ! i | Suc m ‚áí m |‚àà| I ! i)"
  unfolding lift_def upshift_def by (auto split: nat.splits)

lemma ex_Length_0[simp]:
  "‚àÉùîÑ. Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx"
  by transfer (auto intro!: exI[of _ "replicate m {||}" for m])

lemma is_empty_inj[simp]: "‚ü¶Length ùîÑ = 0; Length ùîÖ = 0; #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ = ùîÖ"
  by transfer (simp add: list_eq_iff_nth_eq split: prod.splits,
    metis MSB_greater fMax_in less_nat_zero_code)

lemma set_œÉ_length_atom[simp]: "(x ‚àà set (œÉ idx)) ‚ü∑ idx = size_atom x"
  by transfer (auto simp: set_n_lists enum_UNIV image_iff intro!: exI[of _ "I1 @ I2" for I1 I2])

lemma distinct_œÉ[simp]: "distinct (œÉ idx)"
  by transfer (auto 0 4 simp: distinct_map distinct_n_lists set_n_lists inj_on_def
    intro: iffD2[OF append_eq_append_conv]
      box_equals[OF _ append_take_drop_id append_take_drop_id, of n _ n for n])

lemma fMin_less_Length[simp]: "x |‚àà| m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk ‚üπ fMin (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk) < Length ùîÑ"
  by transfer
    (force elim: order.strict_trans2[OF MSB_greater, rotated -1] intro: fMin_in split: order.splits)

lemma fMax_less_Length[simp]: "x |‚àà| m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk ‚üπ fMax (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk) < Length ùîÑ"
  by transfer
    (force elim: order.strict_trans2[OF MSB_greater, rotated -1] intro: fMax_in split: order.splits)

lemma min_Length_fMin[simp]: "x |‚àà| m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk ‚üπ min (Length ùîÑ) (fMin (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk)) = fMin (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk)"
  using fMin_less_Length[of x m1 ùîÑ k] unfolding fMin_def by auto

lemma max_Length_fMin[simp]: "x |‚àà| m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk ‚üπ max (Length ùîÑ) (fMin (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk)) = Length ùîÑ"
  using fMin_less_Length[of x m1 ùîÑ k] unfolding fMin_def by auto

lemma min_Length_fMax[simp]: "x |‚àà| m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk ‚üπ min (Length ùîÑ) (fMax (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk)) = fMax (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk)"
  using fMax_less_Length[of x m1 ùîÑ k] unfolding fMax_def by auto

lemma max_Length_fMax[simp]: "x |‚àà| m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk ‚üπ max (Length ùîÑ) (fMax (m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk)) = Length ùîÑ"
  using fMax_less_Length[of x m1 ùîÑ k] unfolding fMax_def by auto

lemma assigns_less_Length[simp]: "x |‚àà| m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñk ‚üπ x < Length ùîÑ"
  by transfer (force dest: MSB_greater split: order.splits if_splits)

lemma Length_notin_assigns[simp]: "Length ùîÑ |‚àâ| m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk"
  by (metis assigns_less_Length less_not_refl)

lemma nth_zero[simp]: "LESS ord m (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ ¬¨ case_prod case_order (zero (#‚á©V ùîÑ)) ord ! m"
  by transfer (auto split: order.splits)

lemma in_fimage_Suc[simp]: "x |‚àà| Suc |`| A ‚ü∑ (‚àÉy. y |‚àà| A ‚àß x = Suc y)"
  by blast

lemma fimage_Suc_inj[simp]: "Suc |`| A = Suc |`| B ‚ü∑ A = B"
  by blast

lemma MSB_eq0_D: "MSB I = 0 ‚üπ x < length I ‚üπ I ! x = {||}"
  unfolding MSB_def by (auto split: if_splits)

lemma Suc_in_fimage_Suc: "Suc x |‚àà| Suc |`| X ‚ü∑ x |‚àà| X"
  by auto

lemma Suc_in_fimage_Suc_o_Suc[simp]: "Suc x |‚àà| (Suc ‚àò Suc) |`| X ‚ü∑ x |‚àà| Suc |`| X"
  by auto

lemma finsert_same_eq_iff[simp]: "finsert k X = finsert k Y ‚ü∑ X |-| {|k|} = Y |-| {|k|}"
  by auto


lemma fimage_Suc_o_Suc_eq_fimage_Suc_iff[simp]:
  "((Suc ‚àò Suc) |`| X = Suc |`| Y) ‚ü∑ (Suc |`| X = Y)"
  by (metis fimage_Suc_inj fset.map_comp)

lemma fMax_image_Suc[simp]: "x |‚àà| P ‚üπ fMax (Suc |`| P) = Suc (fMax P)"
  by (rule fMax_eqI) (metis Suc_le_mono fMax_ge fimageE, metis fimageI fempty_iff fMax_in)

lemma fimage_Suc_eq_singleton[simp]: "(fimage Suc Z = {|y|}) ‚ü∑ (‚àÉx. Z = {|x|} ‚àß Suc x = y)"
  by (cases y) auto

lemma len_downshift_helper:
  "x |‚àà| P ‚üπ Suc (fMax ((Œªx. x - Suc 0) |`| (P |-| {|0|}))) ‚â† fMax P ‚üπ xa |‚àà| P ‚üπ xa = 0"
proof -
  assume a1: "xa |‚àà| P"
  assume a2: "Suc (fMax ((Œªx. x - Suc 0) |`| (P |-| {|0|}))) ‚â† fMax P"
  have "xa |‚àà| {|0|} ‚ü∂ xa = 0" by fastforce
  moreover
  { assume "xa |‚àâ| {|0|}"
    hence "0 |‚àâ| P |-| {|0|} ‚àß xa |‚àâ| {|0|}" by blast
    then obtain esk1‚á©1 :: "nat ‚áí nat" where "xa = 0" using a1 a2 by (metis Suc_fMax_pred_fimage fMax_Diff_0 fminus_iff not0_implies_Suc) }
  ultimately show "xa = 0" by blast
qed

lemma CONS_inj[simp]: "size_atom x = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚üπ size_atom y = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚üπ #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ ‚üπ
  CONS x ùîÑ = CONS y ùîÖ ‚ü∑ (x = y ‚àß ùîÑ = ùîÖ)"
  by transfer (auto simp: list_eq_iff_nth_eq lift_def upshift_def split: if_splits; blast)

lemma Suc_minus1: "Suc (x - Suc 0) = (if x = 0 then Suc 0 else x)"
  by auto

lemma fset_eq_empty_iff: "(fset X = {}) = (X = {||})"
  by (metis bot_fset.rep_eq fset_inverse)

lemma fset_le_singleton_iff: "(fset X ‚äÜ {x}) = (X = {||} ‚à® X = {|x|})"
  by (metis finsert.rep_eq fset_eq_empty_iff fset_inject order_refl singleton_insert_inj_eq subset_singletonD)

lemma MSB_decreases:
  "MSB I ‚â§ Suc m ‚üπ MSB (map (ŒªX. (ŒªI1. I1 - Suc 0) |`| (X |-| {|0|})) I) ‚â§ m"
  unfolding MSB_def
  by (auto simp add: not_le less_Suc_eq_le fset_eq_empty_iff fset_le_singleton_iff
    split: if_splits dest!: iffD1[OF Max_le_iff, rotated -1] iffD1[OF Max_ge_iff, rotated -1]; force)

lemma CONS_surj[dest]: "Length ùîÑ > 0 ‚üπ
  ‚àÉx ùîÖ. ùîÑ = CONS x ùîÖ ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÖ = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚àß size_atom x = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  by transfer (auto simp: gr0_conv_Suc list_eq_iff_nth_eq lift_def upshift_def split: if_splits
    intro!: exI[of _ "map (ŒªX. 0 |‚àà| X) _"] exI[of _ "map (ŒªX. (Œªx. x - Suc 0) |`| (X |-| {|0|})) _"],
    auto simp: MSB_decreases upshift_def Suc_minus1 fimage_iff intro: rev_fBexI split: if_splits)
 
(*<*)
end
(*>*)

Theory WS1S_Formula

section ‚ÄπConcrete Atomic WS1S Formulas (Minimum Semantics for FO Variables)‚Ä∫

(*<*)
theory WS1S_Formula
imports
  Abstract_Formula
  WS1S_Prelim
begin
(*>*)

datatype (FOV0: 'fo, SOV0: 'so) atomic =
  Fo 'fo |
  Eq_Const "nat option" 'fo nat |
  Less "bool option" 'fo 'fo |
  Plus_FO "nat option" 'fo 'fo nat |
  Eq_FO bool 'fo 'fo |
  Eq_SO 'so 'so |
  Suc_SO bool bool 'so 'so |
  Empty 'so |
  Singleton 'so |
  Subset 'so 'so |
  In bool 'fo 'so |
  Eq_Max bool 'fo 'so |
  Eq_Min bool 'fo 'so |
  Eq_Union 'so 'so 'so |
  Eq_Inter 'so 'so 'so |
  Eq_Diff 'so 'so 'so |
  Disjoint 'so 'so |
  Eq_Presb "nat option" 'so nat

derive linorder option
derive linorder atomic ‚Äï ‚Äπvery slow‚Ä∫

type_synonym fo = nat
type_synonym so = nat
type_synonym ws1s = "(fo, so) atomic"
type_synonym formula = "(ws1s, order) aformula"

primrec wf0 where
  "wf0 idx (Fo m) = LESS FO m idx"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_Const i m n) = (LESS FO m idx ‚àß (case i of Some i ‚áí i ‚â§ n | _ ‚áí True))"
| "wf0 idx (Less _ m1 m2) = (LESS FO m1 idx ‚àß LESS FO m2 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Plus_FO i m1 m2 n) =
  (LESS FO m1 idx ‚àß LESS FO m2 idx ‚àß (case i of Some i ‚áí i ‚â§ n | _ ‚áí True))"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_FO _ m1 m2) = (LESS FO m1 idx ‚àß LESS FO m2 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_SO M1 M2) = (LESS SO M1 idx ‚àß LESS SO M2 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Suc_SO br bl M1 M2) = (LESS SO M1 idx ‚àß LESS SO M2 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Empty M) = LESS SO M idx"
| "wf0 idx (Singleton M) = LESS SO M idx"
| "wf0 idx (Subset M1 M2) = (LESS SO M1 idx ‚àß LESS SO M2 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (In _ m M) = (LESS FO m idx ‚àß LESS SO M idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_Max _ m M) = (LESS FO m idx ‚àß LESS SO M idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_Min _ m M) = (LESS FO m idx ‚àß LESS SO M idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) = (LESS SO M1 idx ‚àß LESS SO M2 idx ‚àß LESS SO M3 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) = (LESS SO M1 idx ‚àß LESS SO M2 idx ‚àß LESS SO M3 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) = (LESS SO M1 idx ‚àß LESS SO M2 idx ‚àß LESS SO M3 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Disjoint M1 M2) = (LESS SO M1 idx ‚àß LESS SO M2 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (Eq_Presb _ M n) = LESS SO M idx"

inductive lformula0 where
  "lformula0 (Fo m)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_Const None m n)"
| "lformula0 (Less None m1 m2)"
| "lformula0 (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_FO False m1 m2)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_SO M1 M2)"
| "lformula0 (Suc_SO False bl M1 M2)"
| "lformula0 (Empty M)"
| "lformula0 (Singleton M)"
| "lformula0 (Subset M1 M2)"
| "lformula0 (In False m M)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_Max False m M)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_Min False m M)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3)"
| "lformula0 (Disjoint M1 M2)"
| "lformula0 (Eq_Presb None M n)"

code_pred lformula0 .

declare lformula0.intros[simp]

inductive_cases lformula0E[elim]: "lformula0 a"

abbreviation "FV0 ‚â° case_order FOV0 SOV0"

fun find0 where
  "find0 FO i (Fo m) = (i = m)"
| "find0 FO i (Eq_Const _ m _) = (i = m)"
| "find0 FO i (Less _ m1 m2) = (i = m1 ‚à® i = m2)"
| "find0 FO i (Plus_FO _ m1 m2 _) = (i = m1 ‚à® i = m2)"
| "find0 FO i (Eq_FO _ m1 m2) = (i = m1 ‚à® i = m2)"
| "find0 SO i (Eq_SO M1 M2) = (i = M1 ‚à® i = M2)"
| "find0 SO i (Suc_SO _ _ M1 M2) = (i = M1 ‚à® i = M2)"
| "find0 SO i (Empty M) = (i = M)"
| "find0 SO i (Singleton M) = (i = M)"
| "find0 SO i (Subset M1 M2) = (i = M1 ‚à® i = M2)"
| "find0 FO i (In _ m _) = (i = m)"
| "find0 SO i (In _ _ M) = (i = M)"
| "find0 FO i (Eq_Max _ m _) = (i = m)"
| "find0 SO i (Eq_Max _ _ M) = (i = M)"
| "find0 FO i (Eq_Min _ m _) = (i = m)"
| "find0 SO i (Eq_Min _ _ M) = (i = M)"
| "find0 SO i (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) = (i = M1 ‚à® i = M2 ‚à® i = M3)"
| "find0 SO i (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) = (i = M1 ‚à® i = M2 ‚à® i = M3)"
| "find0 SO i (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) = (i = M1 ‚à® i = M2 ‚à® i = M3)"
| "find0 SO i (Disjoint M1 M2) = (i = M1 ‚à® i = M2)"
| "find0 SO i (Eq_Presb _ M _) = (i = M)"
| "find0 _ _ _ = False"

abbreviation "decr0 ord k ‚â° map_atomic (case_order (dec k) id ord) (case_order id (dec k) ord)"

lemma sum_pow2_image_Suc:
  "finite X ‚üπ sum ((^) (2 :: nat)) (Suc ` X) = 2 * sum ((^) 2) X"
  by (induct X rule: finite_induct) (auto intro: trans[OF sum.insert])

lemma sum_pow2_insert0:
  "‚ü¶finite X; 0 ‚àâ X‚üß ‚üπ sum ((^) (2 :: nat)) (insert 0 X) = Suc (sum ((^) 2) X)"
  by (induct X rule: finite_induct) (auto intro: trans[OF sum.insert])

lemma sum_pow2_upto: "sum ((^) (2 :: nat)) {0 ..< x} = 2 ^ x - 1"
  by (induct x) (auto simp: algebra_simps)

lemma sum_pow2_inj:
  "‚ü¶finite X; finite Y; (‚àëx‚ààX. 2 ^ x :: nat) = (‚àëx‚ààY. 2 ^ x)‚üß ‚üπ X = Y"
  (is "_ ‚üπ _ ‚üπ ?f X = ?f Y ‚üπ _")
proof (induct X arbitrary: Y rule: finite_linorder_max_induct)
  case (insert x X)
  from insert(2) have "?f X ‚â§ ?f {0 ..< x}" by (intro sum_mono2) auto
  also have "‚Ä¶ < 2 ^ x" by (induct x) simp_all
  finally have "?f X < 2 ^ x" .
  moreover from insert(1,2) have *: "?f X + 2 ^ x = ?f Y"
    using trans[OF sym[OF insert(5)] sum.insert] by auto
  ultimately have "?f Y < 2 ^ Suc x" by simp

  have "‚àÄy ‚àà Y. y ‚â§ x"
  proof (rule ccontr)
    assume "¬¨ (‚àÄy‚ààY. y ‚â§ x)"
    then obtain y where "y ‚àà Y" "Suc x ‚â§ y" by auto
    from this(2) have "2 ^ Suc x ‚â§ (2 ^ y :: nat)" by (intro power_increasing) auto
    also from ‚Äπy ‚àà Y‚Ä∫ insert(4) have "‚Ä¶ ‚â§ ?f Y" by (metis order.refl sum.remove trans_le_add1)
    finally show False using ‚Äπ?f Y < 2 ^ Suc x‚Ä∫ by simp
  qed

  { assume "x ‚àâ Y"
    with ‚Äπ‚àÄy ‚àà Y. y ‚â§ x‚Ä∫ have "?f Y ‚â§ ?f {0 ..< x}" by (intro sum_mono2) (auto simp: le_less)
    also have "‚Ä¶ < 2 ^ x" by (induct x) simp_all
    finally have "?f Y < 2 ^ x" .
    with * have False by auto
  }
  then have "x ‚àà Y" by blast

  from insert(4) have "?f (Y - {x}) + 2 ^ x = ?f (insert x (Y - {x}))"by (subst sum.insert) auto
  also have "‚Ä¶ = ?f X + 2 ^ x" unfolding * using ‚Äπx ‚àà Y‚Ä∫ by (simp add: insert_absorb)
  finally have "?f X = ?f (Y - {x})" by simp
  with insert(3,4) have "X = Y - {x}" by simp
  with ‚Äπx ‚àà Y‚Ä∫ show ?case by auto
qed simp

lemma finite_pow2_eq:
  fixes n :: nat
  shows "finite {i. 2 ^ i = n}"
proof -
  have "((^) 2) ` {i. 2 ^ i = n} ‚äÜ {n}" by auto
  then have "finite (((^) (2 :: nat)) ` {i. 2 ^ i = n})" by (rule finite_subset) blast
  then show "finite {i. 2 ^ i = n}" by (rule finite_imageD) (auto simp: inj_on_def)
qed

lemma finite_pow2_le[simp]:
  fixes n :: nat
  shows "finite {i. 2 ^ i ‚â§ n}"
  by (induct n) (auto simp: le_Suc_eq finite_pow2_eq)

lemma le_pow2[simp]: "x ‚â§ y ‚üπ x ‚â§ 2 ^ y"
  by (induct x arbitrary: y) (force simp add: Suc_le_eq order.strict_iff_order)+

lemma ld_bounded: "Max {i. 2 ^ i ‚â§ Suc n} ‚â§ Suc n" (is "?m ‚â§ Suc n")
proof -
  have "?m ‚â§ 2 ^ ?m" by (rule le_pow2) simp
  moreover
  have "?m ‚àà {i. 2 ^ i ‚â§ Suc n}" by (rule Max_in) (auto intro: exI[of _ 0])
  then have "2 ^ ?m ‚â§ Suc n" by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by linarith
qed

primrec satisfies0 where
  "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Fo m) = (m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO ‚â† {||})"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_Const i m n) =
   (let P = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO in if P = {||}
   then (case i of Some i ‚áí Length ùîÑ = i | _ ‚áí False)
   else fMin P = n)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Less b m1 m2) =
   (let P1 = m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO; P2 = m2‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO in if P1 = {||} ‚à® P2 = {||}
   then (case b of None ‚áí False | Some True ‚áí P2 = {||} | Some False ‚áí P1 ‚â† {||})
   else fMin P1 < fMin P2)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Plus_FO i m1 m2 n) =
   (let P1 = m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO; P2 = m2‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO in if P1 = {||} ‚à® P2 = {||}
   then (case i of Some 0 ‚áí P1 = P2 | Some i ‚áí P2 ‚â† {||} ‚àß fMin P2 + i = Length ùîÑ | _ ‚áí False)
   else fMin P1 = fMin P2 + n)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_FO b m1 m2) =
   (let P1 = m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO; P2 = m2‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO in if P1 = {||} ‚à® P2 = {||}
   then b ‚àß P1 = P2
   else fMin P1 = fMin P2)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_SO M1 M2) = (M1‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO = M2‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Suc_SO br bl M1 M2) =
   ((if br then finsert (Length ùîÑ) else id) (M1‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO) =
    (if bl then finsert 0 else id) (Suc |`| M2‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO))"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Empty M) = (M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO = {||})"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Singleton M) = (‚àÉx. M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO = {|x|})"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Subset M1 M2) = (M1‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO |‚äÜ| M2‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (In b m M) =
   (let P = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO in if P = {||} then b else fMin P |‚àà| M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_Max b m M) =
   (let P1 = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO; P2 = M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO in if b then P1 = {||}
   else if P1 = {||} ‚à® P2 = {||} then False else fMin P1 = fMax P2)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_Min b m M) =
   (let P1 = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO; P2 = M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO in if P1 = {||} ‚à® P2 = {||} then b ‚àß P1 = P2 else fMin P1 = fMin P2)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) = (M1‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO = M2‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO |‚à™| M3‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) = (M1‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO = M2‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO |‚à©| M3‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) = (M1‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO = M2‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO |-| M3‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Disjoint M1 M2) = (M1‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO |‚à©| M2‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO = {||})"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Eq_Presb i M n) = (((‚àëx‚ààfset (M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO). 2 ^ x) = n) ‚àß
   (case i of None ‚áí True | Some l ‚áí Length ùîÑ = l))"

fun lderiv0 where
  "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Fo m) = (if bs1 ! m then FBool True else FBase (Fo m))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Const None m n) = (if n = 0 ‚àß bs1 ! m then FBool True
     else if n = 0 ‚à® bs1 ! m then FBool False else FBase (Eq_Const None m (n - 1)))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Less None m1 m2) = (case (bs1 ! m1, bs1 ! m2) of
    (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Less None m1 m2)
  | (True, False) ‚áí FBase (Fo m2)
  | _ ‚áí FBool False)"|
 "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_FO False m1 m2) = (case (bs1 ! m1, bs1 ! m2) of
    (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Eq_FO False m1 m2)
  | (True, True) ‚áí FBool True
  | _ ‚áí FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n) = (if n = 0
  then
    (case (bs1 ! m1, bs1 ! m2) of
      (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n)
    | (True, True) ‚áí FBool True
    | _ ‚áí FBool False)
  else 
    (case (bs1 ! m1, bs1 ! m2) of
      (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n)
    | (False, True) ‚áí FBase (Eq_Const None m1 (n - 1))
    | _ ‚áí FBool False))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_SO M1 M2) =
  (if bs2 ! M1 = bs2 ! M2 then FBase (Eq_SO M1 M2) else FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Suc_SO False bl M1 M2) = (if bl = bs2 ! M1
    then FBase (Suc_SO False (bs2 ! M2) M1 M2) else FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Empty M) = (case bs2 ! M of
    True ‚áí FBool False
  | False ‚áí FBase (Empty M))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Singleton M) = (case bs2 ! M of
    True ‚áí FBase (Empty M)
  | False ‚áí FBase (Singleton M))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Subset M1 M2) = (case (bs2 ! M1, bs2 ! M2) of
    (True, False) ‚áí FBool False
  | _ ‚áí FBase (Subset M1 M2))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (In False m M) = (case (bs1 ! m, bs2 ! M) of
    (False, _) ‚áí FBase (In False m M)
  | (True, True) ‚áí FBool True
  | _ ‚áí FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Max False m M) = (case (bs1 ! m, bs2 ! M) of
    (False, _) ‚áí FBase (Eq_Max False m M)
  | (True, True) ‚áí FBase (Empty M)
  | _ ‚áí FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Min False m M) = (case (bs1 ! m, bs2 ! M) of
    (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Eq_Min False m M)
  | (True, True) ‚áí FBool True
  | _ ‚áí FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) = (if bs2 ! M1 = (bs2 ! M2 ‚à® bs2 ! M3)
   then FBase (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) else FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) = (if bs2 ! M1 = (bs2 ! M2 ‚àß bs2 ! M3)
   then FBase (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) else FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) = (if bs2 ! M1 = (bs2 ! M2 ‚àß ¬¨ bs2 ! M3)
   then FBase (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) else FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Disjoint M1 M2) =
  (if bs2 ! M1 ‚àß bs2 ! M2 then FBool False else FBase (Disjoint M1 M2))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Presb None M n) = (if bs2 ! M = (n mod 2 = 0)
   then FBool False else FBase (Eq_Presb None M (n div 2)))"
| "lderiv0 _ _ = undefined"

fun ld where
  "ld 0 = 0"
| "ld (Suc 0) = 0"
| "ld n = Suc (ld (n div 2))"

lemma ld_alt[simp]: "n > 0 ‚üπ ld n = Max {i. 2 ^ i ‚â§ n}"
proof (safe intro!: Max_eqI[symmetric])
  assume "n > 0" then show "2 ^ ld n ‚â§ n" by (induct n rule: ld.induct) auto
next
  fix y
  assume "2 ^ y ‚â§ n"
  then show "y ‚â§ ld n"
  proof (induct n arbitrary: y rule: ld.induct)
    case (3 z)
    then have "y - 1 ‚â§ ld (Suc (Suc z) div 2)"
      by (cases y) simp_all
    then show ?case by simp
  qed (auto simp: le_eq_less_or_eq)
qed simp

fun rderiv0 where
  "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Fo m) = (if bs1 ! m then FBool True else FBase (Fo m))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Const i m n) = (case bs1 ! m of
    False ‚áí FBase (Eq_Const (case i of Some (Suc i) ‚áí Some i | _ ‚áí None) m n)
  | True ‚áí FBase (Eq_Const (Some n) m n))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Less b m1 m2) = (case bs1 ! m2 of
    False ‚áí (case b of
      Some False ‚áí (case bs1 ! m1 of
        True ‚áí FBase (Less (Some True) m1 m2)
      | False ‚áí FBase (Less (Some False) m1 m2))
    | _ ‚áí FBase (Less b m1 m2))
  | True ‚áí FBase (Less (Some False) m1 m2))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Plus_FO i m1 m2 n) = (if n = 0
  then
    (case (bs1 ! m1, bs1 ! m2) of
      (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO i m1 m2 n)
    | (True, True) ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO (Some 0) m1 m2 n)
    | _ ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n))
  else
    (case bs1 ! m1 of
      True ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO (Some n) m1 m2 n)
    | False ‚áí (case bs1 ! m2 of
        False ‚áí (case i of
          Some (Suc (Suc i)) ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO (Some (Suc i)) m1 m2 n)
        | Some (Suc 0) ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n)
        | _ ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO i m1 m2 n))
      | True ‚áí (case i of
          Some (Suc i) ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO (Some i) m1 m2 n)
        | _ ‚áí FBase (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n)))))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_FO b m1 m2) = (case (bs1 ! m1, bs1 ! m2) of
    (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Eq_FO b m1 m2)
  | (True, True) ‚áí FBase (Eq_FO True m1 m2)
  | _ ‚áí FBase (Eq_FO False m1 m2))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_SO M1 M2) =
  (if bs2 ! M1 = bs2 ! M2 then FBase (Eq_SO M1 M2) else FBool False)"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Suc_SO br bl M1 M2) = (if br = bs2 ! M2
    then FBase (Suc_SO  (bs2 ! M1) bl M1 M2) else FBool False)"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Empty M) = (case bs2 ! M of
    True ‚áí FBool False
  | False ‚áí FBase (Empty M))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Singleton M) = (case bs2 ! M of
    True ‚áí FBase (Empty M)
  | False ‚áí FBase (Singleton M))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Subset M1 M2) = (case (bs2 ! M1, bs2 ! M2) of
    (True, False) ‚áí FBool False
  | _ ‚áí FBase (Subset M1 M2))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (In b m M) = (case (bs1 ! m, bs2 ! M) of
    (True, True) ‚áí FBase (In True m M)
  | (True, False) ‚áí FBase (In False m M)
  | _ ‚áí FBase (In b m M))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Max b m M) =  (case (bs1 ! m, bs2 ! M) of
    (True, True) ‚áí if b then FBool False else FBase (Eq_Max True m M)
  | (True, False) ‚áí if b then FBool False else FBase (Eq_Max False m M)
  | (False, True) ‚áí if b then FBase (Eq_Max True m M) else FBool False
  | (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Eq_Max b m M))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Min b m M) =  (case (bs1 ! m, bs2 ! M) of
    (True, True) ‚áí FBase (Eq_Min True m M)
  | (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Eq_Min b m M)
  | _ ‚áí FBase (Eq_Min False m M))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) = (if bs2 ! M1 = (bs2 ! M2 ‚à® bs2 ! M3)
   then FBase (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) else FBool False)"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) = (if bs2 ! M1 = (bs2 ! M2 ‚àß bs2 ! M3)
   then FBase (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) else FBool False)"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) = (if bs2 ! M1 = (bs2 ! M2 ‚àß ¬¨ bs2 ! M3)
   then FBase (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) else FBool False)"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Disjoint M1 M2) =
  (if bs2 ! M1 ‚àß bs2 ! M2 then FBool False else FBase (Disjoint M1 M2))"
| "rderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Eq_Presb l M n) = (case l of
     None ‚áí if bs2 ! M then
         if n = 0 then FBool False
         else let l = ld n in FBase (Eq_Presb (Some l) M (n - 2 ^ l))
       else FBase (Eq_Presb l M n)
  | Some 0 ‚áí FBool False
  | Some (Suc l) ‚áí if bs2 ! M ‚àß n ‚â• 2 ^ l then FBase (Eq_Presb (Some l) M (n - 2 ^ l))
      else if ¬¨ bs2 ! M ‚àß n < 2 ^ l then FBase (Eq_Presb (Some l) M n)
      else FBool False)"

primrec nullable0 where
  "nullable0 (Fo m) = False"
| "nullable0 (Eq_Const i m n) = (i = Some 0)"
| "nullable0 (Less b m1 m2) = (case b of None ‚áí False | Some b ‚áí b)"
| "nullable0 (Plus_FO i m1 m2 n) = (i = Some 0)"
| "nullable0 (Eq_FO b m1 m2) = b"
| "nullable0 (Eq_SO M1 M2) = True"
| "nullable0 (Suc_SO br bl M1 M2) = (bl = br)"
| "nullable0 (Empty M) = True"
| "nullable0 (Singleton M) = False"
| "nullable0 (Subset M1 M2) = True"
| "nullable0 (In b m M) = b"
| "nullable0 (Eq_Max b m M) = b"
| "nullable0 (Eq_Min b m M) = b"
| "nullable0 (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3) = True"
| "nullable0 (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3) = True"
| "nullable0 (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3) = True"
| "nullable0 (Disjoint M1 M2) = True"
| "nullable0 (Eq_Presb l M n) = (n = 0 ‚àß (l = Some 0 ‚à® l = None))"

definition "restrict ord P = (case ord of FO ‚áí P ‚â† {||} | SO ‚áí True)"
definition "Restrict ord i = (case ord of FO ‚áí FBase (Fo i) | SO ‚áí FBool True)"

declare [[goals_limit = 50]]


global_interpretation WS1S: Formula SUC LESS assigns nvars Extend CONS SNOC Length
  extend size_atom zero œÉ eval downshift upshift finsert cut len restrict Restrict
  lformula0 FV0 find0 wf0 decr0 satisfies0 nullable0 lderiv0 rderiv0 undefined
  defines norm = "Formula_Operations.norm find0 decr0"
  and nFOr = "Formula_Operations.nFOr :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFAnd = "Formula_Operations.nFAnd :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFNot = "Formula_Operations.nFNot find0 decr0 :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFEx = "Formula_Operations.nFEx find0 decr0"
  and nFAll = "Formula_Operations.nFAll find0 decr0"
  and decr = "Formula_Operations.decr decr0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and find = "Formula_Operations.find find0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and FV = "Formula_Operations.FV FV0"
  and RESTR = "Formula_Operations.RESTR Restrict :: _ ‚áí formula"
  and RESTRICT = "Formula_Operations.RESTRICT Restrict FV0"
  and deriv = "Œªd0 (a :: atom) (œÜ :: formula). Formula_Operations.deriv extend d0 a œÜ"
  and nullable = "ŒªœÜ :: formula. Formula_Operations.nullable nullable0 œÜ"
  and fut_default = "Formula.fut_default extend zero rderiv0"
  and fut = "Formula.fut extend zero find0 decr0 rderiv0"
  and finalize = "Formula.finalize SUC extend zero find0 decr0 rderiv0"
  and final = "Formula.final SUC extend zero find0 decr0
     nullable0 rderiv0 :: idx ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and ws1s_wf = "Formula_Operations.wf SUC (wf0 :: idx ‚áí ws1s ‚áí _)"
  and ws1s_lformula = "Formula_Operations.lformula lformula0 :: formula ‚áí _"
  and check_eqv = "Œªidx. DAs.check_eqv
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    (final idx) (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ)
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    (final idx) (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ) (=)"
  and bounded_check_eqv = "Œªidx. DAs.check_eqv
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    nullable (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ)
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    nullable (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ) (=)"
  and automaton = "DA.automaton
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv lderiv0 (a :: atom) œÜ :: formula))"
proof
  fix k idx and a :: ws1s and l assume "wf0 (SUC k idx) a" "LESS k l (SUC k idx)" "¬¨ find0 k l a"
  then show "wf0 idx (decr0 k l a)"
    by (induct a) (unfold wf0.simps atomic.map find0.simps,
     (transfer, force simp: dec_def split!: if_splits order.splits)+)
next
  fix k and a :: ws1s and l assume "lformula0 a"
  then show "lformula0 (decr0 k l a)" by (induct a) auto
next
  fix i k and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp and P assume *: "¬¨ find0 k i a" "LESS k i (SUC k (#‚á©V ùîÑ))"
    and disj: "lformula0 a ‚à® len P ‚â§ Length ùîÑ"
  from disj show "satisfies0 (Extend k i ùîÑ P) a = satisfies0 ùîÑ (decr0 k i a)"
  proof
    assume "lformula0 a"
    then show ?thesis using *
      by (induct a rule: lformula0.induct)
        (auto simp: dec_def split: if_splits order.split option.splits bool.splits) ‚Äï ‚Äπslow‚Ä∫
  next
    note dec_def[simp]
    assume "len P ‚â§ Length ùîÑ"
    with * show ?thesis
    proof (induct a)
      case Fo then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    next
      case Eq_Const then show ?case
        by (cases k) (auto simp: Let_def len_def split: if_splits option.splits)
    next
      case Less then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    next
      case Plus_FO then show ?case
        by (cases k) (auto simp: max_def len_def Let_def split: option.splits nat.splits)
    next
      case Eq_FO then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    next
      case Eq_SO then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    next
      case (Suc_SO br bl M1 M2) then show ?case
        by (cases k) (auto simp: max_def len_def)
    next
      case Empty then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    next
      case Singleton then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    next
      case Subset then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    next
      case In then show ?case by (cases k) auto
    qed (auto simp: len_def max_def split!: option.splits order.splits)
  qed
next
  fix idx and a :: ws1s and x assume "lformula0 a" "wf0 idx a"
  then show "Formula_Operations.wf SUC wf0 idx (lderiv0 x a)"
    by (induct a rule: lderiv0.induct)
      (auto simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps Let_def split: bool.splits order.splits)
next
  fix a :: ws1s and x assume "lformula0 a"
  then show "Formula_Operations.lformula lformula0 (lderiv0 x a)"
    by (induct a rule: lderiv0.induct)
      (auto simp: Formula_Operations.lformula.simps split: bool.splits)
next
  fix idx and a :: ws1s and x assume "wf0 idx a"
  then show "Formula_Operations.wf SUC wf0 idx (rderiv0 x a)"
    by (induct a rule: lderiv0.induct)
      (auto simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps Let_def sorted_append
        split: bool.splits order.splits nat.splits)
next
  fix ùîÑ :: interp and a :: ws1s
  note fmember.rep_eq[symmetric, simp]
  assume "Length ùîÑ = 0"
  then show "nullable0 a = satisfies0 ùîÑ a"
    by (induct a, unfold wf0.simps nullable0.simps satisfies0.simps Let_def)
      (transfer, (auto 0 3 dest: MSB_greater split: prod.splits if_splits option.splits bool.splits nat.splits) [])+  ‚Äï ‚Äπslow‚Ä∫
next
   note Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps[simp] Let_def[simp] upshift_def[simp]
   fix x :: atom and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp
   assume "lformula0 a" "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x"
   then show "Formula_Operations.satisfies Extend Length satisfies0 ùîÑ (lderiv0 x a) =
     satisfies0 (CONS x ùîÑ) a"
   proof (induct a)
     case 18
     then show ?case
       apply (auto simp: sum_pow2_image_Suc sum_pow2_insert0 image_iff split: prod.splits)
       apply presburger+
       done
   qed (auto split: prod.splits bool.splits)
next
   note Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps[simp] Let_def[simp] upshift_def[simp]
   fix x :: atom and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp
   assume "lformula0 a" "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x"
   then show "Formula_Operations.satisfies_bounded Extend Length len satisfies0 ùîÑ (lderiv0 x a) =
     satisfies0 (CONS x ùîÑ) a"
   proof (induct a)
     case 18
     then show ?case
       apply (auto simp: sum_pow2_image_Suc sum_pow2_insert0 image_iff split: prod.splits)
       apply presburger+
       done
   qed (auto split: prod.splits bool.splits)
next
   note Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps[simp] Let_def[simp]
   fix x :: atom and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp
   assume "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x"
   then show "Formula_Operations.satisfies_bounded Extend Length len satisfies0 ùîÑ (rderiv0 x a) =
     satisfies0 (SNOC x ùîÑ) a"
   proof (induct a)
     case Eq_Const then show ?case by (auto split: prod.splits option.splits nat.splits)
   next
     case Less then show ?case
       by (auto split: prod.splits option.splits bool.splits) (metis fMin_less_Length less_not_sym)+
   next
     case (Plus_FO i m1 m2 n) then show ?case
       by (auto simp: min.commute dest: fMin_less_Length
          split: prod.splits option.splits nat.splits bool.splits)
   next
     case Eq_FO then show ?case
       by (auto split: prod.splits option.splits bool.splits) (metis fMin_less_Length less_not_sym)+
   next
     case Eq_SO then show ?case
       by (auto split: prod.splits option.splits bool.splits)
         (metis assigns_less_Length finsertI1 less_not_refl)+
   next
     case Suc_SO then show ?case
     apply (auto 2 1 split: prod.splits)
                       apply (metis finsert_iff gr0_implies_Suc in_fimage_Suc nat.distinct(2))
                      apply (metis finsert_iff in_fimage_Suc less_not_refl)
                     apply (metis (no_types, hide_lams) fimage_finsert finsertE finsertI1 finsert_commute in_fimage_Suc n_not_Suc_n)
                    apply (metis (no_types, hide_lams) assigns_less_Length order.strict_iff_order finsert_iff in_fimage_Suc not_less_eq_eq order_refl)
                   apply (metis assigns_less_Length fimageI finsert_iff less_irrefl_nat nat.inject)
                  apply (metis finsertE finsertI1 finsert_commute finsert_fminus_single in_fimage_Suc n_not_Suc_n)
                 apply (metis (no_types, hide_lams) assigns_less_Length finsertE fminus_finsert2 fminus_iff in_fimage_Suc lessI not_less_iff_gr_or_eq)
                apply (metis assigns_less_Length finsert_iff lessI not_less_iff_gr_or_eq)
               apply (metis assigns_less_Length fimage_finsert finsert_iff not_less_eq not_less_iff_gr_or_eq)
              apply metis
             apply (metis assigns_less_Length order.strict_iff_order finsert_iff in_fimage_Suc not_less_eq_eq order_refl)
            apply (metis Suc_leI assigns_less_Length fimageI finsert_iff le_eq_less_or_eq lessI less_imp_not_less)
           apply (metis assigns_less_Length fimageE finsertI1 finsert_fminus_if fminus_finsert_absorb lessI less_not_sym)
          apply (metis assigns_less_Length order.strict_iff_order finsert_iff not_less_eq_eq order_refl)
         apply (metis assigns_less_Length order.strict_iff_order finsert_iff not_less_eq_eq order_refl)
        apply (metis assigns_less_Length fimage_Suc_inj fimage_finsert finsert_absorb finsert_iff less_not_refl nat.distinct(2))
       apply (metis assigns_less_Length fimage_Suc_inj fimage_finsert finsertI1 finsert_absorb less_not_refl)
      apply (metis assigns_less_Length fimage_Suc_inj fimage_finsert finsert_absorb finsert_iff less_not_refl nat.distinct(2))
     apply (metis assigns_less_Length fimage_Suc_inj fimage_finsert finsertI1 finsert_absorb2 less_not_refl)
     done
   next
     case In then show ?case by (auto split: prod.splits) (metis fMin_less_Length less_not_sym)+
   next
     case (Eq_Max b m M) then show ?case
       by (auto split: prod.splits bool.splits)
         (metis fMax_less_Length less_not_sym, (metis fMin_less_Length less_not_sym)+)
   next
     case Eq_Min then show ?case
      by (auto split: prod.splits bool.splits) (metis fMin_less_Length less_not_sym)+
   next
     case Eq_Union then show ?case
       by (auto 0 0 simp add: fset_eq_iff split: prod.splits) (metis assigns_less_Length less_not_refl)+
   next
     case Eq_Inter then show ?case
       by (auto 0 0 simp add: fset_eq_iff split: prod.splits) (metis assigns_less_Length less_not_refl)+
   next
     case Eq_Diff then show ?case
       by (auto 0 1 simp add: fset_eq_iff split: prod.splits) (metis assigns_less_Length less_not_refl)+
   next
     let ?f = "sum ((^) (2 :: nat))"
     note fmember.rep_eq[symmetric, simp]
     case (Eq_Presb l M n)
     moreover
     let ?M = "fset (M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)" and ?L = "Length ùîÑ"
     have "?f (insert ?L ?M) = 2 ^ ?L + ?f ?M"
       by (subst sum.insert) auto
     moreover have "n > 0 ‚üπ 2 ^ Max {i. 2 ^ i ‚â§ n} ‚â§ n"
       using Max_in[of "{i. 2 ^ i ‚â§ n}", simplified, OF exI[of _ 0]] by auto
     moreover
     { have "?f ?M ‚â§ ?f {0 ..< ?L}" by (rule sum_mono2) auto
       also have "‚Ä¶ = 2 ^ ?L - 1" by (rule sum_pow2_upto)
       also have "‚Ä¶ < 2 ^ ?L" by simp
       finally have "?f ?M < 2 ^ ?L" .
     }
     moreover have "Max {i. 2 ^ i ‚â§ 2 ^ ?L + ?f ?M} = ?L"
     proof (intro Max_eqI, safe)
       fix y assume "2 ^ y ‚â§ 2 ^ ?L + ?f ?M"
       { assume "?L < y"
         then have "(2 :: nat) ^ ?L + 2 ^ ?L ‚â§ 2 ^ y"
           by (cases y) (auto simp: less_Suc_eq_le numeral_eq_Suc add_le_mono)
         also note ‚Äπ2 ^ y ‚â§ 2 ^ ?L + ?f ?M‚Ä∫
         finally have " 2 ^ ?L ‚â§ ?f ?M" by simp
         with ‚Äπ?f ?M < 2 ^ ?L‚Ä∫ have False by auto
       } then show "y ‚â§ ?L" by (intro leI) blast
     qed auto
     ultimately show ?case by (auto split: prod.splits option.splits nat.splits)
   qed (auto split: prod.splits)
next
   fix a :: ws1s and ùîÑ ùîÖ :: interp
   assume "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÖ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ" "(‚ãÄm k. LESS k m (#‚á©V ùîÖ) ‚üπ m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÖ‚áñk)" "lformula0 a"
   then show "satisfies0 ùîÑ a ‚ü∑ satisfies0 ùîÖ a" by (induct a) auto
next
   fix a :: ws1s
   assume "lformula0 a"
   moreover
   define d where "d = Formula_Operations.deriv extend lderiv0"
   define Œ¶ :: "_ ‚áí (ws1s, order) aformula set"
     where "Œ¶ a =
       (case a of
         Fo m ‚áí {FBase (Fo m), FBool True}
       | Eq_Const None m n ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Const None m i) | i . i ‚â§ n} ‚à™ {FBool True, FBool False}
       | Less None m1 m2 ‚áí {FBase (Less None m1 m2), FBase (Fo m2), FBool True, FBool False}
       | Plus_FO None m1 m2 n ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Const None m1 i) | i . i ‚â§ n} ‚à™
          {FBase (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n), FBool True, FBool False}
       | Eq_FO False m1 m2 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_FO False m1 m2), FBool True, FBool False}
       | Eq_SO M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_SO M1 M2), FBool False}
       | Suc_SO False bl M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Suc_SO False True M1 M2), FBase (Suc_SO False False M1 M2),
           FBool False}
       | Empty M ‚áí {FBase (Empty M), FBool False}
       | Singleton M ‚áí {FBase (Singleton M), FBase (Empty M), FBool False}
       | Subset M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Subset M1 M2), FBool False}
       | In False i I ‚áí {FBase (In False i I), FBool True, FBool False}
       | Eq_Max False m M ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Max False m M), FBase (Empty M), FBool False}
       | Eq_Min False m M ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Min False m M), FBool True, FBool False}
       | Eq_Union M1 M2 M3 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3), FBool False}
       | Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3), FBool False}
       | Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3), FBool False}
       | Disjoint M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Disjoint M1 M2), FBool False}
       | Eq_Presb None M n ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Presb None M i) | i . i ‚â§ n} ‚à™ {FBool False}
       | _ ‚áí {})" for a
   { fix xs
     note Formula_Operations.fold_deriv_FBool[simp] Formula_Operations.deriv.simps[simp] Œ¶_def[simp]
     from ‚Äπlformula0 a‚Ä∫ have "FBase a ‚àà Œ¶ a" by auto
     moreover have "‚ãÄx œÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ d x œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
       by (auto simp: d_def split: atomic.splits list.splits bool.splits if_splits option.splits)
     then have "‚ãÄœÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ fold d xs œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (induct xs) auto
     ultimately have "fold d xs (FBase a) ‚àà Œ¶ a" by blast
   }
   moreover have "finite (Œ¶ a)" using ‚Äπlformula0 a‚Ä∫ unfolding Œ¶_def by (auto split: atomic.splits)
   ultimately show "finite {fold d xs (FBase a) | xs. True}" by (blast intro: finite_subset)
next
   fix a :: ws1s
   define d where "d = Formula_Operations.deriv extend rderiv0"
   define Œ¶ :: "_ ‚áí (ws1s, order) aformula set"
     where "Œ¶ a =
       (case a of
         Fo m ‚áí {FBase (Fo m), FBool True}
       | Eq_Const i m n ‚áí
          {FBase (Eq_Const (Some j) m n) | j . j ‚â§ (case i of Some i ‚áí max i n | _ ‚áí n)} ‚à™
          {FBase (Eq_Const None m n)}
       | Less b m1 m2 ‚áí {FBase (Less None m1 m2), FBase (Less (Some True) m1 m2),
          FBase (Less (Some False) m1 m2)}
       | Plus_FO i m1 m2 n ‚áí 
          {FBase (Plus_FO (Some j) m1 m2 n) | j . j ‚â§ (case i of Some i ‚áí max i n | _ ‚áí n)} ‚à™
          {FBase (Plus_FO None m1 m2 n)}
       | Eq_FO b m1 m2 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_FO True m1 m2), FBase (Eq_FO False m1 m2)}
       | Eq_SO M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_SO M1 M2), FBool False}
       | Suc_SO br bl M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Suc_SO False True M1 M2), FBase (Suc_SO False False M1 M2),
           FBase (Suc_SO True True M1 M2), FBase (Suc_SO True False M1 M2), FBool False}
       | Empty M ‚áí {FBase (Empty M), FBool False}
       | Singleton M ‚áí {FBase (Singleton M), FBase (Empty M), FBool False}
       | Subset M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Subset M1 M2), FBool False}
       | In b i I ‚áí {FBase (In True i I), FBase (In False i I)}
       | Eq_Max b m M ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Max False m M), FBase (Eq_Max True m M), FBool False}
       | Eq_Min b m M ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Min False m M), FBase (Eq_Min True m M)}
       | Eq_Union M1 M2 M3 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Union M1 M2 M3), FBool False}
       | Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Inter M1 M2 M3), FBool False}
       | Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3 ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Diff M1 M2 M3), FBool False}
       | Disjoint M1 M2 ‚áí {FBase (Disjoint M1 M2), FBool False}
       | Eq_Presb i M n ‚áí {FBase (Eq_Presb (Some l) M j) | j l .
           j ‚â§ (case i of Some i ‚áí max i n | _ ‚áí n) ‚àß l ‚â§ (case i of Some i ‚áí max i n | _ ‚áí n)} ‚à™
           {FBase (Eq_Presb None M n), FBool False})" for a
   { fix xs
     note Formula_Operations.fold_deriv_FBool[simp] Formula_Operations.deriv.simps[simp] Œ¶_def[simp]
     then have "FBase a ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (auto split: atomic.splits option.splits)
     moreover have "‚ãÄx œÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ d x œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
       by (auto simp add: d_def Let_def not_le gr0_conv_Suc leD[OF ld_bounded]
         split: atomic.splits list.splits bool.splits if_splits option.splits nat.splits)
     then have "‚ãÄœÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ fold d xs œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
       by (induct xs) auto
     ultimately have "fold d xs (FBase a) ‚àà Œ¶ a" by blast
   }
   moreover have "finite (Œ¶ a)" unfolding Œ¶_def using [[simproc add: finite_Collect]]
     by (auto split: atomic.splits)
   ultimately show "finite {fold d xs (FBase a) | xs. True}" by (blast intro: finite_subset)
next
  fix k l and a :: ws1s
  show "find0 k l a ‚ü∑ l ‚àà FV0 k a" by (induct a rule: find0.induct) auto
next
  fix a :: ws1s and k :: order
  show "finite (FV0 k a)" by (cases k) (induct a, auto)+
next
  fix idx a k v
  assume "wf0 idx a" "v ‚àà FV0 k a"
  then show "LESS k v idx" by (cases k) (induct a, auto)+
next
  fix idx k i
  assume "LESS k i idx"
  then show "Formula_Operations.wf SUC wf0 idx (Restrict k i)"
     unfolding Restrict_def by (cases k) (auto simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps)
next
  fix k and i :: nat
  show "Formula_Operations.lformula lformula0 (Restrict k i)"
    unfolding Restrict_def by (cases k) (auto simp: Formula_Operations.lformula.simps)
next
  fix i ùîÑ k P r
  assume "i‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = P"
  then show "restrict k P ‚ü∑
    Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen Extend Length satisfies0 r ùîÑ (Restrict k i)"
    unfolding restrict_def Restrict_def
    by (cases k) (auto simp: Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps)
qed (auto simp: Extend_commute_unsafe downshift_def upshift_def fimage_iff Suc_le_eq len_def
  dec_def eval_def cut_def len_downshift_helper dest!: CONS_surj
  dest: fMax_ge fMax_ffilter_less fMax_boundedD fsubset_fsingletonD
  split!: order.splits if_splits)

(*Workaround for code generation*)
lemma check_eqv_code[code]: "check_eqv idx r s =
  ((ws1s_wf idx r ‚àß ws1s_lformula r) ‚àß (ws1s_wf idx s ‚àß ws1s_lformula s) ‚àß
  (case rtrancl_while (Œª(p, q). final idx p = final idx q)
    (Œª(p, q). map (Œªa. (norm (deriv lderiv0 a p), norm (deriv lderiv0 a q))) (œÉ idx))
    (norm (RESTRICT r), norm (RESTRICT s)) of
    None ‚áí False
  | Some ([], x) ‚áí True
  | Some (a # list, x) ‚áí False))"
  unfolding check_eqv_def WS1S.check_eqv_def WS1S.step_alt ..

definition while where [code del, code_abbrev]: "while idx œÜ = while_default (fut_default idx œÜ)"
declare while_default_code[of "fut_default idx œÜ" for idx œÜ, folded while_def, code]

lemma check_eqv_sound: 
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ (WS1S.sat ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ WS1S.sat ùîÑ œà)"
  unfolding check_eqv_def by (rule WS1S.check_eqv_soundness)

lemma bounded_check_eqv_sound:
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; bounded_check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ (WS1S.sat‚á©b ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ WS1S.sat‚á©b ùîÑ œà)"
  unfolding bounded_check_eqv_def by (rule WS1S.bounded_check_eqv_soundness)

method_setup check_equiv = ‚Äπ
  let
    fun tac ctxt =
      let
        val conv = @{computation_check terms: Trueprop
          "0 :: nat" "1 :: nat" "2 :: nat" "3 :: nat" Suc
          "plus :: nat ‚áí _" "minus :: nat ‚áí _"
          "times :: nat ‚áí _" "divide :: nat ‚áí _" "modulo :: nat ‚áí _"
          "0 :: int" "1 :: int" "2 :: int" "3 :: int" "-1 :: int"
          check_eqv datatypes: formula "int list" integer idx
         "nat √ó nat" "nat option" "bool option"} ctxt
      in
        CONVERSION (Conv.params_conv ~1 (K (Conv.concl_conv ~1 conv)) ctxt) THEN'
        resolve_tac ctxt [TrueI]
      end
  in
    Scan.succeed (SIMPLE_METHOD' o tac)
  end
‚Ä∫

end

Theory WS1S_Alt_Formula

section ‚ÄπConcrete Atomic WS1S Formulas (Singleton Semantics for FO Variables)‚Ä∫

(*<*)
theory WS1S_Alt_Formula
imports
  Abstract_Formula
  WS1S_Prelim
begin
(*>*)

datatype (FOV0: 'fo, SOV0: 'so) atomic =
  Fo 'fo |
  Z 'fo |
  Less 'fo 'fo |
  In 'fo 'so

derive linorder atomic

type_synonym fo = nat
type_synonym so = nat
type_synonym ws1s = "(fo, so) atomic"
type_synonym formula = "(ws1s, order) aformula"

primrec wf0 where
  "wf0 idx (Fo m) = LESS FO m idx"
| "wf0 idx (Z m) = LESS FO m idx"
| "wf0 idx (Less m1 m2) = (LESS FO m1 idx ‚àß LESS FO m2 idx)"
| "wf0 idx (In m M) = (LESS FO m idx ‚àß LESS SO M idx)"

inductive lformula0 where
  "lformula0 (Fo m)"
| "lformula0 (Z m)"
| "lformula0 (Less m1 m2)"
| "lformula0 (In m M)"

code_pred lformula0 .

declare lformula0.intros[simp]

inductive_cases lformula0E[elim]: "lformula0 a"

abbreviation "FV0 ‚â° case_order FOV0 SOV0"

fun find0 where
  "find0 FO i (Fo m) = (i = m)"
| "find0 FO i (Z m) = (i = m)"
| "find0 FO i (Less m1 m2) = (i = m1 ‚à® i = m2)"
| "find0 FO i (In m _) = (i = m)"
| "find0 SO i (In _ M) = (i = M)"
| "find0 _ _ _ = False"

abbreviation "decr0 ord k ‚â° map_atomic (case_order (dec k) id ord) (case_order id (dec k) ord)"

primrec satisfies0 where
  "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Fo m) = (‚àÉx. m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO = {|x|})"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Z m) = (m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO = {||})"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (Less m1 m2) =
   (let P1 = m1‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO; P2 = m2‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO in if ¬¨(‚àÉx. P1 = {|x|}) ‚à® ¬¨(‚àÉx. P2 = {|x|})
   then False
   else fthe_elem P1 < fthe_elem P2)"
| "satisfies0 ùîÑ (In m M) =
   (let P = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO in if ¬¨(‚àÉx. P = {|x|}) then False else fMin P |‚àà| M‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO)"

fun lderiv0 where
  "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Fo m) = (if bs1 ! m then FBase (Z m) else FBase (Fo m))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Z m) = (if bs1 ! m then FBool False else FBase (Z m))"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (Less m1 m2) = (case (bs1 ! m1, bs1 ! m2) of
    (False, False) ‚áí FBase (Less m1 m2)
  | (True, False) ‚áí FAnd (FBase (Z m1)) (FBase (Fo m2))
  | _ ‚áí FBool False)"
| "lderiv0 (bs1, bs2) (In m M) = (case (bs1 ! m, bs2 ! M) of
    (False, _) ‚áí FBase (In m M)
  | (True, True) ‚áí FBase (Z m)
  | _ ‚áí FBool False)"

primrec rev where
  "rev (Fo m) = Fo m"
| "rev (Z m) = Z m"
| "rev (Less m1 m2) = Less m2 m1"
| "rev (In m M) = In m M"

abbreviation "rderiv0 v ‚â° map_aformula rev id o lderiv0 v o rev"

primrec nullable0 where
  "nullable0 (Fo m) = False"
| "nullable0 (Z m) = True"
| "nullable0 (Less m1 m2) = False"
| "nullable0 (In m M) = False"

lemma fimage_Suc_fsubset0[simp]: "Suc |`| A |‚äÜ| {|0|} ‚ü∑ A = {||}"
  by blast

lemma fsubset_singleton_iff: "A |‚äÜ| {|x|} ‚ü∑ A = {||} ‚à® A = {|x|}"
  by blast

definition "restrict ord P = (case ord of FO ‚áí ‚àÉx. P = {|x|} | SO ‚áí True)"
definition "Restrict ord i = (case ord of FO ‚áí FBase (Fo i) | SO ‚áí FBool True)"

declare [[goals_limit = 50]]


global_interpretation WS1S_Alt: Formula SUC LESS assigns nvars Extend CONS SNOC Length
  extend size_atom zero œÉ eval downshift upshift finsert cut len restrict Restrict
  lformula0 FV0 find0 wf0 decr0 satisfies0 nullable0 lderiv0 rderiv0 undefined
  defines norm = "Formula_Operations.norm find0 decr0"
  and nFOr = "Formula_Operations.nFOr :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFAnd = "Formula_Operations.nFAnd :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFNot = "Formula_Operations.nFNot find0 decr0 :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFEx = "Formula_Operations.nFEx find0 decr0"
  and nFAll = "Formula_Operations.nFAll find0 decr0"
  and decr = "Formula_Operations.decr decr0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and find = "Formula_Operations.find find0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and FV = "Formula_Operations.FV FV0"
  and RESTR = "Formula_Operations.RESTR Restrict :: _ ‚áí formula"
  and RESTRICT = "Formula_Operations.RESTRICT Restrict FV0"
  and deriv = "Œªd0 (a :: atom) (œÜ :: formula). Formula_Operations.deriv extend d0 a œÜ"
  and nullable = "ŒªœÜ :: formula. Formula_Operations.nullable nullable0 œÜ"
  and fut_default = "Formula.fut_default extend zero rderiv0"
  and fut = "Formula.fut extend zero find0 decr0 rderiv0"
  and finalize = "Formula.finalize SUC extend zero find0 decr0 rderiv0"
  and final = "Formula.final SUC extend zero find0 decr0
     nullable0 rderiv0 :: idx ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and ws1s_wf = "Formula_Operations.wf SUC (wf0 :: idx ‚áí ws1s ‚áí _)"
  and ws1s_lformula = "Formula_Operations.lformula lformula0 :: formula ‚áí _"
  and check_eqv = "Œªidx. DAs.check_eqv
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    (final idx) (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ)
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    (final idx) (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ) (=)"
  and bounded_check_eqv = "Œªidx. DAs.check_eqv
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    nullable (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ)
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    nullable (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ) (=)"
  and automaton = "DA.automaton
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv lderiv0 (a :: atom) œÜ :: formula))"
proof
  fix k idx and a :: ws1s and l assume "wf0 (SUC k idx) a" "LESS k l (SUC k idx)" "¬¨ find0 k l a"
  then show "wf0 idx (decr0 k l a)"
    by (induct a) (unfold wf0.simps atomic.map find0.simps,
     (transfer, force simp: dec_def split: if_splits order.splits)+) ‚Äï ‚Äπslow‚Ä∫
next
  fix k and a :: ws1s and l assume "lformula0 a"
  then show "lformula0 (decr0 k l a)" by (induct a) auto
next
  fix i k and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp and P assume *: "¬¨ find0 k i a" "LESS k i (SUC k (#‚á©V ùîÑ))"
    and disj: "lformula0 a ‚à® len P ‚â§ Length ùîÑ"
  from disj show "satisfies0 (Extend k i ùîÑ P) a = satisfies0 ùîÑ (decr0 k i a)"
  proof
    assume "lformula0 a"
    then show ?thesis using *
      by (induct a)
        (auto simp: dec_def split: if_splits order.split option.splits bool.splits) ‚Äï ‚Äπslow‚Ä∫
  next
    assume "len P ‚â§ Length ùîÑ"
    with * show ?thesis
    proof (induct a)
      case Fo then show ?case by (cases k) (auto simp: dec_def)
    next
      case Z then show ?case by (cases k) (auto simp: dec_def)
    next
      case Less then show ?case by (cases k) (auto simp: dec_def)
    next
      case In then show ?case by (cases k) (auto simp: dec_def)
    qed
  qed
next
  fix idx and a :: ws1s and x assume "lformula0 a" "wf0 idx a"
  then show "Formula_Operations.wf SUC wf0 idx (lderiv0 x a)"
    by (induct a rule: lderiv0.induct)
      (auto simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps Let_def split: bool.splits order.splits)
next
  fix a :: ws1s and x assume "lformula0 a"
  then show "Formula_Operations.lformula lformula0 (lderiv0 x a)"
    by (induct a rule: lderiv0.induct)
      (auto simp: Formula_Operations.lformula.simps split: bool.splits)
next
  fix idx and a :: ws1s and x assume "wf0 idx a"
  then show "Formula_Operations.wf SUC wf0 idx (rderiv0 x a)"
    by (induct a rule: lderiv0.induct)
      (auto simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps Let_def sorted_append
        split: bool.splits order.splits nat.splits)
next
  fix ùîÑ :: interp and a :: ws1s
  note fmember.rep_eq[symmetric, simp]
  assume "Length ùîÑ = 0"
  then show "nullable0 a = satisfies0 ùîÑ a"
    by (induct a, unfold wf0.simps nullable0.simps satisfies0.simps Let_def)
      (transfer, (auto 0 3 dest: MSB_greater split: prod.splits if_splits option.splits bool.splits nat.splits) [])+  ‚Äï ‚Äπslow‚Ä∫
next
   note Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps[simp] Let_def[simp] upshift_def[simp]
   fix x :: atom and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp
   assume "lformula0 a" "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x"
   then show "Formula_Operations.satisfies Extend Length satisfies0 ùîÑ (lderiv0 x a) =
     satisfies0 (CONS x ùîÑ) a"
   proof (induct a)
   qed (auto split: prod.splits bool.splits)
next
   note Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps[simp] Let_def[simp] upshift_def[simp]
   fix x :: atom and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp
   assume "lformula0 a" "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x"
   then show "Formula_Operations.satisfies_bounded Extend Length len satisfies0 ùîÑ (lderiv0 x a) =
     satisfies0 (CONS x ùîÑ) a"
     by (induct a) (auto split: prod.splits bool.splits)
next
   note Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps[simp] Let_def[simp]
   fix x :: atom and a :: ws1s and ùîÑ :: interp
   assume "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = size_atom x"
   then show "Formula_Operations.satisfies_bounded Extend Length len satisfies0 ùîÑ (rderiv0 x a) =
     satisfies0 (SNOC x ùîÑ) a"
   proof (induct a)
     case Less then show ?case
       apply (auto 2 0 split: prod.splits option.splits bool.splits)
       apply (auto simp add: fsubset_singleton_iff)
       apply (metis assigns_less_Length finsertCI less_not_sym)
       apply force
       apply (metis assigns_less_Length finsertCI less_not_sym)
       apply force
       done
   next
     case In then show ?case by (force split: prod.splits)
   qed (auto split: prod.splits)
next
   fix a :: ws1s and ùîÑ ùîÖ :: interp
   assume "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÖ) a" "#‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ" "(‚ãÄm k. LESS k m (#‚á©V ùîÖ) ‚üπ m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÖ‚áñk)" "lformula0 a"
   then show "satisfies0 ùîÑ a ‚ü∑ satisfies0 ùîÖ a" by (induct a) auto
next
   fix a :: ws1s
   assume "lformula0 a"
   moreover
   define d where "d = Formula_Operations.deriv extend lderiv0"
   define Œ¶ :: "_ ‚áí (ws1s, order) aformula set"
     where "Œ¶ a =
       (case a of
         Fo m ‚áí {FBase (Fo m), FBase (Z m), FBool False}
       | Z m ‚áí {FBase (Z m), FBool False}
       | Less m1 m2 ‚áí {FBase (Less m1 m2),
          FAnd (FBase (Z m1)) (FBase (Fo m2)),
          FAnd (FBase (Z m1)) (FBase (Z m2)),
          FAnd (FBase (Z m1)) (FBool False),
          FAnd (FBool False) (FBase (Fo m2)),
          FAnd (FBool False) (FBase (Z m2)),
          FAnd (FBool False) (FBool False),
         FBool False}
       | In i I ‚áí {FBase (In i I),  FBase (Z i), FBool False})" for a
   { fix xs
     note Formula_Operations.fold_deriv_FBool[simp] Formula_Operations.deriv.simps[simp] Œ¶_def[simp]
     from ‚Äπlformula0 a‚Ä∫ have "FBase a ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (cases a) auto
     moreover have "‚ãÄx œÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ d x œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
       by (auto simp: d_def split: atomic.splits list.splits bool.splits if_splits option.splits)
     then have "‚ãÄœÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ fold d xs œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (induct xs) auto
     ultimately have "fold d xs (FBase a) ‚àà Œ¶ a" by blast
   }
   moreover have "finite (Œ¶ a)" using ‚Äπlformula0 a‚Ä∫ unfolding Œ¶_def by (auto split: atomic.splits)
   ultimately show "finite {fold d xs (FBase a) | xs. True}" by (blast intro: finite_subset)
next
   fix a :: ws1s
   define d where "d = Formula_Operations.deriv extend rderiv0"
   define Œ¶ :: "_ ‚áí (ws1s, order) aformula set"
     where "Œ¶ a =
       (case a of
         Fo m ‚áí {FBase (Fo m), FBase (Z m), FBool False}
       | Z m ‚áí {FBase (Z m), FBool False}
       | Less m1 m2 ‚áí {FBase (Less m1 m2),
          FAnd (FBase (Z m2)) (FBase (Fo m1)) ,
          FAnd (FBase (Z m2)) (FBase (Z m1)),
          FAnd (FBase (Z m2)) (FBool False),
          FAnd (FBool False) (FBase (Fo m1)),
          FAnd (FBool False) (FBase (Z m1)),
          FAnd (FBool False) (FBool False),
         FBool False}
       | In i I ‚áí {FBase (In i I),  FBase (Z i), FBool False})" for a
   { fix xs
     note Formula_Operations.fold_deriv_FBool[simp] Formula_Operations.deriv.simps[simp] Œ¶_def[simp]
     then have "FBase a ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (auto split: atomic.splits option.splits)
     moreover have "‚ãÄx œÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ d x œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
       by (auto simp add: d_def Let_def not_le gr0_conv_Suc
         split: atomic.splits list.splits bool.splits if_splits option.splits nat.splits)
     then have "‚ãÄœÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ fold d xs œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
       by (induct xs) auto
     ultimately have "fold d xs (FBase a) ‚àà Œ¶ a" by blast
   }
   moreover have "finite (Œ¶ a)" unfolding Œ¶_def using [[simproc add: finite_Collect]]
     by (auto split: atomic.splits)
   ultimately show "finite {fold d xs (FBase a) | xs. True}" by (blast intro: finite_subset)
next
  fix k l and a :: ws1s
  show "find0 k l a ‚ü∑ l ‚àà FV0 k a" by (induct a rule: find0.induct) auto
next
  fix a :: ws1s and k :: order
  show "finite (FV0 k a)" by (cases k) (induct a, auto)+
next
  fix idx a k v
  assume "wf0 idx a" "v ‚àà FV0 k a"
  then show "LESS k v idx" by (cases k) (induct a, auto)+
next
  fix idx k i
  assume "LESS k i idx"
  then show "Formula_Operations.wf SUC wf0 idx (Restrict k i)"
     unfolding Restrict_def by (cases k) (auto simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps)
next
  fix k and i :: nat
  show "Formula_Operations.lformula lformula0 (Restrict k i)"
    unfolding Restrict_def by (cases k) (auto simp: Formula_Operations.lformula.simps)
next
  fix i ùîÑ k P r
  assume "i‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = P"
  then show "restrict k P ‚ü∑
    Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen Extend Length satisfies0 r ùîÑ (Restrict k i)"
    unfolding restrict_def Restrict_def
    by (cases k) (auto simp: Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps)
qed (auto simp: Extend_commute_unsafe downshift_def upshift_def fimage_iff Suc_le_eq len_def
  dec_def eval_def cut_def len_downshift_helper CONS_inj dest!: CONS_surj
  dest: fMax_ge fMax_ffilter_less fMax_boundedD fsubset_fsingletonD
  split: order.splits if_splits)

(*Workaround for code generation*)
lemma check_eqv_code[code]: "check_eqv idx r s =
  ((ws1s_wf idx r ‚àß ws1s_lformula r) ‚àß (ws1s_wf idx s ‚àß ws1s_lformula s) ‚àß
  (case rtrancl_while (Œª(p, q). final idx p = final idx q)
    (Œª(p, q). map (Œªa. (norm (deriv lderiv0 a p), norm (deriv lderiv0 a q))) (œÉ idx))
    (norm (RESTRICT r), norm (RESTRICT s)) of
    None ‚áí False
  | Some ([], x) ‚áí True
  | Some (a # list, x) ‚áí False))"
  unfolding check_eqv_def WS1S_Alt.check_eqv_def WS1S_Alt.step_alt ..

definition while where [code del, code_abbrev]: "while idx œÜ = while_default (fut_default idx œÜ)"
declare while_default_code[of "fut_default idx œÜ" for idx œÜ, folded while_def, code]

lemma check_eqv_sound: 
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ (WS1S_Alt.sat ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ WS1S_Alt.sat ùîÑ œà)"
  unfolding check_eqv_def by (rule WS1S_Alt.check_eqv_soundness)

lemma bounded_check_eqv_sound:
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; bounded_check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ (WS1S_Alt.sat‚á©b ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ WS1S_Alt.sat‚á©b ùîÑ œà)"
  unfolding bounded_check_eqv_def by (rule WS1S_Alt.bounded_check_eqv_soundness)

method_setup check_equiv = ‚Äπ
  let
    fun tac ctxt =
      let
        val conv = @{computation_check terms: Trueprop
          "0 :: nat" "1 :: nat" "2 :: nat" "3 :: nat" Suc
          "plus :: nat ‚áí _" "minus :: nat ‚áí _"
          "times :: nat ‚áí _" "divide :: nat ‚áí _" "modulo :: nat ‚áí _"
          "0 :: int" "1 :: int" "2 :: int" "3 :: int" "-1 :: int"
          check_eqv datatypes: formula "int list" integer idx
          "nat √ó nat" "nat option" "bool option"} ctxt
      in
        CONVERSION (Conv.params_conv ~1 (K (Conv.concl_conv ~1 conv)) ctxt) THEN'
        resolve_tac ctxt [TrueI]
      end
  in
    Scan.succeed (SIMPLE_METHOD' o tac)
  end
‚Ä∫

end

Theory Presburger_Formula

section ‚ÄπConcrete Atomic Presburger Formulas‚Ä∫

(*<*)
theory Presburger_Formula
imports
  Abstract_Formula
  "HOL-Library.Code_Target_Int"
  "List-Index.List_Index"
begin
(*>*)

declare [[coercion "of_bool :: bool ‚áí nat"]]
declare [[coercion int]]
declare [[coercion_map map]]
declare [[coercion_enabled]]

fun len :: "nat ‚áí nat" where ‚Äï ‚ÄπFIXME yet another logarithm‚Ä∫
  "len 0 = 0"
| "len (Suc 0) = 1"
| "len n = Suc (len (n div 2))"

lemma len_eq0_iff: "len n = 0 ‚ü∑ n = 0"
  by (induct n rule: len.induct) auto

lemma len_mult2[simp]: "len (2 * x) = (if x = 0 then 0 else Suc (len x))"
proof (induct x rule: len.induct)
  show "len (2 * Suc 0) = (if Suc 0 = 0 then 0 else Suc (len (Suc 0)))" by (simp add: numeral_eq_Suc)
qed auto

lemma len_mult2'[simp]: "len (x * 2) = (if x = 0 then 0 else Suc (len x))"
  using len_mult2 [of x] by (simp add: ac_simps)

lemma len_Suc_mult2[simp]: "len (Suc (2 * x)) = Suc (len x)"
proof (induct x rule: len.induct)
  show "len (Suc (2 * Suc 0)) = Suc (len (Suc 0))"
    by (metis div_less One_nat_def div2_Suc_Suc len.simps(3) lessI mult.right_neutral numeral_2_eq_2)
qed auto

lemma len_le_iff: "len x ‚â§ l ‚ü∑ x < 2 ^ l"
proof (induct x arbitrary: l rule: len.induct)
  fix l show "(len (Suc 0) ‚â§ l) = (Suc 0 < 2 ^ l)"
  proof (cases l)
    case Suc then show ?thesis using le_less by fastforce
  qed simp
next
  fix v l assume "‚ãÄl. (len (Suc (Suc v) div 2) ‚â§ l) = (Suc (Suc v) div 2 < 2 ^ l)"
  then show "(len (Suc (Suc v)) ‚â§ l) = (Suc (Suc v) < 2 ^ l)"
    by (cases l) (simp_all, linarith)
qed simp

lemma len_pow2[simp]: "len (2 ^ x) = Suc x"
  by (induct x) auto

lemma len_div2[simp]: "len (x div 2) = len x - 1"
  by (induct x rule: len.induct) auto

lemma less_pow2_len[simp]: "x < 2 ^ len x"
  by (induct x rule: len.induct) auto

lemma len_alt: "len x = (LEAST i. x < 2 ^ i)"
proof (rule antisym)
  show "len x ‚â§ (LEAST i. x < 2 ^ i)"
    unfolding len_le_iff by (rule LeastI) (rule less_pow2_len)
qed (auto intro: Least_le)

lemma len_mono[simp]: "x ‚â§ y ‚üπ len x ‚â§ len y"
  unfolding len_le_iff using less_pow2_len[of y] by linarith

lemma len_div_pow2[simp]: "len (x div 2 ^ m) = len x - m"
  by (induct m arbitrary: x) (auto simp: div_mult2_eq)

lemma len_mult_pow2[simp]: "len (x * 2 ^ m) = (if x = 0 then 0 else len x + m)"
  by (induct m arbitrary: x) (auto simp: div_mult2_eq mult.assoc[symmetric] mult.commute[of _ 2])

lemma map_index'_Suc[simp]: "map_index' (Suc i) f xs = map_index' i (Œªi. f (Suc i)) xs"
  by (induct xs arbitrary: i) auto


abbreviation (input) "zero n ‚â° replicate n False"
abbreviation (input) "SUC ‚â° Œª_::unit. Suc"
definition "test_bit m n ‚â° (m :: nat) div 2 ^ n mod 2 = 1"
definition "downshift m ‚â° (m :: nat) div 2"
definition "upshift m ‚â° (m :: nat) * 2"
definition "set_bit n m ‚â° m + (if ¬¨ test_bit m n then 2 ^ n else (0 :: nat))"
definition "cut_bits n m ‚â° (m :: nat) mod 2 ^ n"

typedef interp = "{(n :: nat, xs :: nat list). ‚àÄx ‚àà set xs. len x ‚â§ n}"
  by (force intro: exI[of _ "[]"])

setup_lifting type_definition_interp
type_synonym atom = "bool list"
type_synonym "value" = "nat"
datatype presb = Eq (tm: "int list") (const: int) (offset: "int")
derive linorder list
derive linorder presb
type_synonym formula = "(presb, unit) aformula"

lift_definition assigns :: "nat ‚áí interp ‚áí unit ‚áí value" ("_‚áó_‚áñ_" [900, 999, 999] 999) is
  "Œªn (_, I) _. if n < length I then I ! n else 0" .

lift_definition nvars :: "interp ‚áí nat" ("#‚á©V _" [1000] 900) is
  "Œª(_, I). length I" .

lift_definition Length :: "interp ‚áí nat" is "Œª(n, _). n" .

lift_definition Extend :: "unit ‚áí nat ‚áí interp ‚áí value ‚áí interp" is
  "Œª_ i (n, I) m. (max n (len m), insert_nth i m I)"
  by (force simp: max_def dest: in_set_takeD in_set_dropD)

lift_definition CONS :: "atom ‚áí interp ‚áí interp" is
  "Œªbs (n, I). (Suc n, map_index (Œªi n. 2 * n + (if bs ! i then 1 else 0)) I)"
  by (auto simp: set_zip)

lift_definition SNOC :: "atom ‚áí interp ‚áí interp" is
  "Œªbs (n, I). (Suc n, map_index (Œªi m. m + (if bs ! i then 2 ^ n else 0)) I)"
  by (auto simp: all_set_conv_all_nth len_le_iff)

definition extend :: "unit ‚áí bool ‚áí atom ‚áí atom" where
  "extend _ b bs ‚â° b # bs"

abbreviation (input) size_atom :: "atom ‚áí nat" where
  "size_atom ‚â° length"

definition FV0 :: "unit ‚áí presb ‚áí nat set" where
  "FV0 _ fm = (case fm of Eq is _ _ ‚áí {n. n < length is ‚àß is!n ‚â† 0})"

lemma FV0_code[code]:
  "FV0 x (Eq is i off) = Option.these (set (map_index (Œªi x. if x = 0 then None else Some i) is))"
  unfolding FV0_def by (force simp: Option.these_def image_iff)

primrec wf0 :: "nat ‚áí presb ‚áí bool" where
  "wf0 idx (Eq is _ _) = (length is = idx)"

fun find0 where
  "find0 (_::unit) n (Eq is _ _) = (is ! n ‚â† 0)"

primrec decr0 where
  "decr0 (_::unit) k (Eq is i d) = Eq (take k is @ drop (Suc k) is) i d"

definition scalar_product :: "nat list ‚áí int list ‚áí int" where
  "scalar_product ns is =
     sum_list (map_index (Œªi b. (if i < length ns then ns ! i else 0) * b) is)"

lift_definition eval_tm :: "interp ‚áí int list ‚áí int" is
  "Œª(_, I). scalar_product I" .

primrec satisfies0 where
  "satisfies0 I (Eq is i d) = (eval_tm I is = i - (2 ^ Length I) * d)"

inductive lformula0 where
  "lformula0 (Eq is i 0)"

code_pred lformula0 .

fun lderiv0 :: "bool list ‚áí presb ‚áí formula" where
  "lderiv0 bs (Eq is i d) = (if d ‚â† 0 then undefined else
  (let v = i - scalar_product bs is
   in if v mod 2 = 0 then FBase (Eq is (v div 2) 0) else FBool False))"

fun rderiv0 :: "bool list ‚áí presb ‚áí formula" where
  "rderiv0 bs (Eq is i d) =
  (let
     l = - sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i < 0];
     h = - sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i > 0];
     d' = scalar_product bs is + 2 * d
   in if d' ‚àà {min h i .. max l i} then FBase (Eq is i d') else FBool False)"

primrec nullable0 where
  "nullable0 (Eq is i off) = (i = off)"

definition œÉ :: "nat ‚áí atom list" where
  "œÉ n = List.n_lists n [True, False]"

named_theorems Presb_simps

lemma nvars_Extend[Presb_simps]: "#‚á©V (Extend () i ùîÑ P) = Suc (#‚á©V ùîÑ)"
  by (transfer, auto)

lemma Length_Extend[Presb_simps]: "Length (Extend () i ùîÑ P) = max (Length ùîÑ) (len P)"
  by (transfer, auto)

lemma Length0_inj[Presb_simps]: "Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚üπ Length ùîÖ = 0 ‚üπ #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ ‚üπ ùîÑ = ùîÖ"
  by transfer (auto intro: nth_equalityI simp: all_set_conv_all_nth len_eq0_iff)

lemma ex_Length0[Presb_simps]: "‚àÉùîÑ. Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÑ = idx"
  by (transfer fixing: idx) (auto intro: exI[of _ "replicate idx 0"])

lemma Extend_commute_safe[Presb_simps]: "‚ü¶j ‚â§ i; i < Suc (#‚á©V ùîÑ)‚üß ‚üπ
  Extend k j (Extend k i ùîÑ P) Q = Extend k (Suc i) (Extend k j ùîÑ Q) P"
  by transfer (auto simp add: min_def take_Cons take_drop le_imp_diff_is_add split: nat.splits)

lemma Extend_commute_unsafe[Presb_simps]:
  "k ‚â† k' ‚üπ Extend k j (Extend k' i ùîÑ P) Q = Extend k' i (Extend k j ùîÑ Q) P"
  by transfer auto

lemma assigns_Extend[Presb_simps]: "i < Suc (#‚á©V ùîÑ) ‚üπ
  m‚áóExtend k i ùîÑ P‚áñk' = (if k = k' then if m = i then P else dec i m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk else m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk')"
  by transfer (auto simp: nth_append dec_def min_def)

lemma assigns_SNOC_zero[Presb_simps]: "m < #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚üπ m‚áóSNOC (zero (#‚á©V ùîÑ)) ùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk"
  by transfer auto

lemma Length_CONS[Presb_simps]: "Length (CONS x ùîÑ) = Suc (Length ùîÑ)"
  by transfer auto

lemma Length_SNOC[Presb_simps]: "Length (SNOC x ùîÑ) = Suc (Length ùîÑ)"
  by transfer auto

lemma nvars_CONS[Presb_simps]: "#‚á©V (CONS x ùîÑ) = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  by transfer auto

lemma nvars_SNOC[Presb_simps]: "#‚á©V (SNOC x ùîÑ) = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  by transfer auto

lemma Extend_CONS[Presb_simps]: "#‚á©V ùîÑ = length x ‚üπ
  Extend k 0 (CONS x ùîÑ) P = CONS (extend k (test_bit P 0) x) (Extend k 0 ùîÑ (downshift P))"
  by transfer (auto simp: extend_def downshift_def test_bit_def, presburger+)

lemma Extend_SNOC[Presb_simps]: "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = length x; len P ‚â§ Length (SNOC x ùîÑ)‚üß ‚üπ
  Extend k 0 (SNOC x ùîÑ) P =
    SNOC (extend k (test_bit P (Length ùîÑ)) x) (Extend k 0 ùîÑ (cut_bits (Length ùîÑ) P))"
  apply transfer
  apply (auto simp: cut_bits_def extend_def test_bit_def nth_Cons' max_absorb1 len_le_iff
    split: if_splits cong del: if_weak_cong)
   apply (metis add.commute mod_less mod_mult2_eq mult_numeral_1_right numeral_1_eq_Suc_0 power_commuting_commutes)
  apply (metis Euclidean_Division.div_eq_0_iff div_0 less_mult_imp_div_less mod_less nat_dvd_not_less semiring_normalization_rules(7))
  done

lemma odd_neq_even:
  "Suc (2 * x) = 2 * y ‚ü∑ False"
  "2 * y = Suc (2 * x) ‚ü∑ False"
  by presburger+

lemma CONS_inj[Presb_simps]: "size x = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚üπ size y = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚üπ #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ ‚üπ
  CONS x ùîÑ = CONS y ùîÖ ‚ü∑ (x = y ‚àß ùîÑ = ùîÖ)"
  by transfer (auto simp: list_eq_iff_nth_eq odd_neq_even split: if_splits)

lemma mod_2_Suc_iff:
  "x mod 2 = Suc 0 ‚ü∑ x = Suc (2 * (x div 2))"
  by presburger+

lemma CONS_surj[Presb_simps]: "Length ùîÑ ‚â† 0 ‚üπ
  ‚àÉx ùîÖ. ùîÑ = CONS x ùîÖ ‚àß #‚á©V ùîÖ = #‚á©V ùîÑ ‚àß size x = #‚á©V ùîÑ"
  by transfer
    (auto simp: gr0_conv_Suc list_eq_iff_nth_eq len_le_iff split: if_splits
    intro!: exI[of _ "map (Œªn. n mod 2 ‚â† 0) _"] exI[of _ "map (Œªn. n div 2) _"];
    auto simp: mod_2_Suc_iff)

lemma [Presb_simps]: 
  "length (extend k b x) = Suc (length x)"
  "downshift (upshift P) = P"
  "downshift (set_bit 0 P) = downshift P"
  "test_bit (set_bit n P) n"
  "¬¨ test_bit (upshift P) 0"
  "len P ‚â§ p ‚üπ ¬¨ test_bit P p"
  "len (cut_bits n P) ‚â§ n"
  "len P ‚â§ n ‚üπ cut_bits n P = P"
  "len (upshift P) = (case len P of 0 ‚áí 0 | Suc n ‚áí Suc (Suc n))"
  "len (downshift P) = (case len P of 0 ‚áí 0 | Suc n ‚áí n)"
  by (auto simp: extend_def set_bit_def cut_bits_def upshift_def downshift_def test_bit_def
    len_le_iff len_eq0_iff div_add_self2 split: nat.split)

lemma Suc0_div_pow2_eq: "Suc 0 div 2 ^ i = (if i = 0 then 1 else 0)"
  by (induct i) (auto simp: div_mult2_eq)

lemma set_unset_bit_preserves_len:
  assumes "x div 2 ^ m = 2 * q" "m < len x"
  shows "x + 2 ^ m < 2 ^ len x"
using assms proof (induct m arbitrary: x)
  case 0 then show ?case
    by (auto simp: div_mult2_eq len_Suc_mult2[symmetric]
      simp del: len_Suc_mult2 power_Suc split: if_splits)
next
  case (Suc m)
  with Suc(1)[of "x div 2"] show ?case by (cases "len x") (auto simp: div_mult2_eq)
qed

lemma len_set_bit[Presb_simps]: "len (set_bit m P) = max (Suc m) (len P)"
proof (rule antisym)
  show "len (set_bit m P) ‚â§ max (Suc m) (len P)"
    by (auto simp: set_bit_def test_bit_def max_def Suc_le_eq not_less len_le_iff
      set_unset_bit_preserves_len simp del: One_nat_def)
next
  have "P < 2 ^ len (P + 2 ^ m)" by (rule order.strict_trans2[OF less_pow2_len]) auto
  moreover have "m < len (P + 2 ^ m)" by (rule order.strict_trans2[OF _ len_mono[of "2 ^ m"]]) auto
  ultimately show "max (Suc m) (len P) ‚â§ len (set_bit m P)"
    by (auto simp: set_bit_def test_bit_def max_def Suc_le_eq not_less len_le_iff)
qed

lemma mod_pow2_div_pow2:
  fixes p m n :: nat
  shows "m < n ‚üπ p mod 2 ^ n div 2 ^ m = p div 2 ^ m mod 2 ^ (n - m)"
  by (induct m arbitrary: p n) (auto simp: div_mult2_eq mod_mult2_eq Suc_less_eq2)

lemma irrelevant_set_bit[simp]:
  fixes p m n :: nat
  assumes "n ‚â§ m"
  shows "(p + 2 ^ m) mod 2 ^ n = p mod 2 ^ n"
proof -
  from assms obtain q :: nat where "2 ^ m = q * 2 ^ n"
    by (metis le_add_diff_inverse mult.commute power_add)
  then show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma mod_lemma: "‚ü¶ (0::nat) < c; r < b ‚üß ‚üπ b * (q mod c) + r < b * c"
  by (metis add_gr_0 div_le_mono div_mult_self1_is_m less_imp_add_positive mod_less_divisor not_less split_div)

lemma relevant_set_bit[simp]:
  fixes p m n :: nat
  assumes "m < n" "p div 2 ^ m = 2 * q"
  shows "(p + 2 ^ m) mod 2 ^ n = p mod 2 ^ n + 2 ^ m"
proof -
  have "p mod 2 ^ n + 2 ^ m < 2 ^ n"
  using assms proof (induct m arbitrary: p n)
    case 0 then show ?case
      by (auto simp: gr0_conv_Suc)
         (metis One_nat_def Suc_eq_plus1 lessI mod_lemma numeral_2_eq_2 zero_less_numeral zero_less_power)
  next
    case (Suc m)
    from Suc(1)[of "n - 1" "p div 2"] Suc(2,3) show ?case
      by (auto simp: div_mult2_eq mod_mult2_eq Suc_less_eq2)
  qed
  with ‚Äπm < n‚Ä∫ show ?thesis by (subst mod_add_eq [symmetric]) auto
qed

lemma cut_bits_set_bit[Presb_simps]: "cut_bits n (set_bit m p) =
  (if n ‚â§ m then cut_bits n p else set_bit m (cut_bits n p))"
  unfolding cut_bits_def set_bit_def test_bit_def
  by (auto simp: not_le mod_pow2_div_pow2 mod_mod_cancel simp del: One_nat_def)

lemma wf0_decr0[Presb_simps]:
  "wf0 (Suc idx) a ‚üπ l < Suc idx ‚üπ ¬¨ find0 k l a ‚üπ wf0 idx (decr0 k l a)"
  by (induct a) auto

lemma lformula0_decr0[Presb_simps]: "lformula0 a ‚üπ lformula0 (decr0 k l a)"
  by (induct a) (auto elim: lformula0.cases intro: lformula0.intros)

abbreviation sat0_syn (infix "‚ä®0" 65) where
 "sat0_syn ‚â° satisfies0"
abbreviation sat_syn (infix "‚ä®" 65) where
 "sat_syn ‚â° Formula_Operations.satisfies Extend Length satisfies0"
abbreviation sat_bounded_syn (infix "‚ä®‚á©b" 65) where
 "sat_bounded_syn ‚â° Formula_Operations.satisfies_bounded Extend Length len satisfies0"

lemma scalar_product_Nil[simp]: "scalar_product [] xs = 0"
  by (induct xs) (auto simp: scalar_product_def)

lemma scalar_product_Nil2[simp]: "scalar_product xs [] = 0"
  by (induct xs) (auto simp: scalar_product_def)

lemma scalar_product_Cons[simp]:
  "scalar_product xs (y # ys) = (case xs of x # xs ‚áí x * y + scalar_product xs ys | [] ‚áí 0)"
  by (cases xs) (simp, auto simp: scalar_product_def cong del: if_weak_cong)

lemma scalar_product_append[simp]: "scalar_product ns (xs @ ys) =
  scalar_product (take (length xs) ns) xs + scalar_product (drop (length xs) ns) ys"
  by (induct xs arbitrary: ns) (auto split: list.splits)

lemma scalar_product_trim: "scalar_product ns xs = scalar_product (take (length xs) ns) xs"
  by (induct xs arbitrary: ns) (auto split: list.splits)

lemma Extend_satisfies0_decr0[Presb_simps]:
  assumes "¬¨ find0 k i a" "i < Suc (#‚á©V ùîÑ)" "lformula0 a ‚à® len P ‚â§ Length ùîÑ"
  shows "Extend k i ùîÑ P ‚ä®0 a = ùîÑ ‚ä®0 decr0 k i a"
proof -
   { fix "is" :: "int list"
     assume "is ! i = 0"
     with assms(1,2) have "eval_tm (Extend k i ùîÑ P) is = eval_tm ùîÑ (take i is @ drop (Suc i) is)"
       by (cases a, transfer)
         (force intro: trans[OF scalar_product_trim] simp: min_def
         arg_cong2[OF refl id_take_nth_drop, of i _ scalar_product "take i xs @ _" for i x xs])
  } note * = this
  from assms show ?thesis
    by (cases a) (auto dest!: * simp: Length_Extend max_def elim: lformula0.cases)
qed

lemma scalar_product_eq0: "‚àÄc‚ààset ns. c = 0 ‚üπ scalar_product ns is = 0"
proof (induct "is" arbitrary: "ns")
  case Cons
  then show ?case by (cases ns) (auto simp: scalar_product_def cong del: if_weak_cong)
qed (simp add: scalar_product_def)

lemma nullable0_satisfies0[Presb_simps]: "Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚üπ nullable0 a = ùîÑ ‚ä®0 a"
proof (induct a)
  case Eq then show ?case unfolding nullable0.simps satisfies0.simps
    by transfer (auto simp: len_eq0_iff scalar_product_eq0)
qed

lemma satisfies0_cong: "wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÖ) a ‚üπ #‚á©V ùîÑ = #‚á©V ùîÖ ‚üπ lformula0 a ‚üπ
  (‚ãÄm k. m < #‚á©V ùîÖ ‚üπ m‚áóùîÑ‚áñk = m‚áóùîÖ‚áñk) ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®0 a = ùîÖ ‚ä®0 a"
proof (induct a)
  case Eq then show ?case unfolding satisfies0.simps
    by transfer (auto simp: scalar_product_def
      intro!: arg_cong[of _ _ sum_list] map_index_cong elim!: lformula0.cases)
qed

lemma wf_lderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  "wf0 idx a ‚üπ lformula0 a ‚üπ Formula_Operations.wf (Œª_. Suc) wf0 idx (lderiv0 x a)"
  by (induct a) (auto elim: lformula0.cases simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps Let_def)

lemma lformula_lderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  "lformula0 a ‚üπ Formula_Operations.lformula lformula0 (lderiv0 x a)"
  by (induct a)
    (auto elim: lformula0.cases intro: lformula0.intros simp: Let_def Formula_Operations.lformula.simps)

lemma wf_rderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  "wf0 idx a ‚üπ Formula_Operations.wf (Œª_. Suc) wf0 idx (rderiv0 x a)"
  by (induct a) (auto elim: lformula0.cases simp: Formula_Operations.wf.simps Let_def)

lemma find0_FV0[Presb_simps]: "‚ü¶wf0 idx a; l < idx‚üß ‚üπ find0 k l a = (l ‚àà FV0 k a)"
  by (induct a) (auto simp: FV0_def)

lemma FV0_less[Presb_simps]: "wf0 idx a ‚üπ v ‚àà FV0 k a ‚üπ v < idx"
  by (induct a) (auto simp: FV0_def)

lemma finite_FV0[Presb_simps]: "finite (FV0 k a)"
  by (induct a) (auto simp: FV0_def)

lemma finite_lderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  assumes "lformula0 a"
  shows "finite {œÜ. ‚àÉxs. œÜ = fold (Formula_Operations.deriv extend lderiv0) xs (FBase a)}"
proof -
  define d where "d = Formula_Operations.deriv extend lderiv0"
  define l where "l is = sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i < 0]" for "is" :: "int list"
  define h where "h is = sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i > 0]" for "is" :: "int list"
  define Œ¶ where "Œ¶ a = (case a of
    Eq is n z ‚áí {FBase (Eq is i 0) | i . i ‚àà {min (- h is) n .. max (- l is) n}} ‚à™
      {FBool False :: formula})" for a
  { fix xs
    note Formula_Operations.fold_deriv_FBool[simp] Formula_Operations.deriv.simps[simp] Œ¶_def[simp]
    from ‚Äπlformula0 a‚Ä∫ have "FBase a ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (auto simp: elim!: lformula0.cases)
