    moreover have "‚ãÄx œÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ d x œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
    proof (induct a, unfold Œ¶_def presb.case, elim UnE CollectE insertE emptyE exE conjE)
      fix "is" :: "int list" and bs :: "bool list" and i n :: int and œÜ :: formula
      assume "i ‚àà {min (- h is) n..max (- l is) n}" "œÜ = FBase (presb.Eq is i 0)"
      moreover have "scalar_product bs is ‚â§ h is"
      proof (induct "is" arbitrary: bs)
        case (Cons x xs)
        from Cons[of "tl bs"] show ?case by (cases bs) (auto simp: h_def)
      qed (auto simp: h_def scalar_product_def)
      moreover have "l is ‚â§ scalar_product bs is"
      proof (induct "is" arbitrary: bs)
        case (Cons x xs)
        from Cons[of "tl bs"] show ?case by (cases bs) (auto simp: l_def)
      qed (auto simp: l_def scalar_product_def)
      ultimately show "d bs œÜ ‚àà
        {FBase (presb.Eq is i 0) |i. i ‚àà {min (- h is) n..max (- l is) n}} ‚à™ {FBool False}"
        by (auto simp: d_def Let_def)
    qed (auto simp: d_def)
    then have "‚ãÄœÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ fold d xs œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (induct xs) auto
    ultimately have "fold d xs (FBase a) ‚àà Œ¶ a" by blast
   }
   moreover have "finite (Œ¶ a)" unfolding Œ¶_def by (auto split: presb.splits)
   ultimately show "?thesis" unfolding d_def by (blast intro: finite_subset)
qed

lemma finite_rderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  "finite {œÜ. ‚àÉxs. œÜ = fold (Formula_Operations.deriv extend rderiv0) xs (FBase a)}"
proof -
  define d where "d = Formula_Operations.deriv extend rderiv0"
  define l where "l is = sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i < 0]"for "is" :: "int list"
  define h where "h is = sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i > 0]"for "is" :: "int list"
  define Œ¶ where "Œ¶ a = (case a of
    Eq is n z ‚áí {FBase (Eq is n i) | i . i ‚àà {min (- h is) (min n z) .. max (- l is) (max n z)}} ‚à™
      {FBool False :: formula})" for a
  { fix xs
    note Formula_Operations.fold_deriv_FBool[simp] Formula_Operations.deriv.simps[simp] Œ¶_def[simp]
    have "FBase a ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (auto split: presb.splits)
    moreover have "‚ãÄx œÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ d x œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a"
    proof (induct a, unfold Œ¶_def presb.case, elim UnE CollectE insertE emptyE exE conjE)
      fix "is" :: "int list" and bs :: "bool list" and i n m :: int and œÜ :: formula
      assume "i ‚àà {min (- h is) (min n m)..max (- l is) (max n m)}" "œÜ = FBase (presb.Eq is n i)"
      moreover have "scalar_product bs is ‚â§ h is"
      proof (induct "is" arbitrary: bs)
        case (Cons x xs)
        from Cons[of "tl bs"] show ?case by (cases bs) (auto simp: h_def)
      qed (auto simp: h_def scalar_product_def)
      moreover have "l is ‚â§ scalar_product bs is"
      proof (induct "is" arbitrary: bs)
        case (Cons x xs)
        from Cons[of "tl bs"] show ?case by (cases bs) (auto simp: l_def)
      qed (auto simp: l_def scalar_product_def)
      ultimately show "d bs œÜ ‚àà
        {FBase (presb.Eq is n i) |i. i ‚àà {min (- h is) (min n m)..max (- l is) (max n m)}} ‚à™ {FBool False}"
        by (auto 0 1 simp: d_def Let_def h_def l_def)
    qed (auto simp: d_def)
    then have "‚ãÄœÜ. œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a ‚üπ fold d xs œÜ ‚àà Œ¶ a" by (induct xs) auto
    ultimately have "fold d xs (FBase a) ‚àà Œ¶ a" by blast
   }
   moreover have "finite (Œ¶ a)" unfolding Œ¶_def by (auto split: presb.splits)
   ultimately show "?thesis" unfolding d_def by (blast intro: finite_subset)
qed

lemma scalar_product_CONS: "length xs = length (bs :: bool list) ‚üπ
  scalar_product (map_index (Œªi n. 2 * n + bs ! i) xs) is =
  scalar_product bs is + 2 * scalar_product xs is"
  by (induct "is" arbitrary: bs xs) (auto split: list.splits simp: algebra_simps)

lemma eval_tm_CONS[simp]:
  "‚ü¶length is ‚â§ #‚á©V ùîÑ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = length x‚üß ‚üπ
   eval_tm (CONS x ùîÑ) is = scalar_product x is + 2 * eval_tm ùîÑ is"
  by transfer (auto simp: scalar_product_CONS[symmetric]
    intro!: arg_cong2[of _ _ _ _ scalar_product] nth_equalityI)

lemma satisfies_lderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  "‚ü¶wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a; #‚á©V ùîÑ = length x; lformula0 a‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä® lderiv0 x a ‚ü∑ CONS x ùîÑ ‚ä®0 a"
  by (auto simp: Let_def Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps
    split: if_splits elim!: lformula0.cases)

lemma satisfies_bounded_lderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  "‚ü¶wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a; #‚á©V ùîÑ = length x; lformula0 a‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b lderiv0 x a ‚ü∑ CONS x ùîÑ ‚ä®0 a"
  by (auto simp: Let_def Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps
    split: if_splits elim!: lformula0.cases)

lemma scalar_product_SNOC: "length xs = length (bs :: bool list)  ‚üπ
  scalar_product (map_index (Œªi m. m + 2 ^ a * bs ! i) xs) is =
  scalar_product xs is + 2 ^ a * scalar_product bs is"
  by (induct "is" arbitrary: bs xs) (auto split: list.splits simp: algebra_simps)

lemma eval_tm_SNOC[simp]:
  "‚ü¶length is ‚â§ #‚á©V ùîÑ; #‚á©V ùîÑ = length x‚üß ‚üπ
   eval_tm (SNOC x ùîÑ) is = eval_tm ùîÑ is + 2 ^ Length ùîÑ * scalar_product x is"
  by transfer (auto simp: scalar_product_SNOC[symmetric]
    intro!: arg_cong2[of _ _ _ _ scalar_product] nth_equalityI)

lemma Length_eq0_eval_tm_eq0[simp]: "Length ùîÑ = 0 ‚üπ eval_tm ùîÑ is = 0"
  by transfer (auto simp: len_eq0_iff scalar_product_eq0)

lemma less_pow2: "x < 2 ^ a ‚üπ int x < 2 ^ a"
  by (metis of_nat_less_iff of_nat_numeral of_nat_power [symmetric])

lemma scalar_product_upper_bound: "‚àÄx‚ààset b. len x ‚â§ a ‚üπ
  scalar_product b is ‚â§ (2 ^ a - 1) * sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i > 0]"
proof (induct "is" arbitrary: b)
  case (Cons i "is")
  then have "scalar_product (tl b) is ‚â§ (2 ^ a - 1) * sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i > 0]"
    by (auto simp: in_set_tlD)
  with Cons(2) show ?case
    by (auto 0 3 split: list.splits simp: len_le_iff mult_le_0_iff
      distrib_left add.commute[of _ "(2 ^ a - 1) * i"] less_pow2
      intro: add_mono elim: order_trans[OF add_mono[OF order_refl]])
qed simp

lemma scalar_product_lower_bound: "‚àÄx‚ààset b. len x ‚â§ a ‚üπ
  scalar_product b is ‚â• (2 ^ a - 1) * sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i < 0]"
proof (induct "is" arbitrary: b)
  case (Cons i "is")
  then have "scalar_product (tl b) is ‚â• (2 ^ a - 1) * sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i < 0]"
    by (auto simp: in_set_tlD)
  with Cons(2) show ?case
    by (auto 0 3 split: list.splits simp: len_le_iff mult_le_0_iff
      distrib_left add.commute[of _ "(2 ^ a - 1) * i"] less_pow2
      intro: add_mono elim: order_trans[OF add_mono[OF order_refl]] order_trans)
qed simp

lemma eval_tm_upper_bound: "eval_tm ùîÑ is ‚â§ (2 ^ Length ùîÑ - 1) * sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i > 0]"
  by transfer (auto simp: scalar_product_upper_bound)

lemma eval_tm_lower_bound: "eval_tm ùîÑ is ‚â• (2 ^ Length ùîÑ - 1) * sum_list [i. i ‚Üê is, i < 0]"
  by transfer (auto simp: scalar_product_lower_bound)

lemma satisfies_bounded_rderiv0[Presb_simps]:
  "‚ü¶wf0 (#‚á©V ùîÑ) a; #‚á©V ùîÑ = length x‚üß ‚üπ ùîÑ ‚ä®‚á©b rderiv0 x a ‚ü∑ SNOC x ùîÑ ‚ä®0 a"
proof (induct a)
  case (Eq "is" n d)
  let ?l = "Length ùîÑ"
  define d' where "d' = scalar_product x is + 2 * d"
  define l where "l = sum_list  [i. i ‚Üê is, i < 0]"
  define h where "h = sum_list  [i. i ‚Üê is, i > 0]"
  from Eq show ?case
  unfolding wf0.simps satisfies0.simps rderiv0.simps Let_def
  proof (split if_splits, simp only: Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps satisfies0.simps
    Length_SNOC eval_tm_SNOC simp_thms(13) de_Morgan_conj not_le
    min_less_iff_conj max_less_iff_conj d'_def[symmetric] h_def[symmetric] l_def[symmetric], safe)
    assume "eval_tm ùîÑ is + 2 ^ ?l * scalar_product x is = n - 2 ^ Suc ?l * d"
    with eval_tm_upper_bound[of ùîÑ "is"] eval_tm_lower_bound[of ùîÑ "is"] have
      *: "n + h ‚â§ 2 ^ ?l * (h + d')" "2 ^ ?l * (l + d') ‚â§ n + l"
      by (auto simp: algebra_simps h_def l_def d'_def)
    assume **: "d' ‚àâ {min (- h) n..max (- l) n}"
    { assume "0 ‚â§ n + h"
      from order_trans[OF this *(1)] have "0 ‚â§ h + d'"
        unfolding zero_le_mult_iff using zero_less_power[of 2] by presburger
    }
    moreover
    { assume "n + h < 0"
      with *(1) have "n ‚â§ d'" by (auto dest: order_trans[OF _ mult_right_mono_neg[of 1]])
    }
    moreover
    { assume "n + l < 0"
      from le_less_trans[OF *(2) this] have "l + d' < 0" unfolding mult_less_0_iff by auto
    }
    moreover
    { assume "0 ‚â§ n + l"
      then have "0 ‚â§ l + d'" using ** calculation(1-2) by force
      with *(2) have "d' ‚â§ n" by (force dest: order_trans[OF mult_right_mono[of 1], rotated])
    }
    ultimately have "min (- h) n ‚â§ d'" "d' ‚â§ max (- l) n" by (auto simp: min_def max_def)
    with ** show False by auto
  qed (auto simp: algebra_simps d'_def)
qed

declare [[goals_limit = 100]]

global_interpretation Presb: Formula
  where SUC = SUC and LESS = "Œª_. (<)" and Length = Length
  and assigns = assigns and nvars = nvars and Extend = Extend and CONS = CONS and SNOC = SNOC
  and extend = extend and size = size_atom and zero = zero and alphabet = œÉ and eval = test_bit
  and downshift = downshift and upshift = upshift and add = set_bit and cut = cut_bits and len = len
  and restrict = "Œª_ _. True" and Restrict = "Œª_ _. FBool True" and lformula0 = lformula0
  and FV0 = FV0 and find0 = find0 and wf0 = wf0 and decr0 = decr0 and satisfies0 = satisfies0
  and nullable0 = nullable0 and lderiv0 = lderiv0 and rderiv0 = rderiv0
  and TYPEVARS = undefined
  defines norm = "Formula_Operations.norm find0 decr0"
  and nFOr = "Formula_Operations.nFOr :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFAnd = "Formula_Operations.nFAnd :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFNot = "Formula_Operations.nFNot find0 decr0 :: formula ‚áí _"
  and nFEx = "Formula_Operations.nFEx find0 decr0"
  and nFAll = "Formula_Operations.nFAll find0 decr0"
  and decr = "Formula_Operations.decr decr0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and find = "Formula_Operations.find find0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and FV = "Formula_Operations.FV FV0"
  and RESTR = "Formula_Operations.RESTR (Œª_ _. FBool True) :: _ ‚áí formula"
  and RESTRICT = "Formula_Operations.RESTRICT (Œª_ _. FBool True) FV0"
  and deriv = "Œªd0 (a :: atom) (œÜ :: formula). Formula_Operations.deriv extend d0 a œÜ"
  and nullable = "ŒªœÜ :: formula. Formula_Operations.nullable nullable0 œÜ"
  and fut_default = "Formula.fut_default extend zero rderiv0"
  and fut = "Formula.fut extend zero find0 decr0 rderiv0"
  and finalize = "Formula.finalize SUC extend zero find0 decr0 rderiv0"
  and final = "Formula.final SUC extend zero find0 decr0
     nullable0 rderiv0 :: nat ‚áí formula ‚áí _"
  and presb_wf = "Formula_Operations.wf SUC (wf0 :: nat ‚áí presb ‚áí _)"
  and presb_lformula = "Formula_Operations.lformula (lformula0 :: presb ‚áí _) :: formula ‚áí _"
  and check_eqv = "Œªidx. DAs.check_eqv
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: formula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    (final idx) (ŒªœÜ :: formula. presb_wf idx œÜ ‚àß presb_lformula œÜ)
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: formula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    (final idx) (ŒªœÜ :: formula. presb_wf idx œÜ ‚àß presb_lformula œÜ)
    (=)"
  and bounded_check_eqv = "Œªidx. DAs.check_eqv
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: formula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    nullable (ŒªœÜ :: formula. presb_wf idx œÜ ‚àß presb_lformula œÜ)
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: formula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    nullable (ŒªœÜ :: formula. presb_wf idx œÜ ‚àß presb_lformula œÜ)
    (=)"
  and automaton = "DA.automaton
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv lderiv0 (a :: atom) œÜ :: formula))"
  by standard (auto simp: Presb_simps œÉ_def set_n_lists distinct_n_lists
    Formula_Operations.lformula.simps Formula_Operations.satisfies_gen.simps Formula_Operations.wf.simps
    dest: satisfies0_cong split: presb.splits if_splits)

(*Workaround for code generation*)
lemma check_eqv_code[code]: "check_eqv idx r s =
  ((presb_wf idx r ‚àß presb_lformula r) ‚àß (presb_wf idx s ‚àß presb_lformula s) ‚àß
  (case rtrancl_while (Œª(p, q). final idx p = final idx q)
    (Œª(p, q). map (Œªa. (norm (deriv lderiv0 a p), norm (deriv lderiv0 a q))) (œÉ idx))
    (norm (RESTRICT r), norm (RESTRICT s)) of
    None ‚áí False
  | Some ([], x) ‚áí True
  | Some (a # list, x) ‚áí False))"
  unfolding check_eqv_def Presb.check_eqv_def Presb.step_alt ..

definition while where [code del, code_abbrev]: "while idx œÜ = while_default (fut_default idx œÜ)"
declare while_default_code[of "fut_default idx œÜ" for idx œÜ, folded while_def, code]

lemma check_eqv_sound: 
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ (Presb.sat ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ Presb.sat ùîÑ œà)"
  unfolding check_eqv_def by (rule Presb.check_eqv_soundness)

lemma bounded_check_eqv_sound:
  "‚ü¶#‚á©V ùîÑ = idx; bounded_check_eqv idx œÜ œà‚üß ‚üπ (Presb.sat‚á©b ùîÑ œÜ ‚ü∑ Presb.sat‚á©b ùîÑ œà)"
  unfolding bounded_check_eqv_def by (rule Presb.bounded_check_eqv_soundness)

method_setup check_equiv = ‚Äπ
  let
    fun tac ctxt =
      let
        val conv = @{computation_check terms: Trueprop
          "0 :: nat" "1 :: nat" "2 :: nat" "3 :: nat" Suc
          "plus :: nat ‚áí _" "minus :: nat ‚áí _"
          "times :: nat ‚áí _" "divide :: nat ‚áí _" "modulo :: nat ‚áí _"
          "0 :: int" "1 :: int" "2 :: int" "3 :: int" "-1 :: int"
          check_eqv datatypes: formula "int list" integer bool} ctxt
      in
        CONVERSION (Conv.params_conv ~1 (K (Conv.concl_conv ~1 conv)) ctxt) THEN'
        resolve_tac ctxt [TrueI]
      end
  in
    Scan.succeed (SIMPLE_METHOD' o tac)
  end
‚Ä∫

end

Theory WS1S_Presburger_Equivalence

section ‚ÄπComparing WS1S Formulas with Presburger Formulas‚Ä∫

(*<*)
theory WS1S_Presburger_Equivalence
imports Presburger_Formula WS1S_Formula
begin
(*>*)

lift_definition letter_eq :: "idx ‚áí nat ‚áí bool list √ó bool list ‚áí bool list ‚áí bool" is
  "Œª(m1,m2) n (bs1, bs2) bs. m1 = 0 ‚àß m2 = n ‚àß bs1 = [] ‚àß bs2 = bs" .

lemma letter_eq[dest]:
  "letter_eq idx n a b ‚üπ (a ‚àà set (WS1S_Prelim.œÉ idx)) = (b ‚àà set (Presburger_Formula.œÉ n))"
  by transfer (force simp: Presburger_Formula.œÉ_def set_n_lists image_iff)

global_interpretation WS1S_Presb: DAs
  "WS1S_Prelim.œÉ idx"
  "(ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)"
  "(Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv lderiv0 (a :: atom) œÜ))"
  "(WS1S.final idx)"
  "(ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ)"
  "ŒªœÜ. Formula.lang WS1S_Prelim.nvars
     WS1S_Prelim.Extend WS1S_Prelim.CONS WS1S_Prelim.Length WS1S_Prelim.size_atom
     WS1S_Formula.satisfies0 idx œÜ"
  "(ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ)"
  "ŒªœÜ. Formula.language WS1S_Prelim.assigns
     WS1S_Prelim.nvars WS1S_Prelim.Extend WS1S_Prelim.CONS
     WS1S_Prelim.Length WS1S_Prelim.size_atom restrict WS1S_Formula.FV0
     WS1S_Formula.satisfies0 idx œÜ"
  "(Presburger_Formula.œÉ n)"
  "(ŒªœÜ. Presburger_Formula.norm (Presburger_Formula.RESTRICT œÜ))"
  "(Œªa œÜ. Presburger_Formula.norm (Presburger_Formula.deriv Presburger_Formula.lderiv0 a œÜ))"
  "(Presburger_Formula.final n)"
  "(ŒªœÜ. presb_wf n œÜ ‚àß presb_lformula œÜ)"
  "(ŒªœÜ. Formula.lang Presburger_Formula.nvars
            Presburger_Formula.Extend Presburger_Formula.CONS Presburger_Formula.Length
            Presburger_Formula.size_atom (‚ä®0) n œÜ)"
  "(ŒªœÜ. presb_wf n œÜ ‚àß presb_lformula œÜ)"
  "(ŒªœÜ. Formula.language Presburger_Formula.assigns
            Presburger_Formula.nvars Presburger_Formula.Extend Presburger_Formula.CONS
            Presburger_Formula.Length Presburger_Formula.size_atom (Œª_ _. True)
            Presburger_Formula.FV0 (‚ä®0)
            n œÜ)"
  "letter_eq idx n"
  defines check_eqv = "Œªidx n. DAs.check_eqv
    (œÉ idx) (ŒªœÜ. norm (RESTRICT œÜ) :: (ws1s, order) aformula)
    (Œªa œÜ. norm (deriv (lderiv0 :: _ ‚áí _ ‚áí formula) (a :: atom) œÜ))
    (final idx) (ŒªœÜ :: formula. ws1s_wf idx œÜ ‚àß ws1s_lformula œÜ)
    (Presburger_Formula.œÉ n) (ŒªœÜ. Presburger_Formula.norm (Presburger_Formula.RESTRICT œÜ))
    (Œªa œÜ. Presburger_Formula.norm (Presburger_Formula.deriv Presburger_Formula.lderiv0 a œÜ))
    (Presburger_Formula.final n) (ŒªœÜ. presb_wf n œÜ ‚àß presb_lformula œÜ) (letter_eq idx n)"
  by unfold_locales auto

(*Workaround for code generation*)
lemma check_eqv_code[code]: "check_eqv idx n r s ‚ü∑
  ((ws1s_wf idx r ‚àß ws1s_lformula r) ‚àß (presb_wf n s ‚àß presb_lformula s) ‚àß
  (case rtrancl_while (Œª(p, q). final idx p = Presburger_Formula.final n q)
  (Œª(p, q).
    map (Œª(a, b). (norm (deriv lderiv0 a p),
      Presburger_Formula.norm (Presburger_Formula.deriv Presburger_Formula.lderiv0 b q)))
     [(x, y)‚ÜêList.product (œÉ idx) (Presburger_Formula.œÉ n). letter_eq idx n x y])
    (norm (RESTRICT r), Presburger_Formula.norm (Presburger_Formula.RESTRICT s)) of
    None ‚áí False
  | Some ([], x) ‚áí True
  | Some (a # list, x) ‚áí False))"
  unfolding check_eqv_def WS1S_Presb.check_eqv_def ..

method_setup check_equiv = ‚Äπ
  let
    fun tac ctxt =
      let
        val conv = @{computation_check terms: Trueprop
          "0 :: nat" "1 :: nat" "2 :: nat" "3 :: nat" Suc
          "plus :: nat ‚áí _" "minus :: nat ‚áí _"
          "times :: nat ‚áí _" "divide :: nat ‚áí _" "modulo :: nat ‚áí _"
          "0 :: int" "1 :: int" "2 :: int" "3 :: int" "-1 :: int"
          check_eqv datatypes: idx "(presb, unit) aformula" "((nat, nat) atomic, WS1S_Prelim.order) aformula"
          "nat √ó nat" "nat option" "bool option" "int list" integer} ctxt
      in
        CONVERSION (Conv.params_conv ~1 (K (Conv.concl_conv ~1 conv)) ctxt) THEN'
        resolve_tac ctxt [TrueI]
      end
  in
    Scan.succeed (SIMPLE_METHOD' o tac)
  end
‚Ä∫

(*<*)
end
(*>*)

Theory WS1S_Nameful

section ‚ÄπNameful WS1S Formulas‚Ä∫

(*<*)
theory WS1S_Nameful
imports WS1S_Formula
begin
(*>*)

declare [[coercion "of_char :: char ‚áí nat", coercion_enabled]]

definition is_upper :: "char ‚áí bool" where [simp]: "is_upper c = (c ‚àà {65..90 :: nat})"
definition is_lower :: "char ‚áí bool" where [simp]: "is_lower c = (c ‚àà {97..122 :: nat})"

(*nonempty string starting with lower case*)
typedef fo = "{s. s ‚â† [] ‚àß is_lower (hd s)}" by (auto intro!: exI[of _ "''x''"])
(*nonempty string starting with upper case*)
typedef so = "{s. s ‚â† [] ‚àß is_upper (hd s)}" by (auto intro!: exI[of _ "''X''"])

datatype ws1s =
    T | F | Or ws1s ws1s | And ws1s ws1s | Not ws1s
  | Ex1 fo ws1s | Ex2 so ws1s | All1 fo ws1s | All2 so ws1s
  | Lt fo fo
  | In fo so
  | Eq_Const fo nat
  | Eq_Presb so nat
  | Eq_FO fo fo
  | Eq_FO_Offset fo fo nat
  | Eq_SO so so
  | Eq_SO_Inc so so
  | Eq_Max fo so
  | Eq_Min fo so
  | Empty so
  | Singleton so
  | Subset so so
  | Disjoint so so
  | Eq_Union so so so
  | Eq_Inter so so so
  | Eq_Diff so so so

(*standard WS1S semantics, finiteness captured by the type fset*)
primrec satisfies :: "(fo ‚áí nat) ‚áí (so ‚áí nat fset) ‚áí ws1s ‚áí bool" where
  "satisfies I1 I2 T = True"
| "satisfies I1 I2 F = False"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Or œÜ œà) = (satisfies I1 I2 œÜ ‚à® satisfies I1 I2 œà)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (And œÜ œà) = (satisfies I1 I2 œÜ ‚àß satisfies I1 I2 œà)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Not œÜ) = (¬¨ satisfies I1 I2 œÜ)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Ex1 x œÜ) = (‚àÉn. satisfies (I1(x := n)) I2 œÜ)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Ex2 X œÜ) = (‚àÉN. satisfies I1 (I2(X := N)) œÜ)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (All1 x œÜ) = (‚àÄn. satisfies (I1(x := n)) I2 œÜ)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (All2 X œÜ) = (‚àÄN. satisfies I1 (I2(X := N)) œÜ)"

| "satisfies I1 I2 (Lt x y) = (I1 x < I1 y)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (In x X) = (I1 x |‚àà| I2 X)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_Const x n) = (I1 x = n)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_Presb X n) = ((‚àëx ‚àà fset (I2 X). 2 ^ x) = n)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_FO x y) = (I1 x = I1 y)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_FO_Offset x y n) = (I1 x = I1 y + n)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_SO X Y) = (I2 X = I2 Y)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_SO_Inc X Y) = (I2 X = Suc |`| I2 Y)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_Max x X) = (let Z = I2 X in Z ‚â† {||} ‚àß I1 x = fMax Z)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_Min x X) = (let Z = I2 X in Z ‚â† {||} ‚àß I1 x = fMin Z)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Empty X) = (I2 X = {||})"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Singleton X) = (‚àÉx. I2 X = {|x|})"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Subset X Y) = (I2 X |‚äÜ| I2 Y)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Disjoint X Y) = (I2 X |‚à©| I2 Y = {||})"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_Union X Y Z) = (I2 X = I2 Y |‚à™| I2 Z)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_Inter X Y Z) = (I2 X = I2 Y |‚à©| I2 Z)"
| "satisfies I1 I2 (Eq_Diff X Y Z) = (I2 X = I2 Y |-| I2 Z)"

primrec fos where
  "fos T = []"
| "fos F = []"
| "fos (Or œÜ œà) = List.union (fos œÜ) (fos œà)"
| "fos (And œÜ œà) = List.union (fos œÜ) (fos œà)"
| "fos (Not œÜ) = fos œÜ"
| "fos (Ex1 x œÜ) = List.remove1 x (fos œÜ)"
| "fos (Ex2 X œÜ) = fos œÜ"
| "fos (All1 x œÜ) = List.remove1 x (fos œÜ)"
| "fos (All2 X œÜ) = fos œÜ"
| "fos (Lt x y) = remdups [x, y]"
| "fos (In x X) = [x]"
| "fos (Eq_Const x n) = [x]"
| "fos (Eq_Presb X n) = []"
| "fos (Eq_FO x y) = remdups [x, y]"
| "fos (Eq_FO_Offset x y n) = remdups [x, y]"
| "fos (Eq_SO X Y) = []"
| "fos (Eq_SO_Inc X Y) = []"
| "fos (Eq_Max x X) = [x]"
| "fos (Eq_Min x X) = [x]"
| "fos (Empty X) = []"
| "fos (Singleton X) = []"
| "fos (Subset X Y) = []"
| "fos (Disjoint X Y) = []"
| "fos (Eq_Union X Y Z) = []"
| "fos (Eq_Inter X Y Z) = []"
| "fos (Eq_Diff X Y Z) = []"

primrec sos where
  "sos T = []"
| "sos F = []"
| "sos (Or œÜ œà) = List.union (sos œÜ) (sos œà)"
| "sos (And œÜ œà) = List.union (sos œÜ) (sos œà)"
| "sos (Not œÜ) = sos œÜ"
| "sos (Ex1 x œÜ) = sos œÜ"
| "sos (Ex2 X œÜ) = List.remove1 X (sos œÜ)"
| "sos (All1 x œÜ) = sos œÜ"
| "sos (All2 X œÜ) = List.remove1 X (sos œÜ)"
| "sos (Lt x y) = []"
| "sos (In x X) = [X]"
| "sos (Eq_Const x n) = []"
| "sos (Eq_Presb X n) = [X]"
| "sos (Eq_FO x y) = []"
| "sos (Eq_FO_Offset x y n) = []"
| "sos (Eq_SO X Y) = remdups [X, Y]"
| "sos (Eq_SO_Inc X Y) = remdups [X, Y]"
| "sos (Eq_Max x X) = [X]"
| "sos (Eq_Min x X) = [X]"
| "sos (Empty X) = [X]"
| "sos (Singleton X) = [X]"
| "sos (Subset X Y) = remdups [X, Y]"
| "sos (Disjoint X Y) = remdups [X, Y]"
| "sos (Eq_Union X Y Z) = remdups [X, Y, Z]"
| "sos (Eq_Inter X Y Z) = remdups [X, Y, Z]"
| "sos (Eq_Diff X Y Z) = remdups [X, Y, Z]"

lemma distinct_fos[simp]: "distinct (fos œÜ)" by (induct œÜ) auto
lemma distinct_sos[simp]: "distinct (sos œÜ)" by (induct œÜ) auto

primrec Œµ where
  "Œµ bs1 bs2 T = FBool True"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 F = FBool False"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Or œÜ œà) = FOr (Œµ bs1 bs2 œÜ) (Œµ bs1 bs2 œà)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (And œÜ œà) = FAnd (Œµ bs1 bs2 œÜ) (Œµ bs1 bs2 œà)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Not œÜ) = FNot (Œµ bs1 bs2 œÜ)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Ex1 x œÜ) = FEx FO (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Ex2 X œÜ) = FEx SO (Œµ bs1 (X # bs2) œÜ)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (All1 x œÜ) = FAll FO (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (All2 X œÜ) = FAll SO (Œµ bs1 (X # bs2) œÜ)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Lt x y) = FBase (Less None (index bs1 x) (index bs1 y))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (In x X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.In False (index bs1 x) (index bs2 X))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_Const x n) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Const None (index bs1 x) n)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_Presb X n) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Presb None (index bs2 X) n)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_FO x y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_FO False (index bs1 x) (index bs1 y))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_FO_Offset x y n) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Plus_FO None (index bs1 x) (index bs1 y) n)"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_SO X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_SO (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_SO_Inc X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Suc_SO False False (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_Max x X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Max False (index bs1 x) (index bs2 X))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_Min x X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Min False (index bs1 x) (index bs2 X))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Empty X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Empty (index bs2 X))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Singleton X) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Singleton (index bs2 X))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Subset X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Subset (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Disjoint X Y) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Disjoint (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_Union X Y Z) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Union (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y) (index bs2 Z))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_Inter X Y Z) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Inter (index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y) (index bs2 Z))"
| "Œµ bs1 bs2 (Eq_Diff X Y Z) = FBase (WS1S_Formula.Eq_Diff(index bs2 X) (index bs2 Y) (index bs2 Z))"

lift_definition mk_I ::
  "(fo ‚áí nat) ‚áí (so ‚áí nat fset) ‚áí fo list ‚áí so list ‚áí interp" is
  "ŒªI1 I2 fs ss. let I1s = map (Œªx. {|I1 x|}) fs; I2s = map I2 ss in (MSB (I1s @ I2s), I1s, I2s)"
  by (auto simp: Let_def)

definition dec_I1 :: "interp ‚áí fo list ‚áí fo ‚áí nat" where "dec_I1 ùîÑ fs x = fMin (index fs x‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO)"
definition dec_I2 :: "interp ‚áí so list ‚áí so ‚áí nat fset" where "dec_I2 ùîÑ ss X = index ss X‚áóùîÑ‚áñSO"

lemma nvars_mk_I[simp]: "#‚á©V (mk_I I1 I2 fs ss) = Abs_idx (length fs, length ss)"
  by transfer (auto simp: Let_def)

lemma assigns_mk_I_FO[simp]:
  "m‚áómk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2‚áñFO = (if m < length bs1 then {|I1 (bs1 ! m)|} else {||})"
  by transfer (auto simp: Let_def)

lemma assigns_mk_I_SO[simp]:
  "m‚áómk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2‚áñSO = (if m < length bs2 then I2 (bs2 ! m) else {||})"
  by transfer (auto simp: Let_def)

lemma satisfies_cong:
  "‚ü¶‚àÄx ‚àà set (fos œÜ). I1 x = J1 x; ‚àÄX ‚àà set (sos œÜ). I2 X = J2 X‚üß ‚üπ
  satisfies I1 I2 œÜ ‚ü∑ satisfies J1 J2 œÜ"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: I1 I2 J1 J2)
  case (Or œÜ œà) from Or.hyps[of I1 J1 I2 J2] Or.prems show ?case by auto
next
  case (And œÜ œà) from And.hyps[of I1 J1 I2 J2] And.prems show ?case by auto
next
  case (Ex1 x œÜ) with Ex1.hyps[of "I1(x := y)" "J1(x := y)" I2 J2 for y, cong] show ?case by auto
next
  case (Ex2 X œÜ) with Ex2.hyps[of I1 J1 "I2(X := Y)" "J2(X := Y)" for Y, cong] show ?case by auto
next
  case (All1 x œÜ) with All1.hyps[of "I1(x := y)" "J1(x := y)" I2 J2 for y, cong] show ?case by auto
next
  case (All2 X œÜ) with All2.hyps[of I1 J1 "I2(X := Y)" "J2(X := Y)" for Y, cong] show ?case by auto
qed simp_all

lemma dec_I_mk_I_satisfies_cong:
  "‚ü¶set (fos œÜ) ‚äÜ set bs1; set (sos œÜ) ‚äÜ set bs2; ùîÑ = mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2‚üß ‚üπ
  satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) œÜ ‚ü∑ satisfies I1 I2 œÜ"
  by (rule satisfies_cong) (auto simp: dec_I1_def dec_I2_def)

definition "ok_I ùîÑ fs = (‚àÄx ‚àà set fs. index fs x‚áóùîÑ‚áñFO ‚â† {||})"

lemma ok_I_mk_I[simp]: "ok_I (mk_I I1 I2 bs1 bs2) bs1"
  unfolding ok_I_def by transfer (auto simp: Let_def)

lemma in_FV_ŒµD[dest]: "‚ü¶v ‚àà FV (Œµ bs1 bs2 œÜ) FO;
  set (fos œÜ) ‚äÜ set bs1; set (sos œÜ) ‚äÜ set bs2‚üß ‚üπ
  (‚àÉy ‚àà set bs1. v = index bs1 y)"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: bs1 bs2 v)
  case (Ex1 x œÜ) from Ex1.hyps[of "Suc v" "x # bs1" bs2] Ex1.prems show ?case
    by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv split: if_splits)
next
  case (Ex2 X œÜ) from Ex2.hyps[of v bs1 "X # bs2"] Ex2.prems show ?case
    by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv split: if_splits)
next
  case (All1 x œÜ) from All1.hyps[of "Suc v" "x # bs1" bs2] All1.prems show ?case
    by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv split: if_splits)
next
  case (All2 X œÜ) from All2.hyps[of v bs1 "X # bs2"] All2.prems show ?case
    by (auto simp: Diff_subset_conv split: if_splits)
qed (auto split: if_splits)

lemma dec_I1_Extend_FO[simp]:
  "dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (x # bs1) = (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1)(x := fMin P)"
  by (auto simp: dec_I1_def)

lemma dec_I1_Extend_SO[simp]: "dec_I1 (Extend SO i ùîÑ P) bs1 = dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1"
  by (auto simp: dec_I1_def)

lemma dec_I2_Extend_FO[simp]: "dec_I2 (Extend FO i ùîÑ P) bs2 = dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2"
  by (auto simp: dec_I2_def)

lemma dec_I2_Extend_SO[simp]:
  "dec_I2 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (X # bs2) = (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2)(X := P)"
  by (auto simp: dec_I2_def fun_eq_iff)

lemma sat_Œµ: "‚ü¶set (fos œÜ) ‚äÜ set bs1; set (sos œÜ) ‚äÜ set bs2; ok_I ùîÑ bs1‚üß ‚üπ
  WS1S.sat ùîÑ (Œµ bs1 bs2 œÜ) ‚ü∑
  satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) œÜ"
proof (induct œÜ arbitrary: ùîÑ bs1 bs2)
  case (Or œÜ œà) from Or.hyps[of bs1 bs2 ùîÑ] Or.prems show ?case
    unfolding WS1S.sat_def
    by (auto simp: restrict_def ok_I_def split: order.splits)
next
  case (And œÜ œà) from And.hyps[of bs1 bs2 ùîÑ] And.prems show ?case
    unfolding WS1S.sat_def
    by (auto simp: restrict_def ok_I_def split: order.splits)
next
  case (Not œÜ) from Not.hyps[of bs1 bs2 ùîÑ] Not.prems show ?case
    unfolding WS1S.sat_def
    by (auto simp: restrict_def ok_I_def split: order.splits)
next
  case (Ex1 x œÜ)
  { fix P :: "nat fset" assume "P ‚â† {||}"
    with Ex1.prems have "WS1S.sat (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ) ‚ü∑
      satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (x # bs1)) (dec_I2 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) bs2) œÜ"
      by (intro Ex1.hyps) (auto simp: ok_I_def)
  } note IH = this
  show ?case
  proof
    assume "WS1S.sat ùîÑ (Œµ bs1 bs2 (Ex1 x œÜ))"
    then obtain P where "P ‚â† {||}" "WS1S.sat (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ)"
      unfolding WS1S.sat_def by (auto simp: restrict_def split: order.splits)
    then have "satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (x # bs1)) (dec_I2 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) bs2) œÜ"
      by (auto simp: IH)
    then show "satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) (Ex1 x œÜ)" by auto
  next
    assume "satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) (Ex1 x œÜ)"
    then obtain n where "satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ {|n|}) (x # bs1))
      (dec_I2 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ {|n|}) bs2) œÜ" by auto
    then have "WS1S.sat (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ {|n|}) (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ)"
      by (auto simp: IH)
    then show "WS1S.sat ùîÑ (Œµ bs1 bs2 (Ex1 x œÜ))" unfolding WS1S.sat_def
      by (auto simp: restrict_def split: order.splits)
  qed
next
  case (Ex2 X œÜ)
  { fix P :: "nat fset"
    from Ex2.prems have "WS1S.sat (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ bs1 (X # bs2) œÜ) ‚ü∑
      satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) bs1) (dec_I2 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (X # bs2)) œÜ"
      by (intro Ex2.hyps) (auto simp: ok_I_def)
  } note IH = this
  show ?case
  proof -
    have "WS1S.sat ùîÑ (Œµ bs1 bs2 (Ex2 X œÜ)) ‚ü∑
      (‚àÉP. WS1S.sat (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ bs1 (X # bs2) œÜ))"
      unfolding WS1S.sat_def by (auto simp: restrict_def split: order.splits)
    also have "‚Ä¶ ‚ü∑ (‚àÉP. satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) bs1)
      (dec_I2 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (X # bs2)) œÜ)" by (auto simp: IH)
    also have "‚Ä¶ ‚ü∑ satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) (Ex2 X œÜ)" by simp
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
next
  case (All1 x œÜ)
  { fix P :: "nat fset" assume "P ‚â† {||}"
    with All1.prems have "WS1S.sat (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ) ‚ü∑
      satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (x # bs1)) (dec_I2 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) bs2) œÜ"
      by (intro All1.hyps) (auto simp: ok_I_def)
  } note IH = this
  show ?case
  proof
    assume L: "WS1S.sat ùîÑ (Œµ bs1 bs2 (All1 x œÜ))"
    { fix n :: "nat"
      from L have "WS1S.sat (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ {|n|}) (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ)"
        unfolding WS1S.sat_def by (auto simp: restrict_def split: order.splits)
      then have "satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ {|n|}) (x # bs1))
        (dec_I2 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ {|n|}) bs2) œÜ" by (auto simp: IH)
    }
    then show "satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) (All1 x œÜ)" by simp
  next
    assume R: "satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) (All1 x œÜ)"
    { fix P :: "nat fset" assume "P ‚â† {||}"
      with R have "satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (x # bs1))
        (dec_I2 (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) bs2) œÜ" by auto
      with ‚ÄπP ‚â† {||}‚Ä∫ have "WS1S.sat (Extend FO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ (x # bs1) bs2 œÜ)"
        by (auto simp: IH)
    }
    with All1.prems in_FV_ŒµD[of _ "x # bs1" bs2 œÜ]
      show "WS1S.sat ùîÑ (Œµ bs1 bs2 (All1 x œÜ))" unfolding WS1S.sat_def
      by (auto 0 3 simp: restrict_def ok_I_def split: if_splits order.splits)
  qed
next
  case (All2 X œÜ)
  { fix P :: "nat fset"
    from All2.prems have "WS1S.sat (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ bs1 (X # bs2) œÜ) ‚ü∑
      satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) bs1) (dec_I2 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (X # bs2)) œÜ"
      by (intro All2.hyps) (auto simp: ok_I_def)
  } note IH = this
  show ?case
  proof -
    have "WS1S.sat ùîÑ (Œµ bs1 bs2 (All2 X œÜ)) ‚ü∑
      (‚àÄP. WS1S.sat (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (Œµ bs1 (X # bs2) œÜ))"
      unfolding WS1S.sat_def by (auto simp: restrict_def split: order.splits)
    also have "‚Ä¶ ‚ü∑ (‚àÄP. satisfies (dec_I1 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) bs1)
      (dec_I2 (Extend SO 0 ùîÑ P) (X # bs2)) œÜ)" by (auto simp: IH)
    also have "‚Ä¶ ‚ü∑ satisfies (dec_I1 ùîÑ bs1) (dec_I2 ùîÑ bs2) (All2 X œÜ)" by simp
    finally show ?thesis .
  qed
qed (auto simp: WS1S.sat_def Let_def dec_I1_def dec_I2_def ok_I_def
  restrict_def split: if_splits order.splits)

definition "eqv œÜ œà =
  (let fs = List.union (fos œÜ) (fos œà); ss = List.union (sos œÜ) (sos œà)
  in check_eqv (Abs_idx (length fs, length ss)) (Œµ fs ss œÜ) (Œµ fs ss œà))"

lemma eqv_sound: "eqv œÜ œà ‚üπ satisfies I1 I2 œÜ ‚ü∑ satisfies I1 I2 œà"
  unfolding eqv_def Let_def
  by (drule check_eqv_sound[rotated, of _ _ _
    "mk_I I1 I2 (List.union (fos œÜ) (fos œà)) (List.union (sos œÜ) (sos œà))"])
    (auto simp: sat_Œµ dec_I_mk_I_satisfies_cong)

definition "Thm œÜ = eqv œÜ T"

lemma "Thm Œ¶ ‚üπ satisfies I1 I2 Œ¶"
  unfolding Thm_def by (drule eqv_sound[of _ _ I1 I2]) simp

setup_lifting type_definition_fo
setup_lifting type_definition_so

instantiation fo :: equal
begin
  lift_definition equal_fo :: "fo ‚áí fo ‚áí bool" is "(=)" .
  instance by (standard, transfer) simp
end

instantiation so :: equal
begin
  lift_definition equal_so :: "so ‚áí so ‚áí bool" is "(=)" .
  instance by (standard, transfer) simp
end

(*<*)
end
(*>*)
